ESP.ORIGINAL: This is to make add the feral ghoul reaver visual effects.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是为了增加凶悍僵尸掠夺者视觉效果。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn DLC04BeachHoleSCRIPT
ref myLinkedRef ref myLinkedRefsRef
;// disable timer short digTimerStart short scaleTimer float digTimer short shovelCheck short dismembererCheck short throwDirt short unequipOnce short dirtExplosion short digTimerRun
BEGIN ONLOAD
set digTimer to 0
;// get the links set myLinkedRef to getLinkedRef
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( isActionRef player == 1 )
IF ( player.getItemCount DLC04WeapShovel >= 1 || player.getItemCount DLC04WeapUniqueFertilizerShovel >= 1 )
;/////////// ;// unequip the weapons and make the timer longer ;/////////// IF ( player.getEquipped DLC04WeapShovel == 1 ) player.unequipItem DLC04WeapShovel 0 1 set shovelCheck to 1 ENDIF
IF ( player.getEquipped DLC04WeapUniqueFertilizerShovel == 1 ) set dismembererCheck to 1 player.unequipItem DLC04WeapUniqueFertilizerShovel 0 1 ENDIF
;// start the anim and the timer activate player set digTimerStart to 1
ELSE showMessage DLC04BeachPOIShovelMsg ENDIF
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( digTimerStart == 1 )
IF ( dirtExplosion == 0 && player.GetSitting == 2 ) placeAtMe DLC04ShovelDirtExplosion 1 set digTimer to 7 set dirtExplosion to 1 set digTimerRun to 1 ENDIF
IF ( digTimerRun == 1 ) IF ( digTimer > 0 ) set digTimer to digTimer - getSecondsPassed
;// scale the model down to make it go away IF ( scaleTimer == 0 && digTimer < 5 ) set scaleTimer to 1 setScale 0.01
;// if its the treasure hole, add the treasure IF ( getSelf == DLC04BeachTreasureHoleSand ) DLC04BeachTreasure.enable 0 ENDIF ENDIF
;// have the hole remove itself ; IF ( throwDirt == 0 && digTimer < 2.3 ) ; myLinkedRef.playgroup forward 0 ; set throwDirt to 1 ; ENDIF
ELSE
enablePlayerControls
;/////////// ;// if the player had a shovel equipped, re-equip it ;/////////// IF ( shovelCheck == 1 ) player.equipItem DLC04WeapShovel 0 1
ELSEIF ( dismembererCheck == 1 ) player.equipItem DLC04WeapUniqueFertilizerShovel 0 1
ENDIF
set digTimerStart to 2 disable
ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC04FF01CaptureHoloAcquireSCRIPT
; this script surrounds the areas in which the player can acquire DLC04FF01 holotapes so we can catch that event
begin onTrigger player
if getStageDone DLC04FF01 10 == 0 if player.getHasNote DLC04FF01holoNote01 || player.getHasNote DLC04FF01holoNote02 || player.getHasNote DLC04FF01holoNote03 setStage DLC04FF01 10 endif endif
if DLC04FF01.holo1got == 0 if player.getHasNote DLC04FF01holoNote01 set DLC04FF01.holo1got to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF01 11 1 endif endif
if DLC04FF01.holo2got == 0 if player.getHasNote DLC04FF01holoNote02 set DLC04FF01.holo2got to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF01 12 1 endif endif
if DLC04FF01.holo3got == 0 if player.getHasNote DLC04FF01holoNote03 set DLC04FF01.holo3got to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF01 13 1 endif endif
if getStageDone DLC04FF01 50 == 0 if DLC04FF01.holo1got == 1 if DLC04FF01.holo2got == 1 if DLC04FF01.holo3got == 1 setStage DLC04FF01 50 endif endif endif endif
end

short holo1got ; store specific holotapes. short holo2got short holo3got
short holo1in ; track if codes have been submitted short holo2in short holo3in

scn DLC04FF02bookSCRIPT
; empty, functionality is now on DLC04FF02LecternSCRIPT

scn DLC04FF02SCRIPT
; dialogue variables
; Obadiah short forceGreet ; has Oba done his forcegreet on the player? short ManorTop ; has the manor topic come up w/Obadiah? short bookTop ; player has shown the book to Obadiah.
short ObadiahRitual
short ObaKnowsMarDead ; overly verbose variable to indicate that Obadiah Learned of Marcella's Death
; Marcella short MarDiedEarly short metMarcella ; has the player met Marcella before beginning this quest? short faithTop ; has Marcella mentioned "faith"? short scripture ; player is okay with hearing scripture from Marcella

scn DLC04FF02MarcellaMurderSceneSCRIPT
; trigger tells us when player has found Marcella's body
begin onTriggerEnter player
if getStageDone DLC04FF02 40 == 0 && getStageDone DLC04FF02 140 == 0 setStage DLC04FF02 40 endif
end

scn DLC04FF02LecternSCRIPT
; script that runs on the altar/lectern where the evil book is found and can be returned. ;;=======================================================================================
short runFlag short button
short bookTaken
short MarcellaSafetyNet
;;=======================================================================================
begin onActivate player
if getStage DLC04FF02 >= 10 && getStage DLC04FF02 < 30 showMessage DLC04FF02AltarMSG01 ; player prompted to take book set runFlag to 1 elseif getStageDone DLC04FF02 151 == 1 || getStageDone DLC04FF02 150 == 1 if bookTaken == 0 playgroup forward 0 ; support for player who has failed quest but has book anyway. set bookTaken to 1 DLC04RitualBasementMarker01REF.enable DLC04FF02DunwichObeliskREF.enable player.additem DLC04FF02Book 1 ; add book to player inventory endif
if DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 0 setStage DLC04FF02 30 endif endif else ; do nothing. endif
end
;;=======================================================================================
begin gameMode
if MarcellaSafetyNet == 0 && DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 0 if getStageDone DLC04FF02 20 == 1 DLC04MarcellaREF.moveTo DLC04FF02MarcellaGore ; make sure Marcella is at home set MarcellaSafetyNet to 1 endif endif
if runFlag == 1 set button to getButtonPressed
if getStage DLC04FF02 >= 10 && getStage DLC04FF02 < 30 if button >-1 if button == 0 DLC04RitualBasementMarker01REF.enable player.additem DLC04FF02Book 1 ; add book to player inventory playgroup forward 0 setStage DLC04FF02 30 endif set runFlag to 0 endif
; elseif getStage DLC04FF02 >= 40 ; if button >-1 ; if button == 0 ; setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 40 1 ; mark "return book" objective complete. ; playgroup backward 0 ; setStage DLC04FF02 100 ; completes quest with a karma hit ; player.removeItem DLC04FF02Book 1 ; remove book from player inventory ; endif ; ; set runFlag to 0 ; endif
endif endif
end
;;=======================================================================================

scn DLC04ManMasterSCRIPT
;For all of the SayTo's Desmond will be doing short stage01LineNumber short stage02LineNumber short playerWithinRange short desmondFinalWaveChatter short intercomForceGoodbye
;For Break Through wall animations short doTribalBreakThroughAnims short breakThroughWallAnimReady01 short climbOverDoorAnimReady01 short breakThroughWallAnimReady02 short climbOverDoorAnimReady02
short initTimer01 short Stage01BreachBlocked short Stage02BreachBlocked
;Variables for Tribal Drop Scene short initTribalDropTimer short TribalDropBeat
;Variable for Tribal Break Through Scene 02 short initTribalBreakThrough short initTribalBreakThrough02
;Variables for counting the dead where needed short deadCount short finalWaveDeadCount
;Final wave variables short finalWaveStart short finalWaveNumber short finalWaveComplete
;DoOnce's short doLoadOnce short doOnceA short doOnceA1 short doOnceB short doOnceB1 short doOnceC short doOnceD short doOnceE
short stage01DoorClosed
short killTriggers float killTriggerTimer
short desmondDoWaitPackage short desmondReadyForBreach short playerReadyForBreach
float Timer float breakThroughWallAnimReady01TIMER float climbOverDoorAnimReady01TIMER float breakThroughWallAnimReady02TIMER float climbOverDoorAnimReady02TIMER
Begin GameMode
;===================== ;=====On Load Stuff===== ;=====================
if (doLoadOnce == 0) startquest DLC04MQ02LD
;DLC04EastWingFirstDoorREF.Enable set killTriggerTimer to 3 set finalWaveNumber to 1 set dlc04mq02ld.desmondgreetstage to 1 DLC04MHole03REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.desmondFinalWaveChatter to 3 set doLoadOnce to 1
;TESTING ;Settings for testing the Finale ;DLC04ManSideDoor02BeforeEnablerREF.Enable ;DLC04ManSiegeStartTriggerREF.disable ;set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage to 6 ;set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk to 5 ;DLC04ManSealFronDoorsEnabler.Disable ;DLC04ManFrontBoardsBeforeEnabler.enable ;DLC04ManSideDoor02REF.Disable ;DLC04ManSideDoor02bREF.Enable ;DLC04SideDoubleDoor02REF.Enable ;DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aDoor.Disable ;DLC04SideDoubleDoor02BEFOREEnablerREF.Enable ;DLC04EastWingFirstDoor.SetOpenState 0 ;DLC04ManUpperFrontRightFirstBoardsREF.Enable ;DLC04EastWingFirstDoorEnablerREF.Enable ;DLC04ManTribalSecondStage01REF.Kill ;DLC04ManTribalSecondStage02REF.Kill ;DLC04ManTribalSecondStage03REF.Kill ;DLC04ManLeftBottomFrontDoorBcaseREF.disable ;DLC04EastWingFirstDoor.Lock 255 ;Player.MoveTo DLC04ManFinaleTEST ;set Stage02BreachBlocked to 1 ;set desmondFinalWaveChatter to 5 endif
;===================== ;===Ready Animations=== ;=====================
;Ready animation for first wall break through if (breakThroughWallAnimReady01 == 0) if (DLC04ManTribalThroughWallREF.GetSitting > 1) set breakThroughWallAnimReady01TIMER to .3 set breakThroughWallAnimReady01 to 1 endif endif
if (breakThroughWallAnimReady01 == 1) if (breakThroughWallAnimReady01TIMER <= 0) DLC04ManTribalThroughWallREF.setav Variable06 1 DLC04ManTribalThroughWallREF.SetActorsAI 0 set breakThroughWallAnimReady01 to 3 else set breakThroughWallAnimReady01TIMER to breakThroughWallAnimReady01TIMER - getSecondsPassed endif endif
;Ready animation for first door climb over if (climbOverDoorAnimReady01 == 0) if (DLC04ManTriballOverDoorREF.GetSitting > 1) set climbOverDoorAnimReady01TIMER to .3 set climbOverDoorAnimReady01 to 1 endif endif
if (climbOverDoorAnimReady01 == 1) if (climbOverDoorAnimReady01TIMER <= 0) DLC04ManTriballOverDoorREF.setav Variable06 1 DLC04ManTriballOverDoorREF.SetActorsAI 0 set climbOverDoorAnimReady01 to 3 else set climbOverDoorAnimReady01TIMER to climbOverDoorAnimReady01TIMER - getSecondsPassed endif endif
;Ready animation for second wall break through if (breakThroughWallAnimReady02 == 0) if (DLC04ManTribalThroughWall02REF.GetSitting > 1) set breakThroughWallAnimReady02TIMER to .3 set breakThroughWallAnimReady02 to 1 endif endif
if (breakThroughWallAnimReady02 == 1) if (breakThroughWallAnimReady02TIMER <= 0) DLC04ManTribalThroughWall02REF.setav Variable06 1 DLC04ManTribalThroughWall02REF.SetActorsAI 0 set breakThroughWallAnimReady02 to 3 else set breakThroughWallAnimReady02TIMER to breakThroughWallAnimReady02TIMER - getSecondsPassed endif endif
;Ready animation for second door climb over if (climbOverDoorAnimReady02 == 0) if (DLC04ManTriballOverDoor02REF.GetSitting > 1) set climbOverDoorAnimReady02TIMER to .4 set climbOverDoorAnimReady02 to 1 endif endif
if (climbOverDoorAnimReady02 == 1) if (climbOverDoorAnimReady02TIMER <= 0) DLC04ManTriballOverDoor02REF.setav Variable06 1 DLC04ManTriballOverDoor02REF.SetActorsAI 0 set climbOverDoorAnimReady02 to 3 else set climbOverDoorAnimReady02TIMER to climbOverDoorAnimReady02TIMER - getSecondsPassed endif endif
;===================== ;==Desmond's SayTo's== ;=====================
;Stage 01 if (stage01LineNumber == 1) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage01 set stage01LineNumber to -1 endif endif
if (stage01LineNumber == 2) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage01 0 1 set stage01LineNumber to -1 endif endif
if (stage01LineNumber == 3) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage01 0 1 set stage01LineNumber to -1 endif endif
if (stage01LineNumber == 4) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage01 set stage01LineNumber to -1 endif endif
if (stage01LineNumber == 5) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage01 set stage01LineNumber to -1 endif endif
;Stage 02
if (stage02LineNumber == 1) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage02 set stage02LineNumber to -1 endif endif
if (stage02LineNumber == 2) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage02 set stage02LineNumber to -1 endif endif
if (stage02LineNumber == 3) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage02 set stage02LineNumber to -1 endif endif
if (stage02LineNumber == 4) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage02 0 1 set stage02LineNumber to -1 endif endif
if (stage02LineNumber == 6) if (DLC04DesmondRef.GetDistance Player < 500) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondStage02 0 1 set stage02LineNumber to -1 endif endif
;===================== ;===Stage 01========== ;=====================
;When both desmond, and player, are in position the tribals can breach. if (doOnceE == 0)
if (desmondDoWaitPackage == 1)
if (DLC04ManDesmondWaitForPlayerREF.GetDistance DLC04DesmondREF < 170) && (desmondReadyForBreach == 0) set desmondReadyForBreach to 1 endif
if (DLC04ManDesmondWaitForPlayerREF.GetDistance Player < 170) && (playerReadyForBreach == 0) set playerReadyForBreach to 1 endif
if (playerReadyForBreach == 1) && (desmondReadyForBreach == 1) DLC04MHole01COLREF.disable DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn02Swap.enable DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn02Spawner.enable DLC04MHole01REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC04MHole01ExplosionREF.PlaceAtMe DLC04ManFakeMediumExplosion set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondChatter to 1 DLC04DesmondRef.Say DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter 1 set desmondDoWaitPackage to 0 set doOnceE to 1 endif endif endif
;If both desmond and player are in position close door if (stage01DoorClosed == 0) if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondIsInPosition01 == 1) && (DLC04MQ02LD.playerIsInPosition01 == 1) ;Close the door behind the player DLC04ManTribalThroughWallREF.Enable 0 DLC04ManTribalThroughWallREF.moveto DLC04ManTribalThroughWallMOVETOREF DLC04ManTribalThroughWallREF.StopCombat DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aSwap.enable DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aDoor.SetOpenState 0 DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aDoor.Lock 255 DLC04DesmondREF.MoveTo DLC04MQ02DesmondAtCamerasREF ;Start the timer for tribals dropping through ceiling scene DLC04ManSealFronDoorsEnabler.disable DLC04ManFrontBoardsBeforeEnabler.Enable set initTribalDropTimer to 1 set Timer to 1 set TribalDropBeat to 1 set stage01DoorClosed to 1 endif endif
;Timer for tribal drop through ceiling scene if (initTribalDropTimer == 1)
if (TribalDropBeat == 1) if (Timer <= 0) DLC04ManTribalFallThroughSoundREF.placeatme DLC04FXCeilingImpact 1 set TribalDropBeat to 2 set Timer to 2 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (TribalDropBeat == 2) if (Timer <= 0) DLC04ManTribalFallThroughSoundREF.placeatme DLC04FXCeilingImpact 1 set TribalDropBeat to 3 set Timer to 1 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (TribalDropBeat == 3) if (Timer <= 0) ;Spawn the Tribals DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Spawner.enable set TribalDropBeat to 4 set Timer to 1 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (TribalDropBeat == 4) if (Timer <= 0) ;Fatigue the Tribals so they ragdoll ;DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin1.DamageAV Fatigue 54 DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin2.DamageAV Fatigue 55 DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin3.DamageAV Fatigue 56 set TribalDropBeat to 5 set Timer to .5 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (TribalDropBeat == 5) if (Timer <= 0) ;Remove ceiling so that the tribals can drop ;DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin1.MoveTo DLC04ManAllFallGuysHereREF DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin2.MoveTo DLC04ManAllFallGuysHereREF DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin3.MoveTo DLC04ManAllFallGuysHereREF DLC04MHole02REF.PlayGroup Forward 1 DLC04ManTribalFallThroughSoundREF.playsound3d AMBDLC04BoardsBreak DLC04ManTribalFallThroughSoundREF.PlaceAtMe DLC04FakeForce5r100 DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Swap.enable set TribalDropBeat to 6 set Timer to 2 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (TribalDropBeat == 6) if (Timer <= 0) DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn04BoardSwap.disable DLC04ManFallingFloorLockedDoorREF.SetOpenState 1 DLC04ManFallingFloorLockedDoorREF.Unlock DLC04ManFallingFloorLockedDoorREF.playsound3d AMBDLC04BoardsBreak DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn04Spawner.enable set TribalDropBeat to 7 set Timer to 1 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
endif
;Timer for Tribal Break Through Scene 02 if (initTribalBreakThrough == 1)
DLC04ManFakeForceThroughWall01REF.PlaceAtMe FakeForceBallNudge DLC04ManFakeForceThroughWall02REF.PlaceAtMe FakeForceBallNudge DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn05Spawner.enable DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn05Swap.enable DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn05NAV.disable set initTribalBreakThrough to 0
endif
;After the timer hits zero the second wall is breached and enemies come out. ;if (initTimer01 == 1) ; if (Timer <= 0) ; DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn02Swap.enable ; DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn02Spawner.enable ; set initTimer01 to 0 ; elseif (Timer > 0) ; set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed ; endif ;endif
;If player has killed these 5 guys then have desmond talk to him over intercom if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 5) && (Stage01BreachBlocked == 0) if (deadCount == 5) if (DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.playerWithinRange == 1) DLC04ManIntercom01REF.Say DLC04MQ02DesmondStage01 1 set deadCount to 0 endif endif endif
;If an explosion happens in the first room block up the hole
if (doOnceA1 == 0) if (DLC04ManGasHack01REF.GetDisabled == 0) set doOnceA1 to 1 endif endif
if (doOnceA == 0) if (DoOnceA1 == 1) if (DLC04ManGasHack01REF.GetDisabled == 1) ;DLC04MQ02LDSeq01BlockEnabler.enable DLC04ManWingBlockFX01REF.activate player 1 DLC04ManWingBlockFX01REF.playsound3d AMBDLC04CeilingCollapse set Stage01BreachBlocked to 1 set intercomForceGoodbye to 1 SetStage DLC04MQ01 165 set doOnceA to 1 endif endif endif
;===================== ;===Stage 02========== ;=====================
;Timer for Tribal Break Through Scene 03 if (initTribalBreakThrough02 == 1)
DLC04ManTribalThroughWall02Backup01REF.Enable 0 DLC04ManTribalThroughWall02Backup02REF.Enable 0 DLC04TrigPlayerEnableAfterFallREF.Enable ;DLC04DoorKnockDownBeforeREF.Disable DLC04DoorKnockDownBeforeREF.SetOpenState 1 DLC04DoorKnockDownBeforeREF.playsound3d AMBDLC04BoardsBreak ;DLC04DoorKnockDownAfterREF.Enable 0 set initTribalBreakThrough02 to 0
endif
;If an explosion happens in the second room block up the hole
if (doOnceB1 == 0) if (DLC04ManGasHack02REF.GetDisabled == 0) set doOnceB1 to 1 endif endif
if (doOnceB == 0) if (doOnceB1 == 1) if (DLC04ManGasHack02REF.GetDisabled == 1) ;DLC04MQ02LDSeq02BlockEnabler.disable DLC04ManWingBlockFX02REF.activate player 1 DLC04ManWingBlockFX02REF.playsound AMBDLC04CeilingCollapse set Stage02BreachBlocked to 1 SetStage DLC04MQ01 170 set doOnceB to 1 endif endif endif
;===================== ;===FINAL WAVE======== ;=====================
;this section controls spawns of the final wave
if (finalWaveStart == 1)
if (finalWaveNumber == 1) && (finalWaveDeadCount == 0)
if (desmondFinalWaveChatter == 5) && (timer < 10) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter set desmondFinalWaveChatter to 10 endif
if (desmondFinalWaveChatter == 10) && (timer < 3) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter DLC04ManFirstWaveSpawnENABLER.Enable 1 set desmondFinalWaveChatter to 20 endif
if (Timer <= 0) DLC04EastWingFirstDoor.SetOpenState 1 DLC04EastWingFirstDoor.playsound3d AMBDLC04BoardsBreak DLC04ManUpperFrontRightEnablerREF.Enable DLC04ManUpperFrontRightFirstBoardsREF.Disable set finalWaveNumber to 2 set Timer to 5 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (finalWaveNumber == 2) && (finalWaveDeadCount == 4)
if (desmondFinalWaveChatter == 20) && (timer < 3) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter DLC04ManSecondWaveSpawnENABLER.Enable 1 set desmondFinalWaveChatter to 30
endif
if (Timer <= 0) DLC04ManFakeForceMarker04.PlaceAtMe FakeForce100r100 DLC04ManSideDoor01EnablerREF.disable DLC04ManSideDoor01REF.playsound3d AMBDLC04BoardsBreak DLC04ManSideDoor01REF.SetOpenState 1 set finalWaveNumber to 3 set Timer to 5 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (finalWaveNumber == 3) && (finalWaveDeadCount == 8)
if (desmondFinalWaveChatter ==30) && (timer < 3) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter DLC04ManThirdWaveSpawnENABLER.Enable 1 set desmondFinalWaveChatter to 40 endif
if (Timer <= 0) DLC04ManLeftBottomFrontDoorREF.SetOpenState 1 DLC04ManLeftBottomFrontDoorREF.playsound3d AMBDLC04BoardsBreak DLC04ManLeftBottomFrontDoorEnablerREF.Enable set finalWaveNumber to 4 set Timer to 5 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (finalWaveNumber == 4) && (finalWaveDeadCount == 12)
if (desmondFinalWaveChatter ==40) && (timer < 3) DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter DLC04ManFourthWaveSpawnENABLER.Enable 1 set desmondFinalWaveChatter to 50 endif
if (Timer <= 0) DLC04ManFakeForceMarker02.PlaceAtMe FakeForce100r100 DLC04ManFrontDoors02REF.setopenstate 1 DLC04ManFrontDoorBossEnablerREF.disable DLC04ManFrontBoardsBeforeEnabler.disable DLC04ManFrontBoardsAfterEnabler.enable DLC04ManFrontDoors02REF.playsound3d AMBDLC04BoardsBreak set finalWaveNumber to 5 set Timer to 5 else set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif endif
;Unused Final Wave Breach Points
;Left Upper Back Door ;DLC04ManSideDoor02BeforeEnablerREF.Disable ;DLC04ManSideDoor02AfterEnablerREF.Enable ;DLC04ManSideDoor02AfterEnablerREF.PlaySound FXMeleeLargeImpactMetal ;DLC04ManSideDoor02bREF.SetOpenState 1 ;DLC04ManSideDoor02EnablerREF.Disable
;Right Bottom Back Doors ;DLC04ManFakeForceMarker03.PlaceAtMe FakeForce100r100 ;DLC04SideDoubleDoorEnablerREF.disable ;DLC04ManSideDoubleDoorsREF.setopenstate 1 ;DLC04ManSideDoubleDoorsREF.PlaySound FXMeleeLargeImpactMetal
;Left Bottom Back Doors ;DLC04SideDoubleDoor02EnablerREF.Enable ;DLC04SideDoubleDoor02BEFOREEnablerREF.Disable ;DLC04SideDoubleDoor02REF.Unlock ;DLC04SideDoubleDoor02REF.SetOpenState 1 ;DLC04SideDoubleDoor02REF.PlaySound FXMeleeLargeImpactMetal
;final wave is over once all enemies are killed
if (doOnceC == 0) if (finalWaveDeadCount > 14) set finalWaveComplete to 1 set finalWaveStart to 0 DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter set desmondFinalWaveChatter to 60 set dlc04mq02ld.desmondstage02talk to 7 SetStage DLC04MQ01 190 DLC04DesmondRef.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction DLC01DemondDog01REF.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondDog03REF.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondRef.EVP set doOnceC to 1 endif endif
;Handle the enabling and disabling of control kill triggers
if (Stage02BreachBlocked == 1) && (killTriggers == 0) DLC04ManKillWingTrig01REF.Enable 0 DLC04ManKillWingTrig02REF.Enable 0 DLC04ManKillWingTrig03REF.Enable 0 DLC04ManKillWingTrig04REF.Enable 0 set killTriggers to 1 endif
if (killTriggers == 1) if (killTriggerTimer < 0) DLC04ManKillWingTrig01REF.Disable 0 DLC04ManKillWingTrig02REF.Disable 0 DLC04ManKillWingTrig03REF.Disable 0 DLC04ManKillWingTrig04REF.Disable 0 set killTriggers to 2 else set killTriggerTimer to (killTriggerTimer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
;TEMP STUFF ;EVP desmond after the 6 raiders are dead ;if (DLC04MQ02LD.deadCount == 6) && (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 3) ; DLC04DesmondREF.evp ; set DLC04MQ02LD.deadCount to 0 ;endif
;Desmond runs his greeting the player package for a certain amount of time ;if (desmondStart == 1) ; if (Timer <= 0) ; set desmondChecksCamera01 1 ; set desmondChecksCamera01 to 0 ; DLC04DesmondREF.evp ; set Timer to 5 ; elseif (Timer > 0) ; set Timer to Timer - getSecondsPassed ; endif ;endif
End

scn DLC04LvlManTribalCountSCRIPT
begin onDeath
set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.deadCount to (DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.deadCount + 1)
end
;!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ;This needs to be placed on any combatant actor in Point Lookout that gets his inventory from leveled lists
;if actor has nonPlayable weapon (needed to add damage effect) ;1) give him a playable version when he dies ;2) take away the nonPlayable version when the player loots the playable version
short hasBat short hasBBGun short hasHuntingRifle short hasCombatKnife short hasKnife short hasLeadPipe short hasTireIron
short deadCheckInventory
Begin OnLoad
if getItemCount DLC04WeapBaseballBatNonPlayable >= 1 set hasBat to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapBBGunNonPlayable >= 1 set hasBBGun to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapHuntingRifleNonPlayable >= 1 set hasHuntingRifle to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapKnifeCombatNonPlayable >= 1 set hasCombatKnife to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapKnifeNonPlayable >= 1 set hasKnife to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapLeadPipeNonPlayable >= 1 set hasLeadPipe to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapTireIronNonPlayable >= 1 set hasTireIron to 1 endif
End
Begin onDeath
set deadCheckInventory to 1
if hasBat == 1 additem CondBaseballBatNPC 1 endif
if hasBBGun == 1 additem CondBBGunNPC 1 endif
if hasHuntingRifle == 1 additem CondHuntingRifleNPCDC 1 endif
if hasCombatKnife == 1 additem CondKnifeCombatNPC 1 endif
if hasKnife == 1 additem CondKnifeNPC 1 endif
if hasLeadPipe == 1 additem CondLeadPipeNPC 1 endif
if hasTireIron == 1 additem CondTireIronNPC 1 endif
End
Begin MenuMode
if deadCheckInventory == 1
if hasBat == 1 if getItemCount WeapBaseballBat == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapBaseballBatNonPlayable 9999 set hasBat to -1 endif endif
if hasBBGun == 1 if getItemCount WeapBBGun == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapBBGunNonPlayable 9999 set hasBBGun to -1 endif endif
if hasHuntingRifle == 1 if getItemCount WeapHuntingRifleCollector == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapHuntingRifleNonPlayable 9999 set hasHuntingRifle to -1 endif endif
if hasCombatKnife == 1 if getItemCount WeapKnifeCombat == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapKnifeCombatNonPlayable 9999 set hasCombatKnife to -1 endif endif
if hasKnife == 1 if getItemCount WeapKnife == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapKnifeNonPlayable 9999 set hasKnife to -1 endif endif
if hasLeadPipe == 1 if getItemCount WeapLeadPipe == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapLeadPipeNonPlayable 9999 set hasLeadPipe to -1 endif endif
if hasTireIron == 1 if getItemCount WeapTireIron == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapTireIronNonPlayable 9999 set hasTireIron to -1 endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC04ManStartSequenceSCRIPT
short doOnceA short doOnceB
Begin onTriggerEnter
if (isActionRef DLC04DesmondREF == 1) && (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 5) if doOnceA == 0 set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondIsInPosition01 to 1 set doOnceA to 1 endif endif
; if (isActionRef DLC04DesmondREF == 1) && (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 3) ; if doOnceB == 0 ; set doOnceB to 1 ; endif ; endif
End

scn DLC04MQ02LDSCRIPT
short desmondChatter short desmondGreetStage short desmondStage02Talk short deadCount
;When these are both true Stage 01 begins short desmondIsInPosition01 short playerIsInPosition01

scn DLC04ManStage01Start01aSCRIPT
;This trigger setups a variable to one if the player enters it.
Begin onTriggerEnter Player set DLC04MQ02LD.playerIsInPosition01 to 1 set DLC04MQ01.QTPosition to 1 End

scn DLC04ManStage01Start01bSCRIPT
;This trigger setups a variable to one if the player enters it.
Begin onTriggerEnter Player set DLC04MQ02LD.playerIsInPosition01 to 0 End

scn DLC04DesmondSCRIPT
short TalkToBrain short DesmondPostQuestAction
BEGIN SayToDone DLC04MQ05aDesmondConfrontBrain1
DLC04TheBrainREF.Say DLC04MQ05aBrainTalkPlayer 1 DLC04TheBrainNPC 1
END
BEGIN OnHit Player
if ( DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget == 0 ) && ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05a == 1 ) && ( GetStage DLC04MQ05a >= 100 ) Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 1 SetStage DLC04MQ05a 101 elseif ( DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget == 0 ) && ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05b == 1 ) Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 1 SetStage DLC04MQ05b 125 endif
END
BEGIN OnDeath
if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 100 == 1 ) || ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 75 == 1 ) if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 180 == 0 ) && ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05a == 1 ) SetStage DLC04MQ05a 150 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to -1 endif endif
if ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05b == 1 ) SetStage DLC04MQ05b 150 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to -1 endif
END
;Stuff For Mansion - Daryl
BEGIN SayToDone DLC04MQ02DesmondStage01
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 5) set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage to 6 EVP endif
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 4) SetStage DLC04MQ01 160 set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage to 5 EVP endif
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 3) DLC04ManDoorToDiningRmREF.SetOwnership DLC04Desmond set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage to 4 EVP endif
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 2) set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage to 3 set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.desmondDoWaitPackage to 1 EVP endif
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage == 1) set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage to 2 EVP endif
END
BEGIN SayToDone DLC04MQ02DesmondStage02
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk == 6) DLC04DesmondREF.equipitem WeapSniperRifle endif
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk == 4) set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk to 5 EVP endif
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk == 3) set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondGreetStage to 6 set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk to 4 EVP endif
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk == 2) set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk to -1 EVP endif
if (DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk == 1) set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk to 2 EVP endif
END

scn DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn04SCRIPT
short DoOnce ref myLink
begin onTriggerEnter player
if doOnce == 0 ;If the Stage 01 door is closed then spawn some baddies when this trigger is hit by the player if (DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.stage01DoorClosed == 1) set myLink to getLinkedRef myLink.enable set doOnce to 1 endif ;If the door is not closed do not ever trigger baddies when the player hits this trigger if (DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.stage01DoorClosed == 0) set doOnce to 1 endif endif
end

scn DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn05SCRIPT
short DoOnce
begin onTriggerEnter player
if doOnce == 0 DLC04ManTribalThroughWallREF.SetActorsAI 1 DLC04ManSideDoor02REF.SetOwnership DLC04Desmond DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn05NAV.Disable set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.initTribalBreakThrough to 1 DLC04ManTriballOverDoorREF.Enable 0 set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC04MQ02LDSeq01BlockSCRIPT
short doOnce
short doOnceA
begin onActivate
if doOnce == 0 DLC04MQ02LDSeq01BlockEnabler.enable Player.MoveTo DLC04MQ02LDSeq01BlockMove set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.Stage01BreachBlocked to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
end

scn DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03TableSCRIPT
ref target short doOnce short doOnceA short doOnceB short doOnceC
Begin onTriggerEnter DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin1 if doOnce == 0 set target to getLinkedRef target.disable DLC04DiningTableREF.PlayGroup Forward 1 set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time endif if (doOnceA == 0) ;DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin1.kill set doOnceA to 1 endif End
Begin onTriggerEnter DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin2 if doOnce == 0 set target to getLinkedRef target.disable DLC04DiningTableREF.PlayGroup Forward 1 set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time endif if (doOnceB == 0) DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin2.kill set doOnceB to 1 endif End
Begin onTriggerEnter DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin3 if doOnce == 0 set target to getLinkedRef target.disable DLC04DiningTableREF.PlayGroup Forward 1 set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time endif if (doOnceC == 0) DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn03Dropin3.kill set doOnceC to 1 endif End

scn DLC04MQ02LDSeq01EndTrig01SCRIPT
short doOnce short doOnceB
Begin onTriggerEnter Player if doOnce == 0 if DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.Stage01BreachBlocked == 1 DLC04ManStage02BookcaseMoveREF.disable DLC04DesmondREF.MoveTo DLC04MQ02Stage02DesmondMoveTo set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk to 1 DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.desmondFinalWaveChatter to 5 set doOnce to 1 endif endif
if (doOnceB == 0) DLC04ManTriballOverDoorREF.SetActorsAI 1 set doOnceB to 1 endif End
Begin onTriggerLeave Player if doOnce == 0 if DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.Stage01BreachBlocked == 1 DLC04ManStage02BookcaseMoveREF.disable DLC04ManSideDoor02REF.SetOwnership DLC04Desmond DLC04DesmondREF.MoveTo DLC04MQ02Stage02DesmondMoveTo set DLC04MQ02LD.desmondStage02Talk to 1 DLC04DesmondRef.SayTo Player DLC04MQ02DesmondChatter set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.desmondFinalWaveChatter to 5 set doOnce to 1 endif endif
if (doOnceB == 0) DLC04ManTriballOverDoorREF.SetActorsAI 1 set doOnceB to 1 endif End

scn DLC04FF03script
short tonicTop short tonicSample
short repairJob short repairJobRefused short repairJobDone short repairJobProBono short repairJobEarly ; player set repairJobDone early short repairJobEarlyRewarded ; player has been rewarded for repairing still early short repair2Xfee
short spChallAttempt short spChallWon
float lastBrewDay short willBrewAgain

scn DLC04FF03StillSCRIPT
; activator script on this quest object ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; short active short button ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; begin onActivate player
if DLC04FF03.repairJobDone == 0 showMessage DLC04FF03StillRepairMSG set active to 1 else showMessage DLC04FF03StillRepairDoneMSG endif
end
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
begin gameMode
if active == 1 set button to getButtonPressed if button > -1 if button == 0 ; do nothing elseif button == 1 if player.getAV repair >= 44 set DLC04FF03.repairJobDone to 1 rewardxp 25
if DLC04FF03.repairJob == 0 set DLC04FF03.repairJobEarly to 1 endif
else showMessage DLC04FF03StillRepairFailMSG endif endif endif set active to 0 endif
end

scn DLC04FerrisWheelBeaconHolderSCRIPT
short DoOnce short Button
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;// if the player activates the motor:
IF ( isActionRef player == 1 && DLC04MQ04.ferrisWheelBeaconCar == 0 ) if ( GetStage DLC04MQ04 > 20 ) && ( GetStage DLC04MQ04 < 100 ) if ( DoOnce >= 0 ) ShowMessage DLC04MQ04FerrisWheelMessage set DLC04MQ04.ferrisWheelControlPanel to 1 Set DoOnce to 1 endif elseif ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ04 101 == 1 ) ShowMessage DLC04MQ04FerrisWheelMessageDONE else ShowMessage DLC04MQ04FerrisWheelMessageNO endif
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( DoOnce == 1 )
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Button == 0 ) SetStage DLC04MQ04 99 Player.RemoveItem DLC04Jammer 99 SetDestroyed 1 Set DoOnce to -1 endif endif
END

BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;// if the player activates the ferriswheel after the beacon is placed, start it up IF ( isActionRef player == 1 && getStage DLC04MQ04 == 99 ) setStage DLC04MQ04 100 set DLC04MQ04.ferrisWheelState to 2 set DLC04MQ04.ferrisWheelBegun to 1 DLC04FerrisWheelREF.playgroup forward 0
ENDIF
END

scn DLC04FF03dummySCRIPT ; this script lives with Marguerite and runs constantly
;=====================================================
begin gameMode
set DLC04FF03a.currDay to gameDaysPassed
if DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.currDay >= (DLC04FF03a.brewDay + 0.75) if DLC04FF03a.brewSoon == 0 set DLC04FF03a.brewSoon to 1 endif endif
if DLC04FF03a.currDay >= (DLC04FF03a.brewDay + 1.0) && DLC04FF03a.brewReady == 0 set DLC04FF03a.brewReady to 1 setStage DLC04FF03 100 set DLC04FF03.lastBrewDay to gameDaysPassed set DLC04FF03.willBrewAgain to 0 else ; do nothing endif endif
if DLC04FF03a.batchActive && DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone == 0 if DLC04FF03a.fruitDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.yeastDone == 1 ;if DLC04FF03a.waterDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.batteriesDone == 1
; got all the stuff, advance. setStage DLC04FF03 90 set DLC04FF03a.brewDay to gameDaysPassed set DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone to 1 endif ;endif endif endif endif
if getStageDone DLC04FF03 101 == 1 if DLC04FF03a.currDay >= (DLC04FF03.lastBrewDay + 0.01) ; TEMP - setting this way down, reset to 3 days for final set DLC04FF03.willBrewAgain to 1 endif endif
end
;=====================================================

scn DLC04FF05script
; quest script for DLC04FF05
short holoPlaying short bankPasswordWrong short clueNavalIntelligenceAgency ; has player found clue pointing to the naval DIA terminal? short clueYangLoc ; has player found clues about Yang prior to this stage of quest?
short resetAll
short selfDestructInitiated ; 1 == player has thrown the switch ; 2 == player has exited the sub float timer
short holoAlt01 ; variables for the alt. holotape passwords. short boxAlt01open short holoAlt02 short boxAlt02open
;=============================================;
begin gameMode
if selfDestructInitiated == 1 if player.getInCell DLC04Submarine == 0 set selfDestructInitiated to 2 DLC04FF05SubHatchExtREF.lock 255 ; don't allow player back in the sub. It's going to blow. endif endif
; | detonation event | ; V block here V
if selfDestructInitiated == 2
if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) else
if DLC04FF05ExplosionStarter.hasLoaded3d == 1 DLC04FF05ExplosionStarter.activate player ; don't do if the player has left area - crashes. endif
DLC04FF05SubmarineREF.disable ; disable the intact sub DLC04FF05SubHatchExtREF.disable ; disable the hatch - nobody goes in this now. setStage DLC04FF05 70 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 60 1 ; safety check to disable all the sub objectives setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 61 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 62 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 70 1 set selfDestructInitiated to 3 endif
endif
end

scn DLC04PungaPlantSCRIPT
short state ; 0 == laden with delicious fruit ; 1 == plucked :(
begin onActivate player
IF ( state == 0 && DLC04MainHallucinationXMRK.getdisabled == 1 )
set state to 1
if getisID DLC04PungaPlant01 == 1 player.additem DLC04PungaWild 1 ; visually - 2 elseif getisID DLC04PungaPlant02 == 1 player.additem DLC04PungaWild 1 ; visually - 3 elseif getisID DLC04PungaPlantRefined01 == 1 player.additem DLC04PungaRefined 1 ; visually - 2 elseif getisID DLC04PungaPlantRefined02 == 1 player.additem DLC04PungaRefined 1 ; visually - 3 endif
playgroup forward 0
ELSEIF ( state == 0 && DLC04MainHallucinationXMRK.getDisabled == 0 )
ENDIF
end

SCN DLC04MQ04SCRIPT
short PlayerInstalledJammer short PlayerDestroyedJammer
short PlayerExtortedDesmond
;** PHIL'S VARIABLES **; ;** ferris wheel variables short ferrisWheelBeaconCar short ferrisWheelControlPanel short ferrisWheelState short ferrisWheelBegun
;// the wheel timer float ferrisWheelTimer short ferrisWheelTimerInit
;// the waves short fightWave
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( ferrisWheelState == 2 )
;// the init for the wheel IF ( ferrisWheelTimerInit == 0 )
set ferrisWheelTimer to 30 set ferrisWheelTimerInit to 1
;// spawn the first wave DLC04FerrisEventSpawn1A.enable 0 DLC04FerrisEventSpawn1C.enable 0
ENDIF
;// the event timer IF ( ferrisWheelTimer > 0 ) set ferrisWheelTimer to ferrisWheelTimer - getSecondsPassed
;// spawn the roof guy IF ( ferrisWheelTimer < 20 && fightWave == 0 ) DLC04FerrisRoofGrenadierB.enable 0 DLC04FerrisEventSpawn1B.enable 0 set fightWave to 1 ENDIF
;// spawn the roof guy IF ( ferrisWheelTimer < 10 && fightWave == 1 ) DLC04FerrisRoofGrenadierA.enable 0 set fightWave to 2 ENDIF
ELSE set ferrisWheelState to 3
ENDIF ENDIF END

SCN DLC04MQ04TempControlSCRIPT
short DoOnce short Button
BEGIN OnActivate Player
if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ04 20 == 1 ) && ( DoOnce == 0 ) ShowMessage DLC04TempControlMessageBox endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( DoOnce == 0 )
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Button == 0 ) Set DLC04MQ04.PlayerInstalledJammer to 1 SetStage DLC04MQ04 100 SetDestroyed 1 Set DoOnce to 1 endif
if ( Button == 1 ) Set DLC04MQ04.PlayerDestroyedJammer to 1 SetStage DLC04MQ04 101 SetDestroyed 1 Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif
END

SCN DLC04MQ04ExplosionControlSCRIPT
short stage short lastStage short Explode short pause short debrisToggleSM short woodStepper short fireToggle short meshBlastToggle
float Timer float rndScale float woodTimer float fireTimer
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
if ( stage == 0 ) if ( GetStage DLC04MQ04 == 100 ) || ( GetStage DLC04MQ04 == 101 ) set Explode to 1 set stage to 1 set rndScale to .001 endif endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( Explode == 1 )
;/// First wave of small structual explosions--------------------------------------------------- if ( stage == 1 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER01.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1
DLC04ManMeshBlastREF02.enable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF03.enable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF04.enable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF05.enable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF06.enable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF07.enable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF08.enable 1
set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 2 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER02.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 3 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER03.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 4 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER04.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 5 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER05.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 6 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER06.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 7 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER07.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
DLC04HavokBranches01REF.enable 0
elseif ( stage == 8 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER08.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 9 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER09.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 10 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER10.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 11 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER11.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 12 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER12.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1
; DLC04MeshBlastPopInMARKER.enable
set Timer to rndScale * Getrandompercent set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 13 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER13.placeatme GrenadeFragExplosion 1 set Timer to .8 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// Early animation start for house parts---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 14 ) DLC04ManMeshBlastREF03.playgroup forward 1 DLC04ManExploSmMARKER07.placeatme DLC04MansionExplosionBig 1 set Timer to .1 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// SwapFront of house for blasting-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 15 ) DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREFhouse.enable 0 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF02.playgroup forward 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF04.playgroup forward 1 set meshBlastToggle to 1
set Timer to .1 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// First huge blast -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 16 ) DLC04ManExploSmMARKER07.placeAtMe DLC04MansionExplosionBig 1 DLC04ManExploSmMARKER13.placeAtMe DLC04MansionExplosionBig 1 DLC04ManExploSmMARKER11.placeAtMe DLC04MansionExplosionBig 1 DLC04ManExploSmMARKER14.placeAtMe DLC04MansionExplosionBig 1 DLC04MQ04ExplosionMarker.placeAtMe DLC04FakeMansionForceLG 1
; DLC04ManMeshBlastREF05.playgroup forward 1 ; DLC04ManMeshBlastREF06.playgroup forward 1
set Timer to .3 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// Swap mansion and yard stuff for pushing----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 17 ) DLC04MansionParentMarker.Disable 0 DLC04MansionDebris01.enable 0 Set DLC04Generic.MansionDestroyed to 1
DLC04ManFakeForceTree.disable 0 ; DLC04HavokBranches01REF.enable 0
; DLC04ManMeshBlastREF07.playgroup forward 1 ; DLC04ManMeshBlastREF08.playgroup forward 1
set Timer to .01 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// Push player and yard stuff.. swap aviary------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ elseif ( stage == 18 ) DLC04MQ04ExplosionMarker.PushActorAway Player 20 playSound FXExplosionGrenadeConcussion
DLC04ManFakeForceTree.placeatme FakeForce100r1000 1
DLC04MansionAviary01REF.disable 0 DLC04MansionAviary01dREF.enable 0
set Timer to 1.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// enable small debris ..tree swaps..mansion fires on..1st aftershock explo--------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 19 )
DLC04FXFallingDebris01REF.enable 0
DLC04ManTreeKill01MARKER.disable 0 DLC04ManTreeKill02MARKER.disable 0 DLC04ManTreeKill04MARKER.disable 0
DLC04ManInFires01MARKER.disable 0 DLC04ManInFires02MARKER.disable 0
DLC04ManInFiresTimerMARKER.disable 0 set fireTimer to 360 set fireToggle to 1
DLC04ManExploLGburnMARKER02.placeAtMe RavRockExplo01 1
set Timer to 1 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// Falling debris small animate and timer start ...and 2nd aftershock explo---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 20 )
set debrisToggleSM to 1 DLC04FXFallingDebris01REF.playgroup forward 1
DLC04ManExploLGburnMARKER01.placeAtMe RavRockExplo01 1
DLC04ManMeshBlastREF05.playgroup forward 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF06.playgroup forward 1
set Timer to 2 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// 3rd aftershock explosion------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 21 ) DLC04ManExploLGburnMARKER03.placeAtMe RavRockExplo01 1
DLC04ManMeshBlastREF07.playgroup forward 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF08.playgroup forward 1
set Timer to .7 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// 4th aftershock explosion------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 22 ) DLC04ManExploLGburnMARKER02.placeAtMe RavRockExplo01 1
set Timer to 2.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// enable first large havok debris------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ elseif ( stage == 23 ) DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF01.enable 1 DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF01.moveTo player 0, 0, 1500 set Timer to .1 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// First large havok debris drop..metal cooling aviary animation..clean up verticle blast house chunks----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 24 )
;/// wood timer result phase on set woodStepper to 1 set woodTimer to 10
DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF01.placeAtMe DLC04FakeForce10r1000 1
DLC04MansionAviary01dREF.playgroup forward 1
; DLC04ManMeshBlastREF08.disable 1 ; DLC04ManMeshBlastREF08.markfordelete
set Timer to 2 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// enable Second large havok debris------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ elseif ( stage == 25 ) DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF02.enable 1 DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF02.moveTo player 0, 0, 1500 set Timer to .1 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// Second large havok debris drop----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 26 )
DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF02.placeAtMe DLC04FakeForce10r1000 1 ;// double check all debris drop DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF01.placeAtMe DLC04FakeForce10r1000 1
set Timer to 2.5 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// enable Third large havok debris------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ elseif ( stage == 27 ) DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF03.enable 1 set Timer to .1 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
;/// Third large havok debris drop----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == 28 )
DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF03.moveTo player 0, 0, 1500 DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF03.placeAtMe DLC04FakeForce10r1000 1 ;// double check all debris drop DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF02.placeAtMe DLC04FakeForce10r1000 1
set Timer to .1 set lastStage to stage set stage to -1
elseif ( stage == 29 ) ;// double check all debris drop DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF03.placeAtMe DLC04FakeForce10r1000 1
; //advance quest SetStage DLC04MQ04 200
DLC04ManMeshBlastREF08.disable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF08.markfordelete
;/// end stages set stage to 30
;/// Loop to wait between stages---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif ( stage == -1 ) if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 set stage to ( lastStage + 1 ) endif
endif
;//Seperate statement to handle SM debris follow----------------------------------------------------------------- if ( debrisToggleSM == 1 )
if ( DLC04FXFallingDebris01REF.isAnimPlaying forward == 1 ) DLC04FXFallingDebris01REF.moveTo player 1 elseif ( DLC04FXFallingDebris01REF.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) set debrisToggleSM to 0 endif endif
;//Seperate statement to time wood disable and delete havok wood----------------------------------------------------------------- IF ( woodTimer > 0 ) set woodTimer to (woodTimer - getSecondsPassed) elseif ( woodTimer <= 0 && woodStepper == 1 ) DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREFhouse.disable 1 DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREFhouse.markForDelete set woodTimer to 10 set woodStepper to 2 elseif ( woodTimer <= 0 && woodStepper == 2 ) DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF01.disable 1 DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF01.markForDelete set woodTimer to 10 set woodStepper to 3 elseif ( woodTimer <= 0 && woodStepper == 3 ) DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF02.disable 1 DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF02.markForDelete set woodTimer to 10 set woodStepper to 4 elseif ( woodTimer <= 0 && woodStepper == 4 ) DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF03.disable 1 DLC04LargeWoodDebrisREF03.markForDelete
DLC04HavokBranches01REF.disable 1 DLC04HavokBranches01REF.markForDelete set woodStepper to 5 endif
;/// Seperate timer for fires---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if ( fireToggle == 1 ) if fireTimer > 0 set fireTimer to (fireTimer - getSecondsPassed) elseif fireTimer <= 0 DLC04ManInFiresTimerMARKER.enable 1 set fireToggle to 0 ;/// end script set Explode to -1 endif
endif
;/// Code to clean up mesh blasts if ( meshBlastToggle == 1) if ( DLC04ManMeshBlastREF02.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 ) DLC04ManMeshBlastREF02.disable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF02.markfordelete DLC04ManMeshBlastREF03.disable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF03.markfordelete DLC04ManMeshBlastREF04.disable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF04.markfordelete DLC04ManMeshBlastREF05.disable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF05.markfordelete DLC04ManMeshBlastREF06.disable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF06.markfordelete DLC04ManMeshBlastREF07.disable 1 DLC04ManMeshBlastREF07.markfordelete set meshBlastToggle to 0 endif endif
endif
END

SCN DLC04MQ04BrainContactTriggerSCRIPT

scn DLC04FF05bankAudioCaptureSCRIPT
; this script is designed to capture if the player correctly submits the audio password when prompted.
short openFF05 ; open spy box for FF05 quest. short open1191 ; open bank officer's box short open1213 ; open herb's box
float timerFF05 ; timers for the boxes float timer1191 float timer1213
float delay ; base delay value for all. May tweak per recording after dialog goes in
;===============================================================
begin onLoad
set delay to 2.0 ; change this to change the delay between audio playback and open.
end
;===============================================================
begin onTriggerEnter
; clear variables so tapes played outside the proper area won't count. Tape audios are all short so this is acceptable.
if DLC04FF05.holoplaying == 1 && getStageDone DLC04FF05 40 == 0 set DLC04FF05.holoplaying to 0 endif
if DLC04FF05.holoAlt01 == 1 && DLC04FF05.boxAlt01open == 0 set DLC04FF05.holoAlt01 to 0 endif
if DLC04FF05.holoAlt02 == 1 && DLC04FF05.boxAlt02open == 0 set DLC04FF05.holoAlt02 to 0 endif
end
;===============================================================
begin onTrigger
if DLC04FF05.holoplaying == 1 && getStageDone DLC04FF05 40 == 0 if openFF05 == 0 set openFF05 to 1 set timerFF05 to (delay) endif endif
if DLC04FF05.holoAlt01 == 1 && DLC04FF05.boxAlt01open == 0 if open1191 == 0 set open1191 to 1 set timer1191 to (delay) endif endif
if DLC04FF05.holoAlt02 == 1 && DLC04FF05.boxAlt02open == 0 if open1213 == 0 set open1213 to 1 set timer1213 to (delay) endif endif
if DLC04FF05.bankPasswordWrong == 1 ; the wrong password is being submitted. DLC04FF05IntercomREF.sayTo player DLC04FF05BankRejectingPassword set DLC04FF05.bankPasswordWrong to 0 endif
end
;===============================================================
begin gameMode
if openFF05 == 1 if timerFF05 > 0 set timerFF05 to (timerFF05 - getSecondsPassed) elseif timerFF05 <= 0 DLC04FF05IntercomREF.sayTo player DLC04FF05BankAcceptingPassword DLC04FF04BankDoorREF.playgroup forward 0 ;/open the door. set DLC04FF05.holoplaying to 0 setStage DLC04FF05 40 set openFF05 to 0 endif endif
if open1191 == 1 && DLC04FF05.boxAlt01open == 0 if timer1191 >0 set timer1191 to (timer1191 - getSecondsPassed) ;; else DLC04FF05IntercomREF.sayTo player DLC04FF05BankAcceptingPassword Box1191REF.playgroup forward 0 set DLC04FF05.holoAlt01 to 0 set DLC04FF05.boxAlt01open to 1 set open1191 to 0 rewardxp 10 endif endif
if open1213 == 1 && DLC04FF05.boxAlt02open == 0 if timer1213 >0 set timer1213 to (timer1213 - getSecondsPassed) ;; else DLC04FF05IntercomREF.sayTo player DLC04FF05BankAcceptingPassword Box1213REF.playgroup forward 0 set DLC04FF05.holoAlt02 to 0 set DLC04FF05.boxAlt02open to 1 set open1213 to 0 rewardxp 10 endif endif
end

scn DLC04FF05PasswordHolotapeSCRIPT
; simple stage setter.
begin onTriggerLeave player
if getStageDone DLC04FF05 30 != 1 if player.gethasNote DLC04FF05holoPassword > 0 setStage DLC04FF05 30 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 10 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 30 1 endif endif
end

scn DLC04MQ01SCRIPT
;Variables short NadineSearch ;How has the search for Nadine progressed? ;0 = nothing, ;1 = heard about her ;2 = Nadine has been found ;3 = Nadine heading to the ship ;9 = Nadine taken charge of ship short NadineTalk ;Has player asked Nadine to come back? short TicketVend ;Has the player had their first chance to vend for tickets? short Welcome ;Has the player been welcomed to Point Lookout by Tobar?
short QTPosition ;Used to track where the QT should point during the siege short DoOnceMessage short FormListsUpdated ;used as a doOnce float StartTimer short DogFriend ;Has Desmond given one of his dogs to the player? short ChineseRadioCheck ;Was the Chinese Radio Beacon active? short MS16RadioCheck ;Was the Vault Emergency Radio Beacon active?
BEGIN GameMode
;used to add forms to existing formlists, used primarily to add items to vendor lists and items to formlists that the animation system uses for conditions if FormListsUpdated == 0 ;adding slave clothes to wasteland gear repair list so they can be used to repair each other AddItemToLeveledList VendorChestFoodOnlyDC DLc04PungaWild 1 4 .25 AddItemToLeveledList VendorChestFoodOnlyDC DLc04PungaRefined 1 2 .25
set FormListsUpdated to 1
;Clear out problematic mirelurks DLC04Mirelurk1REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk2REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk3REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk4REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk5REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk6REF.kill endif
;If player has a boat ticket, update objectives. if GetObjectiveCompleted DLC04MQ01 30 == 0 && player.getItemCount DLC04BoatTicket > 0 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04MQ01 30 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ01 50 1 endif
; if Enclave Radio ref has been enabled, it means the player is out of the vault, which means it's time to start the quest
if ( DoOnceMessage == 0 ) if ( RadioEnclaveRef.GetDisabled == 0 ) set DoOnceMessage to 1 set StartTimer to 30 elseif ( GetStage MQ09 >= 60 ) Set DoOnceMessage to 1 Set StartTimer to 30 endif
elseif ( DoOnceMessage == 1 ) if ( StartTimer <= 0 ) SetStage DLC04MQ01 10 Set DoOnceMessage to -1 else set StartTimer to ( StartTimer - GetSecondsPassed ) endif
endif
if GetStageDone DLC04MQ01 50 == 0
if player.GetItemCount DLC04BoatTicket > 0 setStage DLC04MQ01 50 endif
endif
DLC04Mirelurk1REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk2REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk3REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk4REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk5REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk6REF.kill
END

scn DLC04MQ02SCRIPT
short GateSpeech ;The style of the Cathedral gatekeeper's speech: 0 = "mystical", 1 = "deflated"

scn DLC04MQ03SCRIPT
short LeaderLocation ;Does the player know Jackson is at the sea cave? short TribalTrust ;Has the player gotten the tribals' trust by turning in "proof" of Desmond's death? short BrainResponse ;Attitude of the brain when he first talks to you. 0 = noticed, 1 = you killed Jackson, 2 = already talked to you short BrainGreet ;Is the brain ready to greet the player? 0 = no, 1 = yes, 2 = done short JacksonGreet
short Timer
BEGIN Gamemode
if GetStage DLC04MQ03 == 130
if DLC04JacksonREF.getInCell DLC04SeaCave == 0 setStage DLC04MQ03 150
elseif DLC04JacksonREF.getDead == 1 setStage DLC04MQ03 155
endif
if DLC04JacksonREF.getDetected player && DLC04JacksonREF.getiscurrentpackage DLC04JacksonTalkPlayer == 0 DLC04JacksonREF.addScriptPackage DLC04JacksonTalkPlayer endif
if BrainGreet == 1
if player.getDistance DLC04TheBrainHoloREF < 200 DLC04TheBrainHoloREF.activate player set DLC04MQ03.BrainGreet to 2 endif
endif
endif
END

SCN DLC04TheBrainNPCSCRIPT
short BrainTalkOffer short BrainTalkOfferHold short BraintTalkOfferOver
short BrainTalkJammerDestroyed short BrainTalkJammerDestroyedHold short BrainTalkJammerDestroyedOver
short BrainTalkJammerInstalled short BrainTalkJammerInstalledHold short BrainTalkJammerInstalledOver
short LineCount
float Timer
BEGIN GameMode
if ( BrainTalkOffer == 1 ) if ( Timer > 0 ) Set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed ) elseif ( Timer <= 0 ) if ( BrainTalkOfferHold == 0 ) if ( BraintTalkOfferOver == 0 ) DLC04TheBrainBoardwalkREF.Say DLC04BrainTalkPlayer 1 DLC04TheBrainNPC 1 DLC04MQ04BrainContactControlREF.say DLC04BrainTalkPlayer 1 DLC04TheBrainNPC 1 Set BrainTalkOfferHold to 1 Set LineCount to ( LineCount + 1) Set Timer to 3 endif endif endif endif
if ( BrainTalkJammerDestroyed == 1 ) if ( Timer > 0 ) Set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed ) elseif ( Timer <= 0 ) if ( BrainTalkJammerDestroyedHold == 0 ) if ( BrainTalkJammerDestroyedOver == 0 ) DLC04TheBrainBoardwalkREF.Say DLC04BrainTalkPlayer2 1 DLC04TheBrainNPC 1 DLC04MQ04BrainContactControlREF.say DLC04BrainTalkPlayer2 1 DLC04TheBrainNPC 1 Set BrainTalkJammerDestroyedHold to 1 Set LineCount to ( LineCount + 1) Set Timer to 3 endif endif endif endif
if ( BrainTalkJammerInstalled == 1 ) if ( Timer > 0 ) Set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed ) elseif ( Timer <= 0 ) if ( BrainTalkJammerInstalledHold == 0 ) if ( BrainTalkJammerInstalledOver == 0 ) DLC04TheBrainBoardwalkREF.Say DLC04BrainTalkPlayer3 1 DLC04TheBrainNPC 1 DLC04MQ04BrainContactControlREF.Say DLC04BrainTalkPlayer3 1 DLC04TheBrainNPC 1 Set BrainTalkJammerInstalledHold to 1 Set LineCount to ( LineCount + 1) Set Timer to 3 endif endif endif endif
END
BEGIN SayToDone DLC04BrainTalkPlayer
Set DLC04TheBrainBoardwalkREF.BrainTalkOfferHold to 0
END
BEGIN SayToDone DLC04BrainTalkPlayer2
Set DLC04TheBrainBoardwalkREF.BrainTalkJammerDestroyedHold to 0
END
BEGIN SayToDone DLC04BrainTalkPlayer3
Set DLC04TheBrainBoardwalkREF.BrainTalkJammerInstalledHold to 0
END
BEGIN OnActivate
END

scn DLC04FF05sunkenSatelliteSCRIPT
short button short active short done
;=========================================================================
begin onActivate player
if DLC04FF05.selfDestructInitiated == 0 && active == 0 showMessage DLC04FF05sunkenSubMSG01 set active to 1 endif
end
;=========================================================================
begin gameMode
; | message handling | ; V block here V
if active == 1 set button to getButtonPressed
if button > -1 if button == 0 ; leaving it alone elseif button == 1 ; I'ma blow this sum up setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 61 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 62 1 set DLC04FF05.selfDestructInitiated to 1 set DLC04FF05.timer to 10 endif
set active to 0
endif endif
end
;=========================================================================

SCN DLC04TheBrainSCRIPT
short GeneratorDestroyedCount short Explode short DoOnce short BrainIsDead
short BrainHatesPlayer short BrainIsDead
float Timer
;// phil's vars short fightState short state1Once short state2Once short state3Once short stopMusic short destroyOnce
;// stupid hack variable float brainDropTimer short brainDropStart
;////Mark's vars short stepper short deathStepper ref tempFXRef float deadTimer
BEGIN ONLOAD
set state1Once to 0 set state2Once to 0 set state3Once to 0
END
BEGIN OnHitWith
if ( DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget == 0 ) Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 2 endif
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( BrainHatesPlayer == 0 ) activate else Say Greeting endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
;/////////Controls who player chooses to kill////////////
if ( DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget == 1 ) && ( DLC04MQ05DoorTrigger01REF.DoorEntered == 1 ) if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 100 == 1 ) || ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 75 == 1 ) if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 180 == 0 ) && ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05a == 1 ) SetStage DLC04MQ05b 101 DLC04TheBrainRef.SetDestroyed 1 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to -1 endif endif
if ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05b == 1 ) SetStage DLC04MQ05b 125 DLC04TheBrainRef.SetDestroyed 1 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to -1 endif
elseif ( DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget == 2 ) && ( DLC04MQ05DoorTrigger01REF.DoorEntered == 1 ) if ( BrainIsDead == 0 ) if ( BrainHatesPlayer == 0 ) DLC04TheBrainREF.SayTo Player DLC04MQ05BrainUnderAttack 1 1 endif
Set BrainHatesPlayer to 1
Player.SCAOnActor SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction DLC04DesmondFaction
if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 102 == 0 ) && ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 175 == 0 ) && ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05a == 1 ) && ( DLC04DesmondREF.GetDead == 0 ) if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 175 == 0 ) SetEssential DLC04Desmond 1 endif
SetStage DLC04MQ05a 102 endif
if ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05b == 1 ) && ( GetStage DLC04MQ05b != 125 ) if ( DLC04DesmondREF.GetDead == 0 ) SetEssential DLC04Desmond 1 endif
Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to -1 SetStage DLC04MQ05b 175 endif endif endif
;/////////Marks fx stages and death FX******************************
;first added fx stage enable ...do once IF ( getDestructionStage >= 1 && getDestructionStage < 7 && stepper == 0 ) DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage1Marker.enable set stepper to 1
ENDIF
;Second added fx stage enable ...do once IF ( getDestructionStage >= 2 && getDestructionStage < 7 && stepper == 1 ) DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage2Marker.enable set stepper to 2
ENDIF
;Third added fx stage enable ...do once IF ( getDestructionStage >= 3 && getDestructionStage < 7 && stepper == 2 ) DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage3Marker.enable set stepper to 3
ENDIF
;Third added fx stage enable ...do once IF ( getDestructionStage >= 4 && getDestructionStage < 7 && stepper == 3 ) DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage4Marker.enable set stepper to 4
ENDIF
;Third added fx stage enable ...do once IF ( getDestructionStage >= 5 && getDestructionStage < 7 && stepper == 4 ) DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage5Marker.enable set stepper to 5
ENDIF
;Third added fx stage enable ...do once IF ( getDestructionStage >= 6 && getDestructionStage < 7 && stepper == 5 ) DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage6Marker.enable set stepper to 6
ENDIF
;if it is dead this will play the fx file once. IF ( getDestructionStage >= 7 && destroyOnce == 0 ) DLC04TheBrainREF.placeatme DLC04BrainPodDeathExplodeFX 1 DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage1Marker.disable DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage2Marker.disable DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage3Marker.disable DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage4Marker.disable DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage5Marker.disable DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage6Marker.disable set destroyOnce to 1
;// start the fake brain and enable death switch to no havok object DLC04LabLooseBrain.enable 0 set brainDropTimer to 1.2 set brainDropStart to 1 set deathStepper to 1 set deadTimer to 60
;// turn off the sounds DLC04BrainSoundA.disable DLC04BrainSoundB.disable DLC04BrainSoundC.disable DLC04BrainSoundD.disable
;play after death fx for rest of room life DLC04labBrainDeathWaterFXStage7Marker.enable
set Explode to 1 set Timer to 5
set stepper to 7
ENDIF
;// wait a short amount of time and drop the brain again just in case IF ( brainDropStart == 1 ) IF ( brainDropTimer > 0 ) set brainDropTimer to brainDropTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE DLC04BrainExplosionXMRK.placeAtMe fakeMediumExplosion 1 set brainDropStart to 2 ENDIF
ENDIF
;// timed from the brain drop start...wait then swap brain tube out for no havok brain tube. IF ( deathStepper >= 1 ) set deadTimer to deadTimer - getSecondsPassed IF ( deadTimer <= .5 && deathStepper == 1) DLC04BrainPodDeadREF.enable 1 set deathStepper to 2 ELSEIF ( deadTimer <= 0 && deathStepper == 2) set deathStepper to 0 disable 1 ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////***************************************************************
if ( Explode > 0 ) set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 4 ) && ( Explode == 1 ) DLC04TheBrainREF.SayTo Player DLC04MQ05BrainDeath 1 1 Set BrainIsDead to 1 set Explode to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 2 ) && ( Explode == 2 ) SetDestroyed 1 set Explode to 3 endif
if ( Timer <= 0 ) && ( Explode == 3 ) ;Sets proper end stage for MQ05a, based on if Desmond is alive or dead.
if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05a 150 == 1 ) SetStage DLC04MQ05a 201 elseif ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05a == 1 ) SetStage DLC04MQ05a 200 endif
;///Sets proper end stage for MQ05b, based on if Desmond is alive or dead.
if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05b 150 == 1 ) ;///If Desmond is dead. SetStage DLC04MQ05b 201 elseif ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05b == 1 ) ;///If Desmond is alive. SetStage DLC04MQ05b 185 endif
DLC04MQ05BrainDoor.Unlock DLC04MQ05BrainDoor02.Unlock DLC04MQ05RewardDoor.Unlock DLC04MQ05LabFrontDoor.Unlock DLC04LabRoundRoomDoorA.Unlock DLC04LabRoundRoomDoorB.Unlock DLC04LabRoundRoomDoorC.Unlock DLC04LabRoundRoomSideDoor.Unlock set BrainIsDead to 1 set Explode to -1 endif endif
;//============ ;// PHIL'S STUFF ;//============
;/////////// ;// manually cue the combat music ;///////////
IF ( stopMusic == 0 ) IF ( getDestructionStage >= 1 && getDestructionStage < 7 ) playMusic defaultBattle DLC04MQ05AlarmMarker.Disable
ELSEIF ( getDestructionStage == 7 ) playMusic defaultExplore set stopMusic to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
;/////////// ;// activate the waves as the brain takes damage ;/////////// IF ( getDestructionStage >= 1 && fightState == 0 ) set fightState to 1
ELSEIF ( getDestructionStage >= 4 || fightState == 1 ) set fightState to 2
ELSEIF ( getDestructionStage >= 6 && fightState == 2 ) set fightState to 3 ENDIF
;/////// ;// the first wave of protectrons ;/////// IF ( fightState == 1 && state1Once == 0 ) set state1Once to 1
;// spawn them in the appropriate area IF ( DLC04LabBossBottomFloorCheck.getDisabled == 1 ) DLC04LabProtectronFinalA.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronFinalA.setUnconscious 0 DLC04LabProtectronFinalE.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronFinalE.setUnconscious 0 ELSE DLC04LabProtectronTopFinalA.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronTopFinalA.setUnconscious 0 DLC04LabProtectronTopFinalB.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronTopFinalB.setUnconscious 0 ENDIF
ENDIF
;/////// ;// the second wave of protectrons ;/////// IF ( fightState == 2 && state2Once == 0 ) set state2Once to 1
;// spawn them in the appropriate area IF ( DLC04LabBossBottomFloorCheck.getDisabled == 1 ) DLC04LabProtectronFinalB.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronFinalB.setUnconscious 0 DLC04LabProtectronFinalC.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronFinalC.setUnconscious 0 ELSE DLC04LabProtectronTopFinalC.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronTopFinalC.setUnconscious 0 DLC04LabProtectronTopFinalD.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronTopFinalD.setUnconscious 0 ENDIF
ENDIF
;/////// ;// the final wave ;/////// IF ( fightState == 3 && state3Once == 0 )
;// spawn a robobrain last IF ( DLC04LabBossBottomFloorCheck.getDisabled == 1 ) DLC04LabProtectronFinalD.setAV variable01 1 DLC04LabProtectronFinalD.setUnconscious 0 DLC04BrainBossRobobrainBottom.enable 0 ELSE DLC04BrainBossRobobrainTop.enable 0 ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC04CapitalDuchessTravelActivatorSCRIPT
short PlayerTravel short DoOnce float Timer short Button
BEGIN OnLoad
DLC04Mirelurk1REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk2REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk3REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk4REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk5REF.kill DLC04Mirelurk6REF.kill
END
BEGIN OnActivate
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1) if player.getItemCount DLC04BoatTicket > 0 || DLC04MQ01.NadineSearch == 9
;If the player is in the Wasteland if player.getInWorldspace DLC4Pointlookout == 0 ShowMessage DLC04DuchessToPointMessage else ;If the player is in Point Lookout ShowMessage DLC04DuchessToWastelandMessage endif else ShowMessage DLC04DuchessNoTravel endif endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( PlayerTravel < 1 ) && ( GetButtonPressed == 1 ) set PlayerTravel to 1 set Timer to 5 DisablePlayerControls 1 1 0 0 0 0 IMod DLC04FadeToBlack endif
if ( PlayerTravel == 1 ) set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed

if ( Followers.CloverHired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.CloverHired to 0 set Followers.CloverFired to 1 set CloverREF.Waiting to 0 set CloverREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set CloverREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set CloverREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 CloverREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set CloverREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set CloverREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 CloverREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 CloverREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction CloverREF.evp

if ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired to 0 set Followers.StarPaladinCrossFired to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.Waiting to 0 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set StarPaladinCrossREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction StarPaladinCrossREF.evp

PipBoyRadioOff

EnablePlayerControls

END

else Activate endif

scn DLC04PungaSeedPodSCRIPT
short DoOnce short TimerCheck short PushOnce short SprayOnce float Timer
;// image space apply short imageSpaceApplyOnce short imageSpaceApply short imageSpaceTimerInit float imageSpaceTimer
BEGIN OnActivate
if DoOnce == 0 && getStage DLC04MQ02 == 50 setStage DLC04MQ02 150 set DoOnce to 1 DLC04PungaSeedPodREF.activate player else
showMessage DLC04NoPodMessage
endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if DoOnce == 1 && TimerCheck == 0 set TimerCheck to 1 set Timer to 14.6
;Play first effect, spraying the player DLC04BogPlantSpray0.enable 0 DLC04BogPlantSpray1.enable 0 DLC04BogPlantSpray2.enable 0 DLC04BogPlantSpray3.enable 0 DLC04BogPlantSpray4.enable 0 DLC04BogPlantSpray5.enable 0
;// the spray noise playSound3D AMBDLC04PungaSpray
DLC04PungaSprayFXmarker.enable
endif
if TimerCheck == 1 set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
IF ( timer < 14 && SprayOnce == 0 ) playSound AMBDLC04PungaSprayRinging set SprayOnce to 1 ENDIF
;make player cough and fall if (Timer <= 12.6) && SprayOnce == 1 set SprayOnce to 2 DLC04PungaSprayFXmarker.disable
DLC04BogPlantSpray0.disable DLC04BogPlantSpray1.disable DLC04BogPlantSpray2.disable DLC04BogPlantSpray3.disable DLC04BogPlantSpray4.disable DLC04BogPlantSpray5.disable
endif
IF ( timer < 9.5 && SprayOnce == 2 ) playSound AMBDLC04PungaSprayBodyFall set SprayOnce to 3 ENDIF
;player get up if (Timer < 0) DLC04PungaSeedPodREF.disable enablePlayerControls player.restoreAV radiationrads 2000
;// start the ISFX IF imageSpaceApplyOnce == 0 set imageSpaceApply to 1 set imageSpaceApplyOnce to 1 ENDIF
set TimerCheck to 0 set DoOnce to 2 endif
endif
;///////////////////////////// ;// The imagespace gets applied here ;///////////////////////////// IF imageSpaceApply == 1
;// init the timer and apply the transition IF imageSpaceTimerInit == 0 set imageSpaceTimer to 3.99 set imageSpaceTimerInit to 1 ApplyIMageSpaceModifier DLC04HallucinationStage01Trans ENDIF
;// countdown to application of the real imagespace IF imageSpaceTimer > 0 set imageSpaceTimer to imageSpaceTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE ApplyIMageSpaceModifier DLC04HallucinationStage01 set imageSpaceApply to 2 ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC04FF06SCRIPT
short basicsTop short bodyCount
short eventStarted

scn DLC04FF06ghoulSCRIPT

set DLC04FF06.bodyCount to (DLC04FF06.bodyCount + 1)
end
begin gameMode
if DLC04FF06.cleanupFlag== 1 markforDelete endif
end

scn DLC04FF06startButtonSCRIPT
short arenaActive
short initArena
short wave1 short wave2 short wave3 short wave4 short complete ;==========================================================;
begin onActivate player
if arenaActive == 0 && DLC04FF06.eventStarted == 1 DLC04FF06hostREF.getDead == 0 ; state handling set arenaActive to 1
if getStageDone DLC04FF06 100 == 0 ; BUG? this was set to check against 1, not 0... setStage DLC04FF06 51 endif
; close the arena door, open the zoo door DLC04FF06ArenaDoorREF.lock 255 GhoulJailDoorREF.setOpenState 3
; move Plik out of the arena, just in case. DLC04FF06HostREF.moveto DLC04FF06hostMarkerREF
; turn on lights to make obvious the hunt is on arenaKlaxon01.playgroup left 0 arenaKlaxonglow02.playgroup left 0 arenaKlaxon02.playgroup left 0 arenaKlaxonglow02.playgroup left 0 DLC04FF06klaxonSFX.enable
; get rid of the ghoul zoo. PassiveGhoul01.disable PassiveGhoul02.disable PassiveGhoul03.disable DLC04FF06GhoulCageWallREF.disable
; send out our first set of spawns CaveSpawn01.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 2 CaveSpawn02.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 3 CaveSpawn03.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1
elseif arenaActive == 1 && DLC04FF06hostREF.getDead == 1 ; show message that PLIK IS DEAD. =p ;showMessage DLC04FF06PlikDeathMSG endif endif
end
;==========================================================;
begin gameMode
if arenaActive == 1
if initArena == 0 set wave1 to 0 set wave2 to 0 set wave3 to 0 set wave4 to 0 set complete to 0 set initArena to 1 endif
if wave1 == 0 if DLC04FF06.bodyCount >= 5 ; only one left from wave #0 CaveSpawn01.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 2 ; spawn five more. CaveSpawn02.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 CaveSpawn03.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 2 set wave1 to 1 endif endif
if wave2 == 0 if DLC04FF06.bodyCount >= 9 ; only one left from wave #1 CaveSpawn01.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 ; spawn five more. CaveSpawn02.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 2 CaveSpawn03.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 CaveSpawn04.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 set wave2 to 1 endif endif
if wave3 == 0 if DLC04FF06.bodyCount >= 14 ; only one left from wave #2 CaveSpawn01.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 ; spawn five more. CaveSpawn02.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 CaveSpawn03.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 CaveSpawn04.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 2 set wave3 to 1 endif endif
if wave4 == 0 if DLC04FF06.bodyCount >= 19 ; only one left from wave #3 CaveSpawn01.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 2 ; spawn five more. CaveSpawn02.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 CaveSpawn03.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 CaveSpawn04.placeatme DLC04FF06Ghoul01 1 set wave4 to 1 endif endif
if complete == 0 if DLC04FF06.bodyCount >= 26 ; got 'em all! set arenaActive to 0 set initArena to 0 set complete to 1 set DLC04FF06.eventStarted to 0
set DLC04FF06.dayLastPlayed to (gameDaysPassed) ; mark the calendar. This is the last time we played it.
arenaKlaxon01.playgroup backward 0 arenaKlaxon02.playgroup backward 0 arenaKlaxonglow01.playgroup backward 0 arenaKlaxonglow02.playgroup backward 0 DLC04FF06klaxonSFX.disable
DLC04FF06ArenaDoorREF.unlock
set DLC04FF06.arenaReady to 0 ; mark the arena as needing cleanup
if getStageDone DLC04FF06 100 == 0 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF06 51 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF06 70 1 setStage DLC04FF06 70 endif endif endif endif
end

if DLC04FF02.obadiahRitual == 1 && active == 0 set active to 1 set timer to 39 endif
if active == 1 if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) else setStage DLC04FF02 100 endif endif
end

scn DLC04BogNukaQuantumSCRIPT
;// only nudgeOnce short nudgeOnce
;// puffout timer float puffTimer short puffTimerOnce
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// only do this if we're enabled IF getDisabled != 1
;// if the player is within 1250 units and we havent dropped, drop IF getDistance player < 1250 && nudgeOnce == 0 set nudgeOnce to 1 placeAtMe FakeForceBallNudge 1
;// if the player gets within 512 units, disable us ELSEIF getDistance player < 512 && nudgeOnce == 1 set nudgeOnce to 2 pms PuffOfSmokeVanish ELSEIF nudgeOnce == 2
IF puffTimerOnce == 0 set puffTimerOnce to 1 set puffTimer to 0.17 placeAtMe DLC04BabyNukeFake01 1 playSound3D FXBulletImpactGlass ENDIF
IF puffTimer > 0 set puffTimer to puffTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE disable set nudgeOnce to 3 ENDIF
ENDIF
ENDIF
END
