if ( Followers.FawkesHired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.FawkesHired to 0 set Followers.FawkesFired to 1 set MQ08FawkesREF.Waiting to 0 set MQ08FawkesREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set MQ08FawkesREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set MQ08FawkesREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 MQ08FawkesREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set MQ08FawkesREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set MQ08FawkesREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 MQ08FawkesREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 MQ08FawkesREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction MQ08FawkesREF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveFawkes MQ08FawkesREF.MoveTo FawkesMuseumWaitMarker set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif
if ( Followers.RL3Hired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.RL3Hired to 0 set Followers.RL3Fired to 1 set RL3REF.Waiting to 0 set RL3REF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set RL3REF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set RL3REF.IsFollowingShort to 0 RL3REF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set RL3REF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set RL3REF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 RL3REF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 RL3REF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction RL3REF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveRL3 RL3REF.MoveTo CCBazaarMarker set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif
if ( Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired == 1 ) set Followers.PlayerHasFollower to 0 set Followers.StarPaladinCrossHired to 0 set Followers.StarPaladinCrossFired to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.Waiting to 0 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 set StarPaladinCrossREF.IsFollowingShort to 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set StarPaladinCrossREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set StarPaladinCrossREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 StarPaladinCrossREF.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction StarPaladinCrossREF.evp
ShowMessage FollowerMessageLeaveStarPaladinCross StarPaladinCrossREF.MoveTo CitScribeMarker04 set Followers.FollowerWaitingLeaveDay to 0 endif
;==Disable Wasteland radio stations==
;check stage in MQ09; if player hasn't left yet, enable radio again ;otherwise check RRDestroy var
if ( GetStage MQ09 < 60 ) RadioEnclaveRef.Enable else if ( MQ09.RRDestroy == 0 ) RadioEnclaveRef.Enable endif endif
;check whether player did MQ02 or not, and enable the proper ref
if ( GNRDishDone == 0 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef01.Enable elseif ( GNRDishDone == 1 ) RadioGalaxyNewsRef02.Enable endif
;Re-enable Agatha's station if that was running prior to entering the sim
if ( GetStageDone MS17 100 == 1 ) MS17RadioRef.Enable endif
;Re-enable Chinese radio beacon, if it was active
if (DLC04MQ01.ChineseRadioCheck == 1) FFEU07RadioBeaconREF.enable endif
;Re-enable Vault emergency beacond if it was active
if (DLC04MQ01.MS16RadioCheck == 1) MS16Vault101ExternalRadioREF.enable endif
;==Move Player and Tobar==
if ( GameMonth < 12 ) Set GameMonth to ( GameMonth + 1 ) elseif ( GameMonth == 12 ) Set GameMonth to 1 endif
;Remove headscar, if player still has it if player.getitemcount DLC04Headscar > 0 player.unequipitem DLC04Headscar 1 1 player.removeitem DLC04Headscar 1 endif
PLSteamboatEngineDoor.disable
IMod DLC04FadeInFromBlackSFX EnablePlayerControls
player.moveto DLC04CapitalLandingMarkerREF
if DLC04MQ01.NadineSearch < 4 DLC04TobarREF.moveto DLC04WastelandTobarMarker else DLC04NadineREF.moveto DLC04WastelandTobarMarker endif DLC04PLBoatCont2REF.RemoveAllItems DLC04CBoatCont2REF player.removeItem DLC04BoatTicket 1 SetStage Doctors 10 set PlayerTravel to 0 endif endif
END

scn DLC04ManBaseFloorHoleSCRIPT

Begin onTriggerEnter Player if doOnceA == 0 DLC04ManDoorBeforeBreakREF.SetOpenState 0 imod DLC04ManFallThroughFloorISFX DLC04ManFallClearBoards01REF.PlaceAtMe FakeForce100r100 DLC04ManFallClearBoards02REF.PlaceAtMe FakeForce100r100 DLC04ManSideDoor02BeforeEnablerREF.Enable DLC04ManSideDoor02REF.Disable DLC04ManSideDoor02bREF.Enable DLC04SideDoubleDoor02REF.Enable DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aDoor.Disable DLC04SideDoubleDoor02BEFOREEnablerREF.Enable DLC04EastWingFirstDoor.SetOpenState 0 DLC04EastWingFirstDoor.Lock 255 DLC04ManUpperFrontRightFirstBoardsREF.Enable DLC04ManLeftBottomFrontDoorBcaseREF.disable DLC04ManStage02BookcaseMoveREF.enable
set timer to 9 set DLC04ManDoorBeforeBreakREF.doOnceB to 1
if (Player.GetAnimAction == 9) EnablePlayerControls set timer to .5 else Player.AddScriptPackage DLC04ManPlayerFallPackage endif
set doOnceA to 1 set doOnceC to 1 endif End
BEGIN GameMode

scn DLC04LvlManTribalRunBySCRIPT
ref mySelf
begin OnLoad
set mySelf to GetSelf
end
begin GameMode
if (myself.getav Variable05 == 1) myself.disable endif
end
;!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ;This needs to be placed on any combatant actor in Point Lookout that gets his inventory from leveled lists
;if actor has nonPlayable weapon (needed to add damage effect) ;1) give him a playable version when he dies ;2) take away the nonPlayable version when the player loots the playable version
short hasBat short hasBBGun short hasHuntingRifle short hasCombatKnife short hasKnife short hasLeadPipe short hasTireIron
short deadCheckInventory
Begin OnLoad
if getItemCount DLC04WeapBaseballBatNonPlayable >= 1 set hasBat to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapBBGunNonPlayable >= 1 set hasBBGun to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapHuntingRifleNonPlayable >= 1 set hasHuntingRifle to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapKnifeCombatNonPlayable >= 1 set hasCombatKnife to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapKnifeNonPlayable >= 1 set hasKnife to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapLeadPipeNonPlayable >= 1 set hasLeadPipe to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapTireIronNonPlayable >= 1 set hasTireIron to 1 endif
End
Begin onDeath
set deadCheckInventory to 1
if hasBat == 1 additem CondBaseballBatNPC 1 endif
if hasBBGun == 1 additem CondBBGunNPC 1 endif
if hasHuntingRifle == 1 additem CondHuntingRifleNPCDC 1 endif
if hasCombatKnife == 1 additem CondKnifeCombatNPC 1 endif
if hasKnife == 1 additem CondKnifeNPC 1 endif
if hasLeadPipe == 1 additem CondLeadPipeNPC 1 endif
if hasTireIron == 1 additem CondTireIronNPC 1 endif
End
Begin MenuMode
if deadCheckInventory == 1
if hasBat == 1 if getItemCount WeapBaseballBat == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapBaseballBatNonPlayable 9999 set hasBat to -1 endif endif
if hasBBGun == 1 if getItemCount WeapBBGun == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapBBGunNonPlayable 9999 set hasBBGun to -1 endif endif
if hasHuntingRifle == 1 if getItemCount WeapHuntingRifleCollector == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapHuntingRifleNonPlayable 9999 set hasHuntingRifle to -1 endif endif
if hasCombatKnife == 1 if getItemCount WeapKnifeCombat == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapKnifeCombatNonPlayable 9999 set hasCombatKnife to -1 endif endif
if hasKnife == 1 if getItemCount WeapKnife == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapKnifeNonPlayable 9999 set hasKnife to -1 endif endif
if hasLeadPipe == 1 if getItemCount WeapLeadPipe == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapLeadPipeNonPlayable 9999 set hasLeadPipe to -1 endif endif
if hasTireIron == 1 if getItemCount WeapTireIron == 0 removeItem DLC04WeapTireIronNonPlayable 9999 set hasTireIron to -1 endif endif
endif
End

scn DLC04ManDoorPreBreakSCRIPT
short doOnce short doOnceB short doOnceC short breakNow
float timer
Begin OnLoad
if (doOnceC == 0) set timer to 5 set doOnceC to 1 endif
End
Begin GameMode
if (doOnceB == 1) if (timer <= 0) ;--------------Mark's NOTE I moved this sound into the fx file that plays below. ; DLC04ManAxeDoorSoundREF.PlaySound WPNBlockWood ; Marks fx--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- placeatme DLC04DoorImpact 1 ; Marks fx--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set timer to 1 + 0.02 * GetRandompercent else set timer to timer - getSecondsPassed endif endif
if (doOnce == 0) if (GetDistance Player < 400) set breakNow to 1 DLC04ManAxeDoorSoundREF.PlaySound WPNBlockWood DLC04ManAxeDoorSoundREF.PlaySound FXMeleeSledgeWood set doOnceB to 2 set doOnce to 1 endif endif
if (breakNow == 1) DLC04ManDoorAfterBreakREF.Enable 0 ; Marks fx--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;DLC04ManDoorSmashMarker01.enable DLC04ManDoorSmashMarker01.placeatme DLC04ManAxeDoorExplosion 1 ; Marks fx--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DLC04LvlManTribalBreakDoorREF.SetAV Variable05 1 DLC04LvlManTribalBreakDoorREF.EVP DLC04LvlManTribalBaseAmbush01REF.enable 0 DLC04LvlManTribalBaseAmbush02REF.enable 0 ;DLC04ManTribalThroughWall02REF.enable 0 DLC04ManTribalThroughWall02REF.saa 0 set breakNow to 0 Disable endif
End

if ( IsActionRef DLC04DesmondREF == 1 ) if ( DoOnce == 0 ) if ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05a == 1 ) DLC04DesmondREF.SayTo Player DLC04MQ05aDesmondTalkPlayer 1 1 DLC04MQ05BrainDoor02.SetOpenState 1 DLC04MQ05BrainDoor02.Unlock
Set DoOnce to 1 endif
if ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ05b 100 == 1 ) DLC04DesmondREF.SayTo Player DLC04MQ05aDesmondTalkPlayer 1 1 DLC04MQ05BrainDoor02.SetOpenState 1 DLC04MQ05BrainDoor02.Unlock
Set DoOnce to 1
else DLC04MQ05BrainDoor02.SetOpenState 1 DLC04MQ05BrainDoor02.Unlock

Set DoOnce to 1 endif endif endif
END

scn DLC04BogHallucTriggerCorpsePopSCRIPT
short corpse0 short corpse1 short corpse2 short corpse3 short corpse4

short corpseStart

;// turn on the bobbleheads DLC04BogBobbleCHAREF.enable 0 DLC04BogBobbleSTRREF.enable 0 DLC04BogBobbleENDREF.enable 0 DLC04BogBobbleINTREF.enable 0 DLC04BogBobbleheadString.enable 0
;// disable the triggers DLC04BogSpawn05.enable DLC04BogSpawn10.enable DLC04BogSpawn15.enable DLC04BogSpawn20.enable DLC04BogSpawn25.enable DLC04BogSpawn30.enable DLC04BogSpawn35.enable

scn DLC04BogHallucTriggerNeedlesSCRIPT
short needleStart
;// the needle timer float needleTimer short needleTimerInit
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
IF ( needleStart == 0 ) set needleStart to 1 DLC04BogNeedle0.enable DLC04BogNeedle0.playgroup forward 0 ENDIF
;// enlargen the monumentia! DLC04BogWashMonument.setScale 0.75
;// turn on the int and luck bubbleheads DLC04BogBobbleINTREF.enable DLC04BogBobbleLCKREF.enable
;//Mark enable ground stitches DLC04GroundStitchesENABLER.enable
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( needleStart >= 1 )
IF ( needleTimerInit == 0 ) set needleTimerInit to 1 set needleTimer to 15 set needleStart to 2 ENDIF
IF ( needleTimer > 0 ) set needleTimer to needleTimer - getSecondsPassed
IF ( needleStart == 2 && needleTimer < 12 ) DLC04BogNeedle1.playgroup forward 0 set needleStart to 3 ENDIF
IF ( needleStart == 3 && needleTimer < 9 ) DLC04BogNeedle2.playgroup forward 0 set needleStart to 4 ENDIF
IF ( needleStart == 4 && needleTimer < 6 ) DLC04BogNeedle3.playgroup forward 0 set needleStart to 5 ENDIF
IF ( needleStart == 5 && needleTimer < 3 ) DLC04BogNeedle4.playgroup forward 0 set needleStart to 6 ENDIF
ELSE DLC04BogNeedle5.playgroup forward 0
ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC04TriggerFlashBulbSCRIPT ; ;This checks to see if the player is looking at the camera while the player is in the trigger box. ;If so, then it takes a picture of the player ;====================
ref LinkedRef int inTrigger int doOnce int init
float distanceToMove
float deltaX float deltaY float deltaZ
float currentX float currentY float currentZ
float startX float startY float startZ
begin onLoad if init == 0 set distancetoMove to 10 set init to 1 set linkedRef to GetLinkedRef set startX to linkedRef.GetPos X set startY to linkedRef.GetPos Y set startZ to linkedRef.GetPos Z endif end
begin OnTriggerEnter Player set inTrigger to 1 end
begin OnTriggerLeave Player set inTrigger to 0 Dlc04PitchTrapREF.activate DLC04TriggerFlashREF 1 end
begin GameMode if inTrigger == 1 && doOnce == 0 if player.GetLOS linkedRef
set currentX to linkedRef.GetPos X set currentY to linkedRef.GetPos Y set currentZ to linkedRef.GetPos Z
set deltaX to currentX - startX set deltaY to currentY - startY set deltaZ to currentZ - startZ
if (abs deltaX) < distanceToMove && (abs deltaY) < distanceToMove && (abs deltaZ) < distanceToMove
linkedRef.placeatme DLC04FlashBulbExplosion Dlc04PitchTrapREF.activate DLC04TriggerFlashREF 1 endif
set doOnce to 1 endif endif
end

scn DLC04TriggerBarrelsSCRIPT ; ;This does damage to barrel, and then helps the explosion with some extra push ; ;====================
int forcecount
begin OnTriggerEnter Player DLC04MineBarrelREF.do 5 end begin GameMode if DLC04MineBarrelREF.getDestroyed == 1 if forceCount < 10 BombWithBarrels.placeatme DLC04FakeForce700r400 set forcecount to forcecount + 1 endif endif
end

scn DLC04TRAPPitchingMachineScript
;This script runs the pitching machine.
short skillPassed ;check to see if the player has activated the trap. 1=activated, 0=not activated short button ;0 = disarm, 1 = don't disarm short isArmed short isFiring short rewardXPOnce short XPForDisarm float fireInterval short ballcount short windUp ;check to see if it is starting up
short init
;========================================
begin onLoad
if init == 0 setStage NQlvl 1 set skillPassed to 0 set isFiring to 0 set isArmed to 1 set ballcount to 12 ;number of balls to shoot -12 set fireInterval to 0.50 ;about 20 frames set init to 1 endif
end
;========================================
;========================================
begin onActivate
if isArmed == 1 if getActionRef == player if player.getAV repair >= NQlvl.TRAPPitchingSkillReq ;This var is set when the NQlvl stage is set to 1 ShowMessage TrapPitchingDetectMsg ;do you want to take the grenades? set skillPassed to 1; else ShowMessage TrapLowSkillRepairMsg NQlvl.TRAPPitchingSkillReq endif else set isFiring to 1 set isArmed to 0 playgroup left 1 ;startup animation ; set windup to 1 endIf endif
end
;============================================
begin gameMode
if skillPassed == 1 ;don't run stuff in game mode unless recently activated set button to getButtonPressed ;grab the button state, you don't know when this will be set if button > -1 ;if a valid response is received start doing stuff if button == 1 ShowMessage TrapDisarmMsg set isArmed to 0 ;disarm the trap
if rewardXPOnce == 0 if NQlvl.TRAPPitchingSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryEasy set XPForDisarm to 0 elseif NQlvl.TRAPPitchingSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxEasy set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryEasy elseif NQlvl.TRAPPitchingSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxAverage set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardEasy elseif NQlvl.TRAPPitchingSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardAverage elseif NQlvl.TRAPPitchingSkillReq< getGS iLockLevelMaxVeryHard set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardHard else set XPForDisarm to TrapXPRewardVeryHard endif
set rewardXPOnce to 1 rewardXP XPforDisarm endif
endif set skillPassed to 0 ;stop running stuff endif endif
if isFiring == 1 if ballcount > 0 ;check to make sure there are enough balls ;wait, fire if fireInterval > 0 set fireInterval to fireInterval - GetSecondsPassed else playgroup forward 0 ;looping run animation set ballcount to ballcount -1
if ballcount > 1 FireWeapon TrapBaseball else fireWeapon DLC04TrapWeapGrenadeFrag endif
set fireInterval to 0.5 endif else set isFiring to 0 playgroup right 0 ;end animation, ends looping sound. endif endif
end

scn DLC04LabRoundRoomEventSCRIPT
short doOnceMain short doOnceSide short eventPhase short DesmondSpoke
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
if ( DesmondSpoke == 0 ) DLC04DesmondREF.Say DLC04DesmondLabTrapped Set DesmondSpoke to -1 endif
;// start the event, lock the doors, open the side one IF ( getSelf == DLC04LabRoundRoomTRIG && doOnceMain == 0 ) && ( DLC04DesmondREF.GetDead == 0 ) set doOnceMain to 1 set eventPhase to 1
;// once the event has started, lock the two doors, open the side door IF ( eventPhase == 1 ) DLC04LabRoundRoomDoorA.setOpenState 0 DLC04LabRoundRoomDoorA.lock 100 DLC04LabRoundRoomDoorB.setOpenState 0 DLC04LabRoundRoomDoorB.lock 100
;// open up the side door DLC04LabRoundRoomDoorC.setOpenState 1
;// warp desmond DLC04DesmondREF.moveTo DLC04LabDesmondPOS10
ENDIF ENDIF
;// when the player gets into the second room, start the robobrain! IF ( getSelf == DLC04LabRoundRoomSideRoomTRIG && doOnceSide == 0 ) set doOnceSide to 1
DLC04LabRoundRoomRobobrain.setUnconscious 0 DLC04LabRoundRoomSideDoor.unlock DLC04LabRoundRoomSideDoor.setOpenState 1 ENDIF
END

scn DLC04LabRobobrainSentrySCRIPT
short unconsciousOnce short brainDeadOnce
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// if the brain dies, we die! IF ( brainDeadOnce == 0 ) IF ( DLC04TheBrainREF.BrainIsDead == 1 ) kill Player 1 kill Player 2 set brainDeadOnce to 1
ENDIF ENDIF
END
BEGIN ONDEATH
;// add the keycards on death to the appropriate robobrains IF ( getSelf == DLC04LabHallRobobrain ) addItem DLC04LabClearanceLevelB 1 ENDIF
END

scn DLC04crematorySCRIPT
; just a toy for the player to fool with.
short state ; 0 = off ; 1 = on
begin onActivate
if state == 0 set state to 1 CrematoryMarker.enable activate elseif state == 1 set state to 0 CrematoryMarker.disable activate endif
end

scn DLC04FF05MorgueDrawerYangSCRIPT
; handle the activator version of this morgue drawer for the quest purposes ;=======================================================
short state ; 0 = closed ; 1= opened, not looted. ; 2 = opened, looted (jawbone removed) ; 5 = animating.
short button short active
float timer ; bit heavy-handed, but using a timer to handle button press timing. short timerOn short timerOver
;=======================================================
begin onActivate player
if state == 0 playgroup forward 0 set state to 5 elseif state == 1 && getStageDone DLC04FF05 60 == 0 set active to 1 showMessage DLC04FF05MorgueDrawerYangMSG endif
end
;=======================================================
begin gameMode
if state == 5 if isAnimPlaying forward == 1 ; please wait until anim over to pop MSG... else set active to 1 set state to 1 set timer to 1 set timerOn to 1 showMessage DLC04FF05MorgueDrawerYangMSG endif endif
if timerOn == 1 if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 set timerOn to 0 set timerOver to 1 endif endif
if active == 1 && timerOver == 1
set button to getButtonPressed set active to 0
if button >-1 if button == 0 ; leave alone elseif button == 1 ; take the jaw bone. playgroup right 0 player.addItem DLC04FF05DentalRecord 1 set state to 2 endif endif endif endif
end
;=======================================================

scn DLC04Puzzle03ControlBoxSCRIPT ; ; ;This polls the activation sequence and determines whether or not the correct sequence has been entered. ;Current sequence is A C B C D D B ;================================ int state ref actRef int doOnce
begin OnActivate
set actRef to getActionRef ;showWarning "Dummy has been activated"
if state == 0 if ActRef == DLC04PuzSwitchA set state to 1 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBPass else set state to 0 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBFail endif elseif state == 1 if ActRef == DLC04PuzSwitchC set state to 2 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBPass else set state to 0 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBFail endif elseif state == 2 if ActRef == DLC04PuzSwitchB set state to 3 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBPass else set state to 0 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBFail endif elseif state == 3 if ActRef == DLC04PuzSwitchC set state to 4 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBPass else set state to 0 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBFail endif elseif state == 4 if ActRef == DLC04PuzSwitchD set state to 5 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBPass else set state to 0 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBFail endif elseif state == 5 if ActRef == DLC04PuzSwitchD set state to 6 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBPass else set state to 0 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBFail endif elseif state == 6 if ActRef == DLC04PuzSwitchB if doOnce == 0 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBPass DLC04SpyBunkerSecretDoor.playGroup Forward 0 SetQuestObject DLC04FF05SpyGlasses 0 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 80 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 81 1 set state to 7 set doOnce to 1 endif else set state to 0 actRef.playSound3D OBJSwitchButtonBFail endif endif
end

end

DLC04SpyGlassesMarker.enable
end
begin OnUnEquip player
DLC04SpyGlassesMarker.disable
end

scn DLC04muckLauncherSCRIPT
; This lives on the activator which will animate, then spawn a bubble.
;======================================================
float timer
float rndTime
short active ; our on/off flag
short init
short spawned ; have I spawned a bubble this
float ang
;======================================================
begin gameMode
if init == 0 set active to 1 set timer to 0 set init to 1 playgroup forward 0 endif
if active == 1
if spawned == 0 if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 set spawned to 1 ; spawn a bubble fireWeapon DLC04MuckLobber playgroup backward 0 ;placeatme DLC04muckNudge endif elseif spawned == 1 if isAnimPlaying backward == 0 ; then the loop must be over with. Finish bubble launch anim. playgroup forward 0
;Play idle loop for random interval. set rndTime to 0.05 * Getrandompercent ; => 0.00 to 4.95 set timer to rndTime if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 set spawned to 0 endif endif endif
endif
; hacky on rotation stuff
set ang to getAngle Z set ang to (ang + 0.01) setAngle Z ang
end
;======================================================
; if timer > 0 ; set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) ; elseif timer <= 0 ; ; reset timer ; ;set active to 0 ; set spawned to 0 ; set timer to 10 ; playgroup forward 0 ; endif

if ( GetQuestRunning DLC04MQ05b == 1 ) PlayGroup Forward 1 Set DoOnce to -1 endif endif endif
END

END

if TimerSet == 0 set Timer to 17 set TimerSet to 1 endif
if TimerSet == 1
set Timer to Timer - GetSecondsPassed
if Timer <= 0 if DLC04JacksonREF.IsInCombat == 0 DLC04JacksonREF.moveto DLC04WakeUpMarker DLC04SeaCaveLadderREF.unlock set TimerSet to 2 else set TimerSet to 2 endif endif
endif
endif endif

scn DLC04FF06ghoulCleanupSCRIPT

end

scn DLC04BogHallucTriggerDollSCRIPT
short dollAnimsOnce short groupTwoPoint short dollPointTimerInit float dollPointTimer
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
IF ( dollAnimsOnce == 0 ) DLC04BogBobblePERREF.enable DLC04BogHangingDollAFill.enable 0 DLC04BogHangingDollA.playgroup Forward 0 DLC04BogHangingDollBFill.enable 0 DLC04BogHangingDollB.playgroup Forward 0 set dollAnimsOnce to 1
ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( dollAnimsOnce == 1 ) IF ( dollPointTimerInit == 0 ) set dollPointTimerInit to 1 set dollPointTimer to 3 ENDIF
;// wait X seconds and have the second group point and then the ;// final group point at the end IF ( dollPointTimer > 0 ) set dollPointTimer to dollPointTimer - getSecondsPassed
;// have the second group point IF ( groupTwoPoint == 0 && dollPointTimer < 1.5 ) set groupTwoPoint to 1 DLC04BogHangingDollCFill.enable 0 DLC04BogHangingDollC.playgroup Forward 0 DLC04BogHangingDollDFill.enable 0 DLC04BogHangingDollD.playgroup Forward 0 ENDIF
ELSE DLC04BogHangingDollEFill.enable 0 DLC04BogHangingDollE.playgroup Forward 0 DLC04BogHangingDollFFill.enable 0 DLC04BogHangingDollF.playgroup Forward 0 set dollAnimsOnce to 2 ENDIF
ENDIF END

ENDIF
END

scn DLC04BogCorpseSCRIPT
Float Timer Short DoOnce Short IsPile
BEGIN ONLOAD set doOnce to 0
END
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
IF ( doOnce == 0 && getActionRef == player ) SetCriticalStage DisintegrateStart PMS AlienCritGlowFXShader PMS effectAlienDisintegration Set Timer to 1.8 Set DoOnce to 1 Set IsPile to 0 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( DoOnce == 1 )
IF ( Timer > 0 ) Set Timer to (Timer - GetSecondsPassed) ELSE SetCriticalStage DisintegrateEnd SMS AlienCritGlowFXShader SMS effectAlienDisintegration Set DoOnce to 1 disable ENDIF
ENDIF END

scn DLC04muckBubbleHoleSCRIPT
; This lives on the activator which will animate, then spawn a bubble.
;======================================================
float timer
float rndTime
short active ; our on/off flag
short init
short spawned ; have I spawned a bubble this
float ang
;======================================================
begin gameMode
if init == 0 set active to 1 set timer to 0 set init to 1 playgroup forward 0 endif
if active == 1
if spawned == 0 if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 set spawned to 1 ; move to next part of anim after loop playgroup backward 0 placeatme DLC04muckNudge endif
elseif spawned == 1 if isAnimPlaying backward == 0 ; then the loop must be over with. Finish bubble launch anim. playgroup forward 0
;Play idle loop for random interval. set rndTime to 0.05 * Getrandompercent ; => 0.00 to 4.95 set timer to rndTime if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 set spawned to 0 endif endif endif
endif
; hacky on rotation stuff
set ang to getAngle Z set ang to (ang + 0.01) setAngle Z ang
end
;======================================================
;Play idle loop for random interval. ; set rndTime to 0.05 * Getrandompercent ; => 0.00 to 4.95 ; set timer to rndTime ; if timer > 0 ; set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) ; elseif timer <= 0
; if timer > 0 ; set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) ; elseif timer <= 0 ; ; reset timer ; ;set active to 0 ; set spawned to 0 ; set timer to 10 ; playgroup forward 0 ; endif

scn DLC04FF02ObadiahBlackhallSCRIPT
; simple script for Obadiah...
begin onDeath
if getStage DLC04FF02 >= 10 && getStageDone DLC04FF02 140 == 0 && getStageDone DLC04FF02 255 == 0 if getStageDone DLC04FF02 20 == 0 && getStageDone DLC04FF02 30 == 0 ; Marcella never spoke to player ; Player didn't get the book ; fail quest setStage DLC04FF02 150 elseif getStageDone DLC04FF02 20 == 1 && DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 1 ; Marcella spoke to the player ; but Marcella was killed before player got book ; fail quest setStage DLC04FF02 150 elseif getStageDone DLC04FF02 30 == 1 && DLC04FF02.marDiedEarly == 1 ; player got book ; marcella died early ; fail quest setStage DLC04FF02 150 elseif getStageDone DLC04FF02 20 == 1 ; Marcella made her plea elseif DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 1 && getStageDone DLC04FF02 20 == 0 ; player has taken quest ; but marcella is dead and never made her plea setStage DLC04FF02 150 ; fail quest endif endif
if getStageDone DLC04FF02 140 == 1 additem DLC04FF02book 1 ; make Krivbeknih show up as a death item if quest completed by turning into Obadiah endif
end

scn DLC04BanditExecuted01TriggerSCRIPT
;This script takes care of the bandit who is executed on the eastern cliffs near cathedral
short doOnce ref actionRef float timer
;**************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.enable 0 DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.enable 0 DLC04BanditExecutedTrigger02REF.enable ; enables a safe guard trigger if player runs up the side of the cliff set timer to 10 set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;**************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) if (DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.getDead == 0) DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.playidle DLC04MeditationSpecialIdle set timer to 5 set doOnce to 2 else set doOnce to 3 endif else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) if (DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.getDead == 0) DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.useWeapon DLC04WeapShotgun DLC04BanditExecutionerStandTarget DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 1 0 0 1 0 set DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.timer to 2 set DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.doOnce to 2 ;executioner picks package to walk away and then disable set doOnce to 3 endif set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End
;**************************************

scn DLC04BanditExecuted01SCRIPT
short doOnce
;*******************************************
Begin onHit DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF
if (doOnce == 0) DLC04BanditExecutedPushMarker.pushActorAway DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 10 ;push corpse off cliff DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.killactor DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 1 ;dismember head set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*******************************************
Begin onHit Player
if (doOnce == 0) if (DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.getDead == 0) DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.useWeapon DLC04WeapShotgun DLC04BanditExecutionerStandTarget DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 1 0 0 1 0 DLC04BanditExecutedPushMarker.pushActorAway DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 10 ;push corpse off cliff DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.killactor DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 1 ;dismember head set DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.timer to 1 set DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.doOnce to 1 ;executioner picks package to run away and then disable endif set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*******************************************

scn DLC04BanditExecutioner01SCRIPT
short doOnce float timer
;*******************************************
Begin onHit Player
if (doOnce == 0) if (DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.getDead == 0) useWeapon DLC04WeapShotgun DLC04BanditExecutionerStandTarget DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 1 0 0 1 0 DLC04BanditExecutedPushMarker.pushActorAway DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 10 ;push corpse off cliff DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.killactor DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 1 ;dismember head set timer to 1 set doOnce to 1 else set timer to 0 set doOnce to 1 endif endif
End
;*******************************************
Begin onDeath
DLC04BanditExecutedPushMarker.pushActorAway DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 10 ;push corpse off cliff DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.killactor DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 1 ;dismember head
End
;*******************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) ;player has interuppted execution, so make bandit run away if (timer <= 0) setav variable01 2 evp set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif elseif (doOnce == 2) ;player has not interuppted execution, so make bandit walk away if (timer <= 0) setav variable01 1 evp set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif endif
End

scn DLC04BanditExecutedTrigger02SCRIPT
short doOnce
;***********************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
DLC04BanditExecutedPushMarker.pushActorAway DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 10 ;push corpse off cliff DLC04BanditExecuted01REF.killactor DLC04BanditExecuted01REF 1 ;dismember head DLC04BanditExecutioner01REF.disable
End
;***********************************************

scn DLC04PlayerArriveTriggerSCRIPT
short doOnce float timer
;*************************************************
Begin onTriggerEnter Player
if (doOnce == 0) disablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 setstage DLC04MansionSmokeFXQuest 20 set gameDay to (gameDay + 1) set gamehour to 9 playsound MUSDLC04Arrival 1 player.dispel stealthboy imod DLC04FadeInFromBlack02SFX DLC04TobarREF.disable DLC04MainBoatREF.disable DLC04BoatClutterMarker.disable player.additem DLC04SteamBoatArmor 1 1 player.equipitem DLC04SteamBoatArmor 1 1 player.moveto DLC04LookoutLandingMarkerREF
set timer to 5.5 set doOnce to 1 endif
End
;*************************************************
Begin gameMode
if (doOnce == 1) if (timer <= 0) player.addscriptpackage DLC04PlayerBoatRidePkg set timer to 28.8 set doOnce to 2 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 2) if (timer <= 0) imod DLC04FadeToandFromBlackISFX set timer to 3.5 set doOnce to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 3) if (timer <= 0) DLC04MainBoatREF.enable 0 DLC04BoatClutterMarker.enable 0 ;DLC04BoatCollision01REF.disable player.removeitem DLC04SteamBoatArmor 1 1 player.removescriptpackage DLC04PlayerBoatRidePkg DLC04DuchessGambitMarkerREF.enable DLC04TobarREF.enable 0 DLC04TobarREF.moveto DLC04TobarWelcomeMarker DLC04IntroSwampfolk01REF.disable DLC04IntroDog01REF.disable DLC04IntroDog02REF.disable set timer to 4 set doOnce to 4 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
elseif (doOnce == 4) if (timer <= 0) ;player.moveto DLC04LookoutLandingMarkerREF enablePlayerControls set doOnce to 5 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
endif
End
;*************************************************

scn DLC04FF02DunwichSCRIPT
; if the player takes the Krivbeknih to the Dunwich building... ; there's an explosion and white-out, the book is removed ; and the quest completes with the high-karma ending. ;==========================================================
short runFlag short button
short doOnce
short endQuest
short burnEnemies ; burn the non-believers! short burnCount ; hack of a way to stop the loop.
ref ActorWithin
;==========================================================
begin onActivate player
if player.getItemCount DLC04FF02book >= 1 && doOnce == 0 showMessage DLC04FF02DunwichMSG01 set runFlag to 1 else showMessage DLC04FF02DunwichMSG02 endif
if doOnce == 0
endif
end
;==========================================================
begin gameMode
if runFlag == 1 set button to getButtonPressed
if button > -1 if button == 0 ; choice to interact. set endQuest to 1 DLC04FF02DunwichMarker.placeatme DLC04DunwichBurst DLC04FF02DunwichMarker.placeatme GlowingOneBurstExplode set burnEnemies to 1 set doOnce to 1 endif
set runFlag to 0
endif endif
; Once combat is over, end the quest (so the player can see objective update)
if endQuest == 1
player.removeItem DLC04FF02Book 1
if getStageDone DLC04FF02 140 == 0 ; The player hasn't given to Obadiah (and taken off his corpse)
if getObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 31 == 1 ; clean up objective if I came here early setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 31 0 endif
setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 240 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 241 1 setStage DLC04FF02 255 ; complete the quest
endif endif
; Special FX - let's burn any bad guys...
if burnEnemies == 1 && burnCount < 6
set actorWithin to getActionRef
if actorWithin != player if actorWithin.getscale < 1.01 actorWithin.placeatMe GlowingOneBurstExplode 1 actorWithin.setScale 1.01 set burnCount to (burnCount + 1) endif endif endif
end
;==========================================================

scn DLC04KennyScript
short talking float talkingTimer
Begin OnLoad
;set up the shooting gallery if getTalkedToPC == 0 setstage DLC04FF04 50 elseif getRandomPercent < 50 setstage DLC04FF04 50 endif
End
Begin GameMode
;used to make Kenny give player a head start in tag if DLC04FF04.playingTag == 1 if DLC04FF04.whosIt == 1 ;Kenny's it if DLC04FF04.tagHeadStartTimer > 0 set DLC04FF04.tagHeadStartTimer to DLC04FF04.tagHeadStartTimer - getSecondsPassed endif endif endif
;used to get Kenny to detect and dialog player if player is hiding in Hide and Seek game if DLC04FF04.playingHideAndSeek == 1 if DLC04FF04.whosSeeking == 1 ;Kenny's seeking if DLC04FF04.hideHeadStart == 1 ;Kenny's done giving a head start if DLC04FF04.foundPlayer == 0
if getDetected player == 1 set DLC04FF04.foundPlayer to 1 evp
endif
endif endif endif endif
;Kenny says things while playing games if DLC04FF04.playingTag == 1 || (DLC04FF04.playingHideAndSeek == 1 && DLC04FF04.hideHeadStart == 1) if talking == 0 if talkingTimer <= 0 set talking to 1 say DLC04FF04PlaySayTos else set talkingTimer to talkingTimer - getSecondsPassed endif endif endif
End
Begin SayToDone
set talking to 0 set talkingTimer to 5
End

scn DLC04BogHallucinationISFXSCRIPT
;// image space apply short imageSpaceApplyOnce short imageSpaceApply short imageSpaceTimerInit float imageSpaceTimer
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
IF ( imageSpaceApplyOnce == 0 && getSelf == DLC04BogHallucinationISFX02 ) set imageSpaceApply to 1 set imageSpaceApplyOnce to 1 player.restoreAV radiationrads 2000 ENDIF
IF ( imageSpaceApply == 2 && imageSpaceApplyOnce == 1 ) set imageSpaceTimerInit to 1 set imageSpaceApplyOnce to 2 set imageSpaceApply to 3 player.restoreAV radiationrads 2000 ENDIF
;// apply the pulse effect IF ( getSelf == DLC04BogHallucinationISFX03Pulse ) ApplyIMageSpaceModifier DLC04HallucinationStage03Pulse player.restoreAV radiationrads 2000 disable ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;///////////////////////////// ;// The imagespace gets applied here ;///////////////////////////// IF ( imageSpaceApply == 1 )
;// init the timer and apply the transition IF ( imageSpaceTimerInit == 0 ) set imageSpaceTimer to 0.7 ApplyIMageSpaceModifier DLC04HallucinationStage02Trans rimod DLC04HallucinationStage01 set imageSpaceTimerInit to 1 ENDIF
;// countdown to application of the real imagespace IF ( imageSpaceTimer > 0 ) set imageSpaceTimer to imageSpaceTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE ApplyIMageSpaceModifier DLC04HallucinationStage02 set imageSpaceApply to 2 disable ENDIF
ENDIF
IF ( imageSpaceApply == 3 )
;// init the timer and apply the transition IF ( imageSpaceTimerInit == 0 ) set imageSpaceTimer to 2.75 set imageSpaceTimerInit to 1 ApplyIMageSpaceModifier DLC04HallucinationStage03 rimod DLC04HallucinationStage02 ENDIF
;// countdown to application of the real imagespace IF ( imageSpaceTimer > 0 ) set imageSpaceTimer to imageSpaceTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE ApplyIMageSpaceModifier DLC04HallucinationStage03 set imageSpaceApply to 2 disable ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC04BogNukeExplosionSeqSCRIPT

scn DLC04FF05FuseBoxSCRIPT
; supports high-science escape from trap room
short button short active short done
;=========================================================================
begin onActivate player
if getStageDone DLC04FF05 90 == 1 showMessage DLC04FF05fuseBoxMSG set active to 1 endif
end
;=========================================================================
begin gameMode
; | message handling | ; V block here V
if active == 1 set button to getButtonPressed
if button > -1 if button == 0 ; leaving it alone elseif button == 1 ; successful override DLC04FF05gasRoomSwitch.activate DLC04FF05ProtectronREF if done == 0 rewardxp 15 set done to 1 endif elseif button == 2 ; insufficient skill MSG pop showMessage DLC04FF05fuseBoxFailureMSG endif
set active to 0
endif endif
end

scn DLC04FF05RadiationVentSCRIPT
short button short active short done
;=========================================================================
begin onActivate player
if done == 0 showMessage DLC04FF05radVentMSG set active to 1 endif
end
;=========================================================================
begin gameMode
; | message handling | ; V block here V
if active == 1 set button to getButtonPressed
if button > -1 if button == 0 ; leaving it alone elseif button == 1 ; successful disarm DLC04FF05radiationVentMarker.disable ; turn off all the stuff that makes it look radiationy. rewardxp 15 set done to 1 elseif button == 2 ; insufficient skill MSG pop showMessage DLC04FF05radVentFailureMSG endif
set active to 0
endif endif
end

scn DLC04FerrisWheelWheelSCRIPT
short DoOnce short Button
;// the ferriswheel starttimer float startTimer short startTimerInit
;// the linkedref ref myLinkedRef ref myRef
BEGIN ONACTIVATE
;// if the player activates the motor:
IF ( isActionRef player == 1 && DLC04MQ04.ferrisWheelBeaconCar == 0 ) if ( GetStage DLC04MQ04 > 20 ) && ( GetStage DLC04MQ04 < 100 ) if ( DoOnce >= 0 ) ShowMessage DLC04MQ04FerrisWheelMessage set DLC04MQ04.ferrisWheelControlPanel to 1 Set DoOnce to 1 endif elseif ( GetStageDone DLC04MQ04 101 == 1 ) ShowMessage DLC04MQ04FerrisWheelMessageDONE else ShowMessage DLC04MQ04FerrisWheelMessageNO endif
ENDIF
set myRef to getSelf
END
BEGIN GameMode
if ( DoOnce == 1 )
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if ( Button == 0 ) SetStage DLC04MQ04 99 Player.RemoveItem DLC04Jammer 99 DLC04FerrisWheelREF.playgroup right 0 set startTimer to 1.5 SetDestroyed 1 Set DoOnce to -1 activate endif endif
IF ( getStage DLC04MQ04 == 99 )
IF ( startTimer > 0 ) set startTimer to startTimer - getSecondsPassed ELSE set DLC04MQ04.ferrisWheelState to 2 set DLC04MQ04.ferrisWheelBegun to 1 DLC04FerrisWheelREF.playgroup forward 0 setStage DLC04MQ04 100
;// set all the tribals to enemy setEnemy DLC04TribalFriendlyFaction playerFaction
set myLinkedRef to getLinkedREF myLinkedRef.setopenstate 0 myLinkedRef.activate myRef
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC04BogBloodSawSCRIPT

short sawStart short doOnce
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
IF ( doOnce == 0 ) set doOnce to 1 set sawStart to 1 set sawTimer to 42 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( sawStart == 1 && stepper == 0) DLC04BogBloodSawA.playGroup forward 0 DLC04BogBloodSawB.enable 0 set stepper to 1
ELSEIF ( DLC04BogBloodSawA.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && stepper == 1 ) DLC04BogBloodSawA.disable DLC04BogBloodSawB.playGroup forward 0 DLC04BogBloodSawC.enable 0 set stepper to 2
ELSEIF ( DLC04BogBloodSawB.isAnimPlaying forward == 0 && stepper == 2 ) DLC04BogBloodSawB.disable DLC04BogBloodSawC.playGroup forward 0 set stepper to 3
ENDIF
END

scn DLC04FF02safetyNetSCRIPT
; this script is a safety net for players who manage to evade Marcella's forcegreet outside the Manor.
short doOnce ref marker
begin gameMode
if DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 0 ; don't do any of this if she's dead.
if marker == 0 if getInCell DLC04RitualSiteBasement set marker to DLC04FF02MarcellaWaitRitualMarkerInterior else set marker to DLC04FF02MarcellaWaitRitualMarker endif endif
if getStageDone DLC04FF02 10 == 1 if getStageDone DLC04FF02 20 != 1 && doOnce == 0 if DLC04MarcellaREF.hasLoaded3d == 0 ; if Marcella isn't loaded, move her DLC04MarcellaREF.moveTo marker DLC04MarcellaREF.evp set doOnce to 1 else ; otherwise, wait until player isn't looking at her. if player.getLoS DLC04MarcellaREF == 0 DLC04MarcellaREF.moveTo marker DLC04MarcellaREF.evp set doOnce to 1 endif endif endif endif endif
end

scn DLC04TriggerGhoulSpawnerSCRIPT
short ghoulsActive short init short sceneActive short ghoulmax short ghoul01Fading short ghoul02Fading short ghoul03Fading
float ghoul01Timer float ghoul02Timer float ghoul03Timer
ref ghoul01 ref ghoul02 ref ghoul03 ref markToSpawn
begin onLoad if init == 0 set ghoul01 to 0 set ghoul02 to 0 set ghoul03 to 0 set ghoul01Timer to 0 set ghoul02Timer to 0 set ghoul03Timer to 0 set init to 1 endif end
begin onTriggerEnter player if sceneActive == 0 set sceneActive to 1 endif end
begin onTriggerLeave player
set sceneActive to 0
end
begin GameMode if sceneActive == 1
if ghoulsActive < 3 && ghoulMax < 30 ;can't have more than 3 active at a time. Can't spawn more than 30. if player.getLOS DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF01 == 0 && getRandomPercent < 20 set markToSpawn to DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF01 elseif player.getLOS DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF02 == 0 && getRandomPercent < 20 set markToSpawn to DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF02 elseif player.getLOS DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF03 == 0 && getRandomPercent < 20 set markToSpawn to DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF03 elseif player.getLOS DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF04 == 0 && getRandomPercent < 20 set markToSpawn to DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF04 elseif player.getLOS DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF05 == 0 && getRandomPercent < 20 set markToSpawn to DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF05 elseif player.getLOS DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF06 == 0 && getRandomPercent < 20 set markToSpawn to DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF06 elseif player.getLOS DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF07 == 0 && getRandomPercent < 20 set markToSpawn to DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF07 elseif player.getLOS DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF08 == 0 && getRandomPercent < 20 set markToSpawn to DLC04GhoulSpawnMarkerREF08 else set markToSpawn to 0 endif else set markToSpawn to 0 endif
;=======if we have a place to spawn a ghoul, do it. Otherwise the game mode block will loop through the marker search until there are 3 ghouls active. if markToSpawn != 0 if ghoul01 == 0 set ghoul01 to markToSpawn.placeatme DLC04CrSwampGhoul ghoul01.startcombat player set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive + 1 set ghoulmax to ghoulmax + 1 elseif ghoul02 == 0 set ghoul02 to markToSpawn.placeatme DLC04CrSwampGhoul ghoul02.startcombat player set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive + 1 set ghoulmax to ghoulmax + 1 elseif ghoul03 == 0 set ghoul03 to markToSpawn.placeatme DLC04CrSwampGhoul ghoul03.startcombat player set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive + 1 set ghoulmax to ghoulmax + 1 endif endif
endif
;========The following section handles if you've seen a ghoul, and cleans up the number of active ghouls after it fades away.
if ghoul01 != 0 ;ghoul01 is not null, this means that there is an active ghoul01 if player.getLOS ghoul01 && ghoul01fading == 0 ;player can see ghoul set ghoul01Timer to 3 ;set 3 second delay set ghoul01fading to 1 ;set fading state to 1 (visible, will start to fade in one second.) endif ;======phase 1 if ghoul01fading == 1 ;ghoul01 has been visible for 1 second so far, now in state 1 if ghoul01Timer > 2 set ghoul01Timer to ghoul01Timer - getSecondsPassed ;decrement the timer else ghoul01.pms DLC04GhoulVanish ;start the fade out set ghoul01Fading to 2 endif endif ;======phase 2 if ghoul01fading == 2 ;ghoul01 has been visible for three seconds, and fading for 2 seconds if ghoul01Timer > 0 set ghoul01Timer to ghoul01Timer - getSecondsPassed else set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive - 1 ;reduce the number of active ghouls, because this one is getting disabled ghoul01.disable ;disable with fade-out set ghoul01 to 0 ;null the ghoul01 ref set ghoul01Fading to 0 ;reset the fading variable endif endif ;======ghoul too close if ghoul01.getDistance player < 200 ;ghoul01 is too close to the player set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive - 1 ;reduce the number of active ghouls, because this one is getting disabled ghoul01.disable ;disable with fade-out set ghoul01 to 0 ;null the ghoul01 ref set ghoul01Fading to 0 ;reset the fading variable endif ;======ghoul cleaned up endif
if ghoul02 != 0 ;ghoul02 is not null, this means that there is an active ghoul02 if player.getLOS ghoul02 && ghoul02fading == 0 ;player can see ghoul set ghoul02Timer to 3 ;set 3 second delay set ghoul02fading to 1 ;set fading state to 1 (visible, will start to fade in one second.) endif ;======phase 1 if ghoul02fading == 1 ;ghoul01 has been visible for 1 second so far, now in state 1 if ghoul02Timer > 2 set ghoul02Timer to ghoul02Timer - getSecondsPassed ;decrement the timer else ghoul02.pms DLC04GhoulVanish ;start the fade out set ghoul02Fading to 2 endif endif ;======phase 2 if ghoul02fading == 2 ;ghoul02 has been visible for three seconds, and fading for 2 seconds if ghoul02Timer > 0 set ghoul02Timer to ghoul02Timer - getSecondsPassed else set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive - 1 ;reduce the number of active ghouls, because this one is getting disabled ghoul02.disable ;disable with fade-out set ghoul02 to 0 ;null the ghoul02 ref set ghoul02Fading to 0 ;reset the fading variable endif endif ;======ghoul too close if ghoul02.getDistance player < 200 ;ghoul01 is too close to the player set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive - 1 ;reduce the number of active ghouls, because this one is getting disabled ghoul02.disable ;disable with fade-out set ghoul02 to 0 ;null the ghoul02 ref set ghoul02Fading to 0 ;reset the fading variable endif ;======ghoul cleaned up endif
if ghoul03 != 0 ;ghoul03 is not null, this means that there is an active ghoul02 if player.getLOS ghoul03 && ghoul03fading == 0 ;player can see ghoul set ghoul03Timer to 3 ;set 3 second delay set ghoul03fading to 1 ;set fading state to 1 (visible, will start to fade in one second.) endif ;======phase 1 if ghoul03fading == 1 ;ghoul01 has been visible for 1 second so far, now in state 1 if ghoul03Timer > 2 set ghoul03Timer to ghoul03Timer - getSecondsPassed ;decrement the timer else ghoul03.pms DLC04GhoulVanish ;start the fade out set ghoul03Fading to 2 endif endif ;======phase 2 if ghoul03fading == 2 ;ghoul01 has been visible for three seconds, and fading for 2 seconds if ghoul03Timer > 0 set ghoul03Timer to ghoul03Timer - getSecondsPassed else set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive - 1 ;reduce the number of active ghouls, because this one is getting disabled ghoul03.disable ;disable with fade-out set ghoul03 to 0 ;null the ghoul01 ref set ghoul03Fading to 0 ;reset the fading variable endif endif ;======ghoul too close if ghoul03.getDistance player < 200 ;ghoul01 is too close to the player set ghoulsActive to ghoulsActive - 1 ;reduce the number of active ghouls, because this one is getting disabled ghoul03.disable ;disable with fade-out set ghoul03 to 0 ;null the ghoul01 ref set ghoul03Fading to 0 ;reset the fading variable endif ;======ghoul cleaned up endif
end

scn DLC04FF06PliksJournalSCRIPT
; Let player learn perk from Plik's Journal
short button short active
;=========================================================================
begin onActivate player
if player.hasPerk DLC04FF06GhoulEcology < 1 showMessage DLC04FF06PlikNotesMSG set active to 1 endif
end
;=========================================================================
begin gameMode
; | message handling | ; V block here V
if active == 1 set button to getButtonPressed
if button > -1 if button == 0 ; player learns a new perk player.addPerk DLC04FF06GhoulEcology showMessage DLC04FF06PerkMSG elseif button == 1 ; leaving it alone endif
set active to 0
endif endif
end

float Timer

scn DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulSCRIPT
ref mySelf short vanishOnce
BEGIN GAMEMODE
IF ( getDisabled == 0 ) set mySelf to getSelf
;// if the player can see us, vanish IF ( player.getLineOfSight mySelf == 1 && vanishOnce == 0) pms PuffOfSmokeVanish set vanishOnce to 1
ENDIF
;// if the player gets within 256 units, disable us IF getDistance player <= 256 disable
ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulTriggerSCRIPT
short ghoulA short ghoulB short ghoulC short ghoulD short ghoulE short ghoulF
BEGIN ONTRIGGERENTER PLAYER
IF ( getSelf == DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulTriggerAREF ) ; set ghoulB to 1 ; set ghoulE to 1 ; set ghoulF to 1
ELSEIF ( getSelf == DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulTriggerBREF ) set ghoulA to 1 set ghoulC to 1 set ghoulD to 1 ENDIF
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// start polling to spawn ghoul A IF ( ghoulA == 1 )
IF ( player.getLineOfSight DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulAXMRK == 0 ) DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulA.enable 0 set ghoulA to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;// start polling to spawn ghoul B IF ( ghoulB == 1 )
IF ( player.getLineOfSight DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulBXMRK == 0 ) DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulB.enable 0 set ghoulB to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;// start polling to spawn ghoul C IF ( ghoulC == 1 )
IF ( player.getLineOfSight DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulCXMRK == 0 ) DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulC.enable 0 set ghoulC to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;// start polling to spawn ghoul D IF ( ghoulD == 1 )
IF ( player.getLineOfSight DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulDXMRK == 0 ) DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulD.enable 0 set ghoulD to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
;// start polling to spawn ghoul E IF ( ghoulE == 1 )
IF ( player.getLineOfSight DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulEXMRK == 0 ) DLC04BogHallucinationGhoulE.enable 0 set ghoulE to 0
ENDIF ENDIF
END

scn DLC04MansionWingBlockFX01SCRIPT
short gameLoop short stage float timer
;****************************************
Begin GameMode
if gameLoop == 1
; Play dust anims in room and at doors once----------------------------------------------------------------------- if stage == 0 DLC04FXCeilingCrashDebrisREF01.playgroup forward 0 DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF01.playgroup forward 0 DLC04CeilingCrashMarker01.enable DLC04CeilingCrashMarker01.placeatme DLC04BarrelPushExplosion 1 set stage to 1 endif
; Wait for timer to expire and swap in damage geo once----------------------------------------------------- if timer > 0 && stage == 1 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 && stage == 1 DLC04MQ02LDSeq01BlockEnabler.enable 1 DLC04CeilingCrashMarker01.disable DLC04CeilingCrashMarker01.markfordelete set stage to 2 set timer to 20 endif
; Wait for fx to finish and then cleanup extra files---------------------------------------------------------------- if timer > 0 && stage == 2 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 && stage == 2 DLC04FXCeilingCrashDebrisREF01.disable DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF01.disable DLC04FXCeilingCrashDebrisREF01.markfordelete DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF01.markfordelete set stage to 3 set gameLoop to 0 ; End game mode---------------------------------------------------------------------------- endif
endif
End
;****************************************
Begin onActivate
set gameLoop to 1 set timer to 3
End

scn DLC04MansionWingBlockFX02SCRIPT
short gameLoop short stage float timer
;****************************************
Begin GameMode
if gameLoop == 1
; Play dust anims in room and at doors once----------------------------------------------------------------------- if stage == 0 DLC04FXCeilingCrashDebrisREF02.playgroup forward 0 DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF02.playgroup forward 0 DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF03.playgroup forward 0 DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF04.playgroup forward 0 DLC04CeilingCrashMarker02.enable DLC04CeilingCrashMarker02.placeatme DLC04BarrelPushExplosion 1 set stage to 1 endif
; Wait for timer to expire and swap in damage geo once----------------------------------------------------- if timer > 0 && stage == 1 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 && stage == 1 DLC04FXDoorCrashExplosionMarker01.placeatme FireExtinguisherExplosion 1 DLC04FXDoorCrashExplosionMarker02.placeatme FireExtinguisherExplosion 1 DLC04MQ02LDSeq02BlockEnabler.disable DLC04CeilingCrashMarker02.disable DLC04CeilingCrashMarker02.markfordelete set stage to 2 set timer to 20 endif
; Wait for fx to finish and then cleanup extra files---------------------------------------------------------------- if timer > 0 && stage == 2 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 && stage == 2 DLC04FXCeilingCrashDebrisREF02.disable DLC04FXCeilingCrashDebrisREF02.markfordelete DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF02.disable DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF02.markfordelete DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF03.disable DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF03.markfordelete DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF04.disable DLC04FXDoorDustCrashREF04.markfordelete set stage to 3 set gameLoop to 0 ; End game mode---------------------------------------------------------------------------- endif
endif
End
;****************************************
Begin onActivate
set gameLoop to 1 set timer to 3
End

scn DLC04LighthouseSwitch01SCRIPT

scn DLC04MuckBubbleTriggerSCRIPT
ref myCurrentRef ref myRef1 ref myRef2 ref myRef3 ref myRef4 ref myRef5 ref myRef6
float timeToExplode short onLoad float timer1 float timer2 float timer3 float timer4 float timer5 float timer6
Begin OnLoad
set timeToExplode to 10 set myRef1 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY set myRef2 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY set myRef3 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY set myRef4 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY set myRef5 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY set myRef6 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY
End
Begin GameMode
;Wait for player to kill bubble or time to run out. clean up whan done. Once for all six slots------------------------------------------
if myRef1 != DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY
if (timer1 < 0) myRef1.Do 1 if (myRef1.GetDisabled == 0) myRef1.Disable set myRef1 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif else set timer1 to (timer1 - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (myRef1.GetDestructionStage >= 2) myRef1.Disable set myRef1 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif
endif
if myRef2 != DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY
if (timer2 < 0) myRef2.Do 1 if (myRef2.GetDisabled == 0) myRef2.Disable set myRef2 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif else set timer2 to (timer2 - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (myRef2.GetDestructionStage >= 2) myRef2.Disable set myRef2 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif
endif
if myRef3 != DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY
if (timer3 < 0) myRef3.Do 1 if (myRef3.GetDisabled == 0) myRef3.Disable set myRef3 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif else set timer3 to (timer3 - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (myRef3.GetDestructionStage >= 2) myRef3.Disable set myRef3 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif
endif
if myRef4 != DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY
if (timer4 < 0) myRef4.Do 1 if (myRef4.GetDisabled == 0) myRef4.Disable set myRef4 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif else set timer4 to (timer4 - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (myRef4.GetDestructionStage >= 2) myRef4.Disable set myRef4 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif
endif
if myRef5 != DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY
if (timer5 < 0) myRef5.Do 1 if (myRef5.GetDisabled == 0) myRef5.Disable set myRef5 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif else set timer5 to (timer5 - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (myRef5.GetDestructionStage >= 2) myRef5.Disable set myRef5 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif
endif
if myRef6 != DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY
if (timer6 < 0) myRef6.Do 1 if (myRef6.GetDisabled == 0) myRef6.Disable set myRef6 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif else set timer6 to (timer6 - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (myRef6.GetDestructionStage >= 2) myRef6.Disable set myRef6 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif
endif
;If any of the myRefs are disabled they should make room for another muckbubble reference if (myRef1.GetDisabled == 1) set myRef1 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif if (myRef2.GetDisabled == 1) set myRef2 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif if (myRef3.GetDisabled == 1) set myRef3 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif if (myRef4.GetDisabled == 1) set myRef4 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif if (myRef5.GetDisabled == 1) set myRef5 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif if (myRef6.GetDisabled == 1) set myRef6 to DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY endif
End
begin onTriggerEnter
set myCurrentRef to getActionRef
if myCurrentRef.getIsId DLC04MuckProjectile == 1
if (myRef1 == DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY) set timeToExplode to 0.1 * Getrandompercent ; => 0 to 10 set timer1 to timeToExplode set myRef1 to myCurrentRef endif if (myRef2 == DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY) && (myCurrentRef != myRef1) set timeToExplode to 0.1 * Getrandompercent ; => 0 to 10 set timeToExplode to (timeToExplode + 4) set timer2 to timeToExplode set myRef2 to myCurrentRef endif if (myRef3 == DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY) && (myCurrentRef != myRef1) && (myCurrentRef != myRef2) set timeToExplode to 0.1 * Getrandompercent ; => 0 to 10 set timeToExplode to (timeToExplode + 4) set timer3 to timeToExplode set myRef3 to myCurrentRef endif if (myRef4 == DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY) && (myCurrentRef != myRef1) && (myCurrentRef != myRef2) && (myCurrentRef != myRef3) set timeToExplode to 0.1 * Getrandompercent ; => 0 to 10 set timeToExplode to (timeToExplode + 4) set timer4 to timeToExplode set myRef4 to myCurrentRef endif if (myRef5 == DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY) && (myCurrentRef != myRef1) && (myCurrentRef != myRef2) && (myCurrentRef != myRef3) && (myCurrentRef != myRef4) set timeToExplode to 0.1 * Getrandompercent ; => 0 to 10 set timeToExplode to (timeToExplode + 4) set timer5 to timeToExplode set myRef5 to myCurrentRef endif if (myRef6 == DLC04MuckBubbleDUMMY) && (myCurrentRef != myRef1) && (myCurrentRef != myRef2) && (myCurrentRef != myRef3) && (myCurrentRef != myRef4) && (myCurrentRef != myRef5) set timeToExplode to 0.1 * Getrandompercent ; => 0 to 10 set timeToExplode to (timeToExplode + 4) set timer6 to timeToExplode set myRef6 to myCurrentRef endif
endif
END

scn DLC04FF04TargetTriggerScript
ref leavingRef
short countLeaving
float shootTimer
Begin GameMode
if DLC04FF04.kennyShoot == 1
if countLeaving >= 1 if shootTimer < 20 set shootTimer to shootTimer + getSecondsPassed endif endif
if countLeaving >= 8 || shootTimer >= 20 set countLeaving to - countLeaving set DLC04FF04.kennyShoot to -1 set shootTimer to 0
endif
endif
End
Begin onTriggerLeave
if DLC04FF04.kennyShoot == 1
set leavingRef to getActionRef
if leavingRef.getIsID Bucket01 == 1 set DLC04FF04.target1Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 1 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
elseif leavingRef.getIsID ToyCar == 1 set DLC04FF04.target2Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 2 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
elseif leavingRef.getIsID Camera == 1 set DLC04FF04.target3Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 3 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
elseif leavingRef.getIsID Lunchbox == 1 set DLC04FF04.target4Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 4 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
elseif leavingRef.getIsID pool8ball == 1 set DLC04FF04.target5Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 5 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
elseif leavingRef.getIsID DrinkingGlass01 == 1 set DLC04FF04.target6Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 6 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
elseif leavingRef.getIsID Conductor == 1 set DLC04FF04.target7Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 7 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
elseif leavingRef.getIsID BurnedBook01 == 1 set DLC04FF04.target8Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 8 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
elseif leavingRef.getIsID AbraxoCleaner == 1 set DLC04FF04.target9Out to 1 set countLeaving to countLeaving + 1 DLC04KennyRef.evp
;showwarning "Target 9 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving

;showwarning "Target 10 is leaving, count leaving is %.0f" countLeaving
endif
endif

scn DLC04StitchesSCRIPT
short stepper
BEGIN GAMEMODE
;// only do this if we're enabled IF getDisabled != 1
;// Step through the 4 stage anim as player gets closer IF getDistance player < 1000 && stepper == 0 playgroup forward 1 set stepper to 1
ELSEIF getDistance player < 800 && stepper == 1 playgroup left 1 set stepper to 2
ELSEIF getDistance player < 600 && stepper == 2 playgroup right 1 set stepper to 3
ELSEIF getDistance player < 400 && stepper == 3 playgroup backward 1 set stepper to 4
ENDIF
ENDIF
END

scn DLC04ActorInventoryScript
;!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ;This needs to be placed on any combatant actor in Point Lookout that gets his inventory from leveled lists
;if actor has nonPlayable weapon (needed to add damage effect) ;swap it out with a playable version when the player loots him
short hasBat short hasBBGun short hasHuntingRifle short hasCombatKnife short hasKnife short hasLeadPipe short hasTireIron
short deadCheckInventory
Begin OnLoad
if getItemCount DLC04WeapBaseballBatNonPlayable >= 1 set hasBat to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapBBGunNonPlayable >= 1 set hasBBGun to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapHuntingRifleNonPlayable >= 1 set hasHuntingRifle to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapKnifeCombatNonPlayable >= 1 set hasCombatKnife to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapKnifeNonPlayable >= 1 set hasKnife to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapLeadPipeNonPlayable >= 1 set hasLeadPipe to 1 endif
if getItemCount DLC04WeapTireIronNonPlayable >= 1 set hasTireIron to 1 endif
End
Begin onActivate
if IsActionRef player == 1
if getDead == 1
if deadCheckInventory == 0
set deadCheckInventory to 1
if hasBat == 1 additem CondBaseballBatNPC 1 removeItem DLC04WeapBaseballBatNonPlayable 9999 set hasBat to -1 endif
if hasBBGun == 1 additem CondBBGunNPC 1 removeItem DLC04WeapBBGunNonPlayable 9999 set hasBBGun to -1 endif
if hasHuntingRifle == 1 additem CondHuntingRifleNPCDC 1 removeItem DLC04WeapHuntingRifleNonPlayable 9999 set hasHuntingRifle to -1 endif
if hasCombatKnife == 1 additem CondKnifeCombatNPC 1 removeItem DLC04WeapKnifeCombatNonPlayable 9999 set hasCombatKnife to -1 endif
if hasKnife == 1 additem CondKnifeNPC 1 removeItem DLC04WeapKnifeNonPlayable 9999 set hasKnife to -1 endif
if hasLeadPipe == 1 additem CondLeadPipeNPC 1 removeItem DLC04WeapLeadPipeNonPlayable 9999 set hasLeadPipe to -1 endif
if hasTireIron == 1 additem CondTireIronNPC 1 removeItem DLC04WeapTireIronNonPlayable 9999 set hasTireIron to -1 endif
endif endif endif
activate
End

scn DLC04FF02MarcellaSCRIPT
; Marcella NPC Script
begin gameMode
if getStageDone DLC04FF02 10 == 1 && getStageDone DLC04FF02 20 == 0 && DLC04MarcellaRef.getDead == 0 if player.getInCell DLC04Mansion01 == 1 ; safety net to ensure the player doesn't see her in the mansion DLC04MarcellaREF.moveTo DLC04MansionParentMarker endif endif
end
begin onDeath
; if the player has taken the quest but Marcella dies before book is retrieved ; and obadiah is already dead ; quest has nothing to do, so fail it.
if getStageDone DLC04FF02 10 == 1 && getStageDone DLC04FF02 30 == 0 if DLC04ObadiahREF.getDead == 1 setStage DLC04FF02 151 endif endif
end

scn DLC04DarMuckLauncherSCRIPT
; This lives on the activator which will animate, then spawn a bubble.
;======================================================
ref myLinkRef
float timer
float placeTimer
float rndTime
short active ; our on/off flag
short doOnceA
short launchPos
short init
short spawned ; have I spawned a bubble this
float ang
;======================================================
begin gameMode
if init == 0 set active to 1 set launchPos to 1 set timer to 0 set placeTimer to 5.75 set myLinkRef to GetLinkedRef set init to 1 playgroup forward 0 endif
if active == 1
if (IsAnimPlaying forward == 1) if (doOnceA == 0) if (placeTimer < 0) PlaceAtMe DLC04DarMuckBubble 1 set doOnceA to 1 else set placeTimer to (placeTimer -GetSecondsPassed) endif endif endif
if spawned == 0 if isAnimPlaying forward == 0 set spawned to 1 ; spawn a bubble
; if (launchPos == 1) ; myLinkRef.placeatme DLC04DarMuckNudge 1 10 0 ; set launchPos to 2 ; endif ; if (launchPos == 2) ; myLinkRef.placeatme DLC04DarMuckNudge 1 10 1 ; set launchPos to 3 ; endif ; if (launchPos == 3) ; myLinkRef.placeatme DLC04DarMuckNudge 1 10 2 ; set launchPos to 4 ; endif ; if (launchPos == 4) ; myLinkRef.placeatme DLC04DarMuckNudge 1 10 3 ; set launchPos to 1 ; endif
myLinkRef.placeatme DLC04DarMuckNudge
;fireWeapon DLC04MuckLobber ;PlaceAtMe DLC04DarMuckBubble 1 playgroup backward 0 endif elseif spawned == 1 if isAnimPlaying backward == 0 ; then the loop must be over with. Finish bubble launch anim. playgroup forward 0
;Play idle loop for random interval. set doOnceA to 0 set placeTimer to 5.75 set rndTime to 0.05 * Getrandompercent ; => 0.00 to 4.95 set timer to rndTime if timer > 0 set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) elseif timer <= 0 set spawned to 0 endif endif endif
endif
; hacky on rotation stuff
set ang to getAngle Z set ang to (ang + 0.01) setAngle Z ang
end
;======================================================
; if timer > 0 ; set timer to (timer - getSecondsPassed) ; elseif timer <= 0 ; ; reset timer ; ;set active to 0 ; set spawned to 0 ; set timer to 10 ; playgroup forward 0 ; endif

scn DLC04DarMuckBubbleSCRIPT
short onLoad short moveOnce short cleanUp short visOnce short disableOnce
float timer float visTimer float cleanUpTimer
float zPos
Begin GameMode
if (onLoad == 0) set timer to 0.1 * Getrandompercent set timer to (timer + 4) set visTimer to .8 set zPos to GetPos z set onLoad to 1 set visOnce to 1 set disableOnce to 1 endif
if (moveOnce == 0) set zPos to (zPos + 2) SetPos Z zPos set MoveOnce to 1 endif
if (visTimer > 0 && visOnce == 1) set visTimer to (visTimer - GetSecondsPassed) elseif (visTimer <= 0 && visOnce == 1) playgroup forward 1 set visOnce to 0 endif
if (timer < 0 && disableOnce ==1) Do 1 Disable set disableOnce to 0 set cleanUp to 1 set cleanUpTimer to 3 else set timer to (timer - GetSecondsPassed) endif
if (GetDestructionStage >= 2 && disableOnce ==1) Disable set cleanUp to 1 set cleanUpTimer to .3 set disableOnce to 0 endif
if ( cleanUp == 1 ) if ( cleanUpTimer > 0) set cleanUpTimer to (cleanUpTimer - GetSecondsPassed) elseif ( cleanUpTimer <= 0) markForDelete set cleanUp to 0 endif endif
End

scn DLC04MuckBubbleQuestSCRIPT
short MuckBubbleSync
Begin GameMode
set MuckBubbleSync to (MuckBubbleSync + 1)
End

scn DLC04ManBaseFloorHoleSoundSCRIPT

Begin onTriggerEnter Player if (doOnceA == 0) DLC04ManTribalSecondStage01REF.kill DLC04ManTribalSecondStage02REF.kill DLC04ManTribalSecondStage03REF.kill Player.PlaySound NPCHumanDLC04PlayerCrash ;Player.PlaySound NPCHumanDLC04FloorBreakLand set doOnceA to 1 endif End

scn DLC04ManKillWingTRIGSCRIPT

ref actionRef

set actionRef to GetActionRef
if (actionRef.GetInFaction DLC04TribalHostileFaction) actionRef.Kill endif
End
