ESP.TRADUIT: 奥巴迪亚致玛塞拉的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Marcella -
I'm not imagining it; they're getting closer with each passing night. The dogs are gone - or taken for sacrifice, more like. I don't like to rely on superstition to keep them at bay, but there's no way I can fight them off if they take a mind to attack my home.
I don't know who else to turn to, Marcella. I'm skeptical, but I think we may be able to trust this outsider to help.
Obadiah
ESP.TRADUIT:
玛塞拉 -
不是我在想象什么，每一天他们都在慢慢逼近。狗都跑了，不过更可能是作了祭品。我不喜欢靠迷信来阻止他们，但是又没有别的办法，如果他们决意攻击我的房子我一定会招架不住的。
我不知道还能找谁帮忙了，玛塞拉. 我不会轻易相信人，但是我觉得或许我们可以相信这个外乡人来帮助我们。
奥巴迪亚

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bysshe Energy Partners has authorized Natural Gas Survey project MD-16-001 to perform field research. Private Contractor Caroline Saunders shall be present as Principal Geological Chemist on behalf of Bysshe Natural Gas Co. Local authorization for this expedition is granted in agreement with the Isla Negra Real Estate company, with representatives located locally.
Principal Chemist Saunders is to take multiple soil samples and report on concentration of natural gas resources. Her spoken authorization signature will be needed on at least three Survey Sites to conduct further research in this area. Should these authorizations be granted, use this terminal to access expeditionary supplies to continue data gathering while Bysshe Co. extraction crews are assembled.
Intern Research Assistants: Lovett, K Roach, M Rourke, L Antwon, P
ESP.TRADUIT:
彼希能源伙伴公司已经许可天然气研究项目MD-16-001进行实地研究。私人承包商卡罗琳.桑德斯将会出任首席地质化学家，并全权代表彼希天然气公司。以在当地设代表为条件和黑岛房地产公司达成了一致，对于此项探险活动的本地许可已经被通过。
首席地质化学家桑德斯将会对土壤进行一些采样，并且报告天然气资源的浓度。至少有三家研究机构需要她的口头授权签名来进行进一步的研究。一旦这些许可被批准，待彼希公司的回收小组集结后，使用这台终端领取勘探补给以继续进行数据采集工作。
研究实习助手： 洛维特, K 小强, M 罗克, L 安特万, P
1207号储物箱 - 间谍语音密码
美国海军国防情报局研究报告

ESP.ORIGINAL: Local community informants provided intelligence leading to the capture and arrest of a priority person of interest, Wan Yang, aka Five Claw Dragon. Yang is on file with DIA as a Chinese Intelligence field agent, operating within America and Canada over the past decade. Yang has been transferred to Turtledove Detention Camp for interrogation. Our office has so far declined comments to press and diplomats. Please have DoD relations advise regarding a public statement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 本地线人向我们提供了重大嫌疑人“五爪龙”杨婉的的情报，帮助我们成功的找到并逮捕了她。杨已在国防情报局备案，是中国特务，在过去的十年中一直在美国与加拿大区域间流窜。杨已经被转送到斑鸠拘留所接受审讯。我们办公室目前拒绝向新闻媒体及国际就此发表任何评论。请向国防部询问关于公开声明的指示。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bulletin: Attention Citizens of Pt. Lookout! Wan Yang, suspected communist and Chinese sympathizer, has been reported in the vicinity of Point Lookout. Agent Yang may be operating under an alias and/or using a disguise. You are required to report any suspicious persons or behavior to Lt. Krumfolz (DIA) at the US Recruitment Station located at 1811 St. Mary’s Branch. Known Aliases: Jamie Patrick, Maria Lopez, Stanley Derrick, Five-Claw Dragon
ESP.TRADUIT: 公告：望海崖地区市民请注意！ 杨婉，可疑的共产主义者并持亲中国的态度，已经被发现在附近活动。杨可能使用化名或是采用伪装以掩饰身份。一旦发现任何可以人物或行为，请向海军少校克伦普霍尔兹（国防情报局）报告。地址是圣玛丽支路1811号，海军征兵站。 可能的化名是：杰米.帕特里克、 玛丽亚.洛佩兹、斯坦利.德里克、 五爪龙

ESP.ORIGINAL:
My darling little Nade,
I know life wasn't always the best at home, and we've had a few rough winters. I don't blame you for running off to find something better. At your age, you think you're wasting away at home while the world's just waiting for you to come get it.
When I was about your age, I ran off from my mom, too. And even though there were some terrible things along the way, it ended with me having you, so I can't complain. I just wish you could have seen your grandmother. I wish I had a chance to see her again, myself.
If you're reading this, I just want you to know you're always welcome back home. Please, learn from my mistake, and don't stay away forever.
Missing you, XOXOXO Mom
ESP.TRADUIT:
我亲爱的小纳徳，
我知道在家里的日子并不那么愉快，而且我们捱过了好几个艰难的冬天。我并不是责备你为了寻找更好的生活而离开这个家。以你现在的年纪，你自然会认为呆在家纯粹是虚度光阴，而外面的世界则充满诱惑地等待着你征服。
当我像你这么大的时候还，我也曾经背着妈妈离家出走。即使这一路走来充满艰辛，但最后我却有了你，所以我想我没有什么可抱怨的。希望你去看过你的祖母了，我是多么希望我能再见我的祖母一面啊。
如果在读这封信，我只想你知道，家的大门永远对你敞开。亲爱的孩子，不要再犯我当年的错误，请记得回家。
想你， 吻你 妈妈

ESP.ORIGINAL:
>>TRANSMIT BEGIN>> Agent JIANG receive automated correspondence of Chinese Intelligence Ministry.
Remote Positive of Mission Parameters Satisfactory.
Orbital intelligence verifies SSN-37-1A termination
Please note following from intelligence officer AGENT_ID_UNAVAIL. ///////////////// "Agent, if you're receiving this message, then our satellites have registered the destruction of your objective. Well done. Please report to my personal bunker, hidden among the grounds of Calvert Mansion. Coordinates have been provided with this transmission.
The bunker entrance is hidden, of course. Your pair of Cryptochromatic Spectacles have been hidden in the water tank of the toilet in your safehouse. Retrieve them if you haven't already. Here is the sequence code to unlock the bunker:
1 3 2 3 4 4 2
Once inside, the Passphrase is : Seraphim Descending". I look forward to congratulating you personally, agent. <<<TRANSMIT END<<
ESP.TRADUIT:
>>开始传送>> 江收到了来自中国国家情报局的自动回复。
远距离侦测得到任务参数良好。
卫星图像证实SSN-37-1A自爆。
请跟随代号为“无用”的情报员进行记录。 ///////////////// “如果你读到了这条信息，我们的卫星已经记录下你成功地终结了目标。做得好，请到我的地下堡垒向我汇报，它掩藏在卡尔弗特公馆的空地下面。我们已经准备好到时候迎接你。 当然，地堡的入口是隐藏的。你的加密光谱眼镜已经放在了你藏身处的厕所水箱里。如果你还没取出来，现在快去拿吧。这里是地堡的解锁密码：
1 3 2 3 4 4 2
在进入后，暗号是：六翼天使降临”。我个人率先对你表示期待和祝贺，特工同志。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Greetings from Point Lookout!
Straight from the land of warm beaches and luscious wetlands comes the Duchess Gambit, the finest vessel on the east coast, piloted by Tobar the Ferryman.
And to the hungry masses of the Capital Wasteland, he brings the hearty punga fruit! A delicious and nutritious addition to your daily meal, its tangy taste is the most refreshing meal in the world.
Find the punga fruit at your local merchant now, or buy straight from the source at the Duchess Gambit, now docked south of the Citadel.
SPECIAL BONUS! Hey, adventurers! Itching to find Point Lookout's treasures for yourself? Talk with Tobar to book passage back to this land of mystery!
ESP.TRADUIT:
来自望海崖的问候！
温暖的沙滩，美丽的湿地风光，带给你的是这艘前往东海岸的最豪华的客轮，公爵夫人号。她的船主是托巴尔先生。
为来自首都废土饥肠辘辘的游客们，我们准备了美味的膨葛果！它绝对是一种美味又营养的佳肴，搭配您每日的饮食，可以算是这个世界上最鲜美的水果了。
现在你就可以在当地的零售商那里买到膨葛果，或者来船上买，这都是来自原产地的货色，目前就囤积在要塞南部。
特别额外注意！ 你们好，探险家们！迫不及待想要发现望海崖的宝藏了吧？来和托巴尔好好聊聊吧，如此就可以预先获得去神秘乐园的机会哦！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Self-Destruct Protocol Initiated. Engineer must activate failsafe switch in aft engine to confirm sequence.
Personnel will have less than one minute to evacuate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
自爆方案已经启动。工程师必须激活船尾引擎的故障保险开关以确认序列。
艇员有一分钟时间撤离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...loaded... Audio Saved to User Device... Begin transcription... /////////// I apologize that I cannot receive you in person, agent Jiang. Our Norfolk contact confirms your arrival. How eager the Americans are to believe that a great mind of the People would defect! Our countrymen will herald you as a hero when your work is done. To that end, let us turn to the details of your mission. This room will be your safehouse in Point Lookout. Focus initially on playing the American lapdog.Do not arouse suspicion. When it is safe, use the key you were given in Norfolk to open one of the public rental lockers on the boardwalk near the Motel. You will be provided with the password you'll need to access your mission dossier. Zhщ ni hбoyщn, agent Jiang. /////////// End auto-transcription... Compare to audio for accuracy...
ESP.TRADUIT: ...读取... 音频保存于用户设备... 开始录制... /////////// 我很抱歉我不能亲自去接收你，江。我们在诺福克的联系人已经确认了你的到来。美国人竟这么急切地想要相信，人民的伟大意志会叛变！当你完成你的使命，你的英雄事迹会在同胞间广为流传。为此，我们先看看你任务的细节情况。这个房间将会是你在望海崖的藏身处。一开始的时候你先逗逗美国的哈巴狗，不要引起怀疑。当确定安全之后，使用在诺福克时给你的钥匙，去打开汽车旅馆旁边的木板路上的某一个租用的保险柜。你将会收到你获得任务档案所需要的密码。祝你好运,江. /////////// 结束音频录制... 对比音频以确定精确度...

ESP.ORIGINAL:
In compliance with our our parent company, Isla Negra Holdings, we are installing a new security system for our safety-deposit customers. In addition to conventional tumbler locks, the new system will offer a keyless voice-recognition lock alternative.
Tellers are asked to encourage both existing and new safety-deposit customers to sign up for this new service.
ESP.TRADUIT:
应我们的母公司黑岛控股要求，我们正在为了我们的顾客建造一个新的安全系统。除了常见的杠杆锁之外，新的安全系统将会增加一个语音识别的警报器。
出纳员们务必向新老储户推荐这项新式服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All tellers are reminded to be on the lookout for any customers attempting to exchange foreign currency. Civil Defense has asked us to be especially vigilant of customers possessing Chinese Yuan notes. Should you encounter such a customer, trigger the silent alarm and attempt to delay the customer without arousing their suspicion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有出纳都要注意，当顾客要求兑换外币的时候要特别留心。地方防御力量要求我们特别注意手持人民币的顾客。只要出现这样的人，立马按下隐蔽报警键并设法拖延他，不管他是否可疑。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Shift Closing Notes 10/18/77 ________________________ Several Large-sum wire transfers today. We need to notify the feds in the AM.
You'll need to replenish large bills. Payday is coming up.
Another complaint about the voice-activated locks in the safety-deposit room. Dorothy came in to fetch Bern's will and we couldn't get the box open because his voice was the only one configured for authorization. I figure it's a long shot, but I told Dorothy to go home and see if she has any holotapes or such of Bern talking. We might get lucky and fool the lock into opening if we play it back in there.
ESP.TRADUIT:
交班记录 10/18/77 ________________________ 今天有好几笔电汇，我们需要赶在上午完成工作。
需要补充很多现金，快要到发薪日了。
另外，又有一个关于私人保险箱的新声控锁的投诉。多萝西来取伯尔尼的遗嘱，但是我们没有她声音的认证无法打开门。我估计这不是立马就能解决的，但我还是叫她回家找找，看能否发现录着他声音的磁带。把它拿到这里来播放，如果走运的话，或许我们能骗过声控系统，把门弄开。
密码记录 - 鸟舍特务地堡

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Evaluate Medical and Social needs of local populace. Raise awareness of health risks and provide aid on a local need basis. Assist with Federal Fitness Registry Compliance program.
Volunteers must always uphold the standards of The “Collective Benevolence” program in public and private.
ESP.TRADUIT:
评估当地人们的医疗和社会需求。增加对安全潜在风险的关注，并按地方基本安全需求提供帮助。协助联邦健康注册合规项目。
志愿者们在公开和私人场合均要维护集体慈善活动的标准。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arrived with first carload of volunteers today; Federal presence is nil. I guess the registry program came and went here at some point. There’s some leftover equipment from them I’ve been authorized to remove from storage and use. We’ve got some basic antibiotics and hygiene supplies, and a couple boxes of New Plague awareness pamphlets. Not much to work with yet, but we were at least able to get settled into the motel. For now I’ll focus on setting up our outreach center with Victoria while the rest of our volunteers get out into the community and get a feel for their situation here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天随第一批志愿者到达；没有联邦代表出席。我猜测登记程序已经开始有一段时间了。他们剩下了一些设备在仓库里，我已获准可以拿去用了。我们获得了一些基本抗生素和卫生物品补给，以及几箱子新的防疫小册子。目前没多少可以做了，但是我们至少在汽车旅馆住下了。现在我和维多利亚要集中精力建设我们的外部信息中心。其他志愿者外出去社区，感受一下他们这里的气氛吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The location we were given as our outreach center was a joke. The place is half-built and what’s been put together so far looks like it’s going to fall in on itself anytime. The real estate company wasn’t much help. I sent a request for some field supplies so we can set up an outdoor center until this situation can be improved upon. My volunteers are telling me that a lot of the area lacks basic infrastructure, so we’ll probably want to get started with some basic vaccines and sanitation supplies. I included some of this on today’s purchase request, but I don’t feel like we’ve got enough of a grasp on the local situation to request much more than that just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留给我们建设外部信息中心的地方简直像个笑话。这里根本就没建好，简直是随便拼凑的而且看上去随时都会倒塌。房地产公司也帮不上什么忙。我发送了一份请求，想要块儿地，这样的话我们可以在这里情况好转之前先建设好我们的户外信息中心。我的志愿者们告诉我，这里很多地方都缺少基础设施。所以，我们可能的从基本的疫苗和医疗设施做起。我把其中的一些列在了今天的采购单中，但我觉得以这里的条件，想弄到这些来开始我们的工作似乎不太容易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Victoria was badly wounded today. She took a truck of supplies out to the Ark & Dove Cathedral beyond the river. Most of the locals we want to help are living in primitive dwellings in the wetlands. The Cathedral offered the closest public building to that area. She wasn’t in much state to give details, but it sounds like nobody was around when she arrived. She ventured into the swamps to try and make contact with locals at one of the shacks out there. The paramedics are treating a wound on the back of her head. She’ll be okay, but it sounds like her skull was fractured. Victoria doesn’t remember anything beyond blacking out. There was nothing stolen from her person or the medical supplies, but I’m still going to err on the side of caution and forbid volunteers from wandering out there alone. We’ll do the best we can from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天维多利亚受了重伤。她当时正开卡车往河对岸的方舟与和平鸽大教堂送一批补给。我们的援助对象大多还住在湿地中那些很原始的房子里。是教堂是那一片周围最近的公共住房。目前的状况来看是没法从她那里知道更多细节了，但是听说当她到那里的时候，那里空无一人。她想要进入沼泽中和其中一座棚屋里的当地居民联系。而现在留给医护人员只有位于她后脑的一处伤口。她会好起来的，但听说她的头骨骨折了。昏过去之前的事情她都记不得了。她随身的物品以及补给都没有被偷，但是我出于小心起见，将会禁止志愿者们单独前往那里，我们这里还会尽最大努力处理一切的。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Safeguard yourself and your community by knowing how to identify a person suffering from the New Plague. Common symptoms include:
* Profuse Sweating * Unexplained Contusions/Swelling * Massive External Hemorrhaging * New Ideals, such as socialism
ESP.TRADUIT: 学会如何辨别一个感染了新瘟疫的人，保卫你和你的社区，新瘟疫的常见的症状有： * 过度流汗 * 无法解释的挫伤或是肿胀 * 大量的外部出血 * 出现新的意识形态，比如社会主义

ESP.ORIGINAL:
When you believe you’ve come into contact with a person exhibiting one or more or these tell-tale signs, remember to C I R:
C - Confirm Symptoms. Approach the person suffering from symptoms if no Civil or Medical professional is available to do so. Verify that the subject is exhibiting symptoms of New Plague.
I - Isolate! Once it’s been established that a case of New Plague may be present, separate yourself and the person exhibiting symptoms from the general population, as the New Plague is notoriously contagious.
R - Report! Report directly to the nearest Federal Fitness Registry of Medical Center and let the professionals handle it from there!
ESP.TRADUIT:
一旦你确定你遇见了一个或更多具有以上症状的人，请记得“CIR”三个字母：
C - 确认症状。 如果没有医疗专家的情况下，亲自接近这该人，确定其表现出新瘟疫的症状。
I - 隔离！ 一旦确定可能出现新瘟疫，介于新瘟疫的高度传染性，将你自己和疑似瘟疫患者与公众隔离开。
R - 报告！ 直接向最近的联邦医疗中心健康登记处报告，并且让专家们去处理这一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The New Plague is what’s commonly known as a “social disease”. This means that the New Plague is especially contagious and can be commonly caught in the course of social interactions such as: * Ice Cream Socials * Cruising Main Street * Promiscuous Activity/Sodomy * Attending Fairs or Festivals
So; what’s the best protection against social diseases? Why not stay home and enjoy a novel or home-cooked meal? Limiting your exposure to other individuals is the best and more surefire way to avoid contracting the New Plague.
ESP.TRADUIT:
众所周知，新瘟疫是一场社会性疾病。这就意味着它具有高度的传染性，而极易在日常生活交往中传播，比如： * 结伴去冷饮店 * 逛街 * 滥交/鸡奸 * 参加节日等大型活动
既然如此，怎么样才是最好的对付社会性疾病的方法呢？为什么不呆在家里自娱自乐，读读小说做做饭呢？减少你与他人的接触是最好最有效地避免接触瘟疫的方法。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
CODE BLUE PRO#%COL FOR IMMEDIATE IM>>EMENTATION [|///] [We b@(ieve Saunders has made contact <corruption> academic contact. Wire communication records ^^^^^^ that Saunders is attempting to #$(*KLL lye concentrations associated with decomposed <corruption>. Enact Code Blue Protocol, leave no evidence.] [] [REPEAT: Enact Code &#}} Protocol]
MEMLEAK HD00AX
ESP.TRADUIT:
蓝色代号协议 紧急情况IM>>修订 [|///] [我们xi@ng信桑德斯已经和 学术机构。无线电通讯记录Bi@o明，桑德斯准备 #$(* 除掉她使用高浓度分解。执行蓝色代号协议，不要留下证据。] [] [重复：执行蓝 &#}} 代号协议]
存储泄露 HD00AX

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Michaelson,
I know that this facility was built to withstand the unique pressures of suboceanic earthen construction, but recently I have had a few concerns about the integrity of the initial work. My staff have noticed more than a few leaks without logical source and it has a number of them very nervous and I have to say, I share their apprehension.
Grohlman at the facilities office assures me that the pumps and pressure regulators will keep this facility dry and clean for hundreds of years on their internal batteries, but given his history with this sort of thing, I'm not exactly comforted by his claims. I am hoping that you can find an inspector with the proper clearances to give us an independent evaluation of the lab. An outside certification will make us all feel better.
Thanks,
Dr. Stewart
ESP.TRADUIT:
麦克尔森,
我知道，这设备的建立是为了抵挡海底土制建筑的压力，但是最近我开始关心起了初期工程的完整性。我的工作人员发现了不止一处泄漏，而且找不到原因，这让他们很担心。而且我得说，我和他们一样。
设备办公室的格罗尔曼向我保证，那些泵和压力调节器以它们目前的电量，足以确保这设备几百年的干燥清洁；但是考虑到他的出事记录，我对这样的说法并不太相信。我希望你可以找到一个有足够权威的调查者，对我们的实验室进行一次独立的评估。相信一位外来的专家会令我们感觉好点。
谢谢，
斯图尔特博士

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To All Level Seven Assistants,
It has been brought to my attention that a number of you have been conversing with test subjects during your off hours. This is a reminder that any attempts at social engagement with clinical participants is a violation of facility rule 47. Social interaction interferes with the cerebral infusion, and can cause a number of potential problems once the procedure reaches completion.
So, once again. Do not speak to participants and be sure to limit any internal monologue to the list found in section 2.3 of your procedure guides when in their presence. I have little patience for shenaniganery.
Dr. Stewart
ESP.TRADUIT:
致所有的第七级助手们，
我已经注意到你们中的一些人总是在休息时间偷偷跟实验对象聊天。我必须提醒大家，任何与临床试验对象进行的社交活动，都违反了本设施的规章第47条。人际交流会干涉大脑内的注入物，可能会在进程即将结束时引发潜在问题。
所以，我再次申明，不要和实验对象说话，还有在有实验对象在场的情况下，尽量不要提及工序手册上2、3部分所说的内容。我对你们的欺骗已经没有任何耐心了。
斯图尔特博士

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Memo To All Staff:
As a reminder, only authorized archive technicians are permitted access to the microfiche library. Several records have gone missing, and I would like them to be returned to the archives immediately. No questions will be asked, assuming their safe return within 48 hours.
Really, people. Find better ways to amuse yourselves. We have work to do down here.
Dr. Stewart
ESP.TRADUIT:
给所有员工的备忘录：
给大家提个醒，只有经过许可的档案技术员可以进入微缩单片图书馆。许多记录都丢失了，我想要他们立刻回到档案中。只要它们48小时之内回到原位，我就当这事儿没发生过。
真的，朋友们，上其他地方找乐子吧，我们这儿有正经事情要做。
斯图尔特博士

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To: Laura Stewart, Head Researcher From: Adam Tomco, Archivist
Dr. Stewart,
I hate to be a bother, but it happened again. Records 48, 51, and 55 are missing. I know it was Danielson and Peruto. I know it! Those two are always messing with me, and no matter how many reports I file with the main office, they are never disciplined! Ever! You and I both know that it's because Danielson's uncle is married to Senator Calvert's daughter! Can't you stop it? Do something? I can't take this any more! This nepotism makes me sick!
-Adam
ESP.TRADUIT:
至：劳拉.斯图尔特 ，研究带头人 来自：亚当.托姆科，档案保管员
斯图尔特博士，
我真不想打打扰您，但是又出事儿。第48、51和55号记录不见了。我知道这是丹尼尔森和佩鲁托干的，我知道！他们两个总是给我找麻烦，不管我怎么向总局反映情况，他们从来都不知道约束自己！我们都知道，这就是因为丹尼尔森的叔叔和议员卡尔弗特的女儿结婚了！你就不能管管这事儿么？试试看呢？我对此已经不能忍受了！这样任人唯亲下去，我感到很恶心！
-亚当

ESP.ORIGINAL:
To :Adam Tomco From: Unknown Sender
Hey Rat,
What? You don't like people having a little fun? Huh? Well, we'll see how fun it is for you when you're out on the street looking for work. You tattled on the wrong guy!
ESP.TRADUIT:
至：亚当.托姆科 来自：未知发件人
你这个告密的小人，
怎么？你不希望别人有自己的一点乐趣么？这样，我们倒是要看看如果你丢了饭碗，到大街上去找工作的时候是不是也会很有趣呢！你找错人了！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By using the data that we collected from the researchers at General Atomics at the close of the Robobrain Project, we've been able to fully mimic the brain suspension and isolation technique that makes the Robobrains function.
What's better: we've make some interesting advances. It turns out that by manipulating the composition of the biomed gel, we are able to produce a number of effects that were previously thought to be impossible.
It seems that Dr. Stewart was right. Under the right conditions, a subject not only retains full mental capacity, but can project limited images and even thoughts to other minds when the correct conditions are introduced in the biomed suspension. (Details on this composition can be found in Research Archive 51, Section B) This has profound implications for applications from battlefield technology to civilian criminal interrogation.
Although, one must wonder if years of isolation in a biogel suspension would eventually introduce psychological abnormalities. This merits further study once the full breadth of the current research is explored.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们在机器人脑工程的末期，从来自美国通用原子公司的研究员那里收集了一些数据。通过这些数据，我们能够充分地模仿大脑避震和离析技术，这也正是机器人大脑的工作原理。
更好的是：我们取得了一些有趣的进展。通过操纵生物医学凝胶的成分，我们能制造出一些原先不敢想象的效果。
看来斯图尔特博士是对的。在适当的条件下，实验对象不仅能保持完整的心理能力，而且在医用缓冲液状态合适的情况下，它还能向其他思想传输有限的图像甚至是思想。（关于这一组成的细节情况可以在研究档案51的B部分找到）这对战争科技乃至罪犯审讯技术都会产生深远的影响。
然而，依然有问题的是，长期隔绝在医用缓冲液内，可能会使得一个人产生心理上的异常。当研究达到了这样的程度时，这个课题值得继续探究。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Despite the early stage of our research, Dr. Stewart has informed us that Senator Calvert is demanding a full report on our work immediately. It seems that he is sending his brother, a noted researcher in the field of cognitive robotic, to this very lab in order to participate in our study and assist us with the report.
I have to say, I hesitate to show our work to anyone outside the lab. It's still very early and very unstable. It will be decades before we can be sure that the cognitive broadcast technology is stable, let alone ready for implementation.
Perhaps Dr. Stewart can hold off the arrival of Professor Calvert for a few more months. At least that would give us some time to come to better conclusions.
ESP.TRADUIT:
尽管我们之前的研究已经取得了一定的阶段性成果，斯图尔特博士通知我们，卡尔弗特议员需要一份关于我们目前工作的完整的报告书。看起来他准备派他的兄弟来，他是一位在机器人认知学方面声名卓著的研究者。而且他会带着这份报告来到我们这里参与并指导工作的。
我不得不说我有点犹豫是不是要把我们的进展向这个实验室以外的人透露，现在它还只是初现雏形，而且很不稳定。我们需要数十年的时候才能确定认知广播技术是否稳定，更不要说完成这项工程了。
或许斯图尔特博士可以使得卡尔弗特迟来几个月。至少那可以让我们得出更稳妥的结论。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ozwaldo,
The footlocker is buried on the island with a single tree in the Dove Delta. Be careful, I peppered the area with a bunch of fake mounds just incase the Hughes gang finds this location.
Regards Benny
ESP.TRADUIT:
奥兹瓦尔多，
军用提箱埋在岛上和平鸽三角洲，它的旁边只有一棵树。你要小心，为了防止休斯的匪徒们发现这里，我事先在这里做了一些伪装的土堆。
致敬 本尼
玛塞拉的日志 - 奥巴迪亚

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Met local by name of Obadiah Blackhall. He lives in an old manor by himself. Class A manipulator. He solicited me to recover a book, which he claimed to be a family heirloom. The man gives me a bad feeling. I want to investigate this book and his connection to the swampfolk of the region, but he was reluctant when pressed for more information.
UPDATE: Confirmed Blackhall connection with regional beliefs. Appears that a recent ancestor to Obadiah, named Constance Blackhall, acquired obscure text known as Krivbeknih. Not good - have heard mention of the book before. Must destroy.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我遇见来了当地一个叫奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔的人，他独自一人住在一座旧庄园，当然他应该是个好管家。他请求我为他复原一本书，他说那是他的传家宝。他给我一种很不好的感觉，我想要仔细研究这本书，找出他和这个地区的沼泽住民之间的关系，但是当我问到他更多信息的时候，他总是支支吾吾。
更新：我确定了他和本地的神秘宗教之间的关系。看上去奥巴迪亚的一名近世先祖康斯坦斯·布莱克霍尔，获得了一本隐秘的书，名叫《黑暗圣经》.我听说过这本书，据说它是不祥的，必须被毁掉。
玛塞拉的日志 - 托巴尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ferryman quite a character. Dubious on the Faith, but tolerant at least to hear my ministrations. Seems there's quite a bit more to the man, and he certainly isn't without the smell of sin about him. Will visit periodically while in Point Lookout to preach if he'll have me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个船夫是个很古怪的人，他对宗教不太感冒，但是至少对我的建议和帮助还是能够接受的。似乎这个人身上还有更多的秘密，而且他并不是一个对自己的罪恶无动于衷的人。会定期来瞭望角，只要他愿意，我将会定时前来向他布道。
玛塞拉的日志 - 部落土著

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You have done well to get this far, Agent Jiang. Your payment has been transacted to your next of kin under the pre-text of a ration lottery.
With deepest regret, however, your life must now be terminated for the good of the People's Republic. Go with dignity, honorable soldier!
ESP.TRADUIT:
到目前为止你非常的出色，江。你的奖金已经被夹在配给票下面送到你家属手里了。
虽然我们表示遗憾，但是为了国家的利益，你现在必须牺牲了。带着尊严离去吧，光荣的战士！
美国海军国防情报局研究报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hunter spent another session in interrogation room B with the surviving crew member from the Chinese spy sub Navy is attempting recovery on. This guy's demonstrating extraordinary fortitude for a relatively low-ranking grunt. Can't say the Chinese don't make good soldiers out of their boys. I'm sure this one would have gone the same way as his skipper if the cyanide capsule in his molar hadn't been a dud.
Hunter requested method B interrogation clearance, so I'm putting through to Quantico for that in the morning.
ESP.TRADUIT:
亨特又在B审讯室跟那个幸存的艇员谈了一阵子，我们的人正试图恢复艇上的可用情报。作为一个低级步兵，他所表现得异乎寻常的不屈不挠。不得不说中国训练出的军人都是好样的。我相信如果他臼齿里的胶囊没有失效的话，他现在早就跟他的艇长一个下场了。
亨特要求许可进行方案B，所以我早晨得去趟匡蒂科 把这事儿搞定.
美国海军国防情报局研究报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Federal Agencies have added a new person of interest to our watch list.
Doctor Jiang is a Chinese National defector. Naturalization agents in Norfolk processed his defection after jumping over from a merchant ship he was stowed away on. Jiang was apparently in communication with a US Naval Intelligence contact for some months prior. He's reportedly brokered an immunity deal in exchange for his help recovering intelligence from the downed submarine off our coast.
Jiang is staying in room 1D at the Homestead Motel off the boardwalk. We're explicitly forbidden from issuing a search warrant against this location, but are authorized to monitor his activities in public.
ESP.TRADUIT:
联邦局增列一个嫌疑目标。
江博士是一位中国叛逃者。他原先藏在一艘商船上，后来又跳了下去，被移民局的人发现。很显然江几个月前一直在和一位美国海军情报部门的人联系。据传他们之间有笔交易，他提出帮助我们复原坏在海岸线附近的那艘潜艇里面的情报，以此换取豁权。
江现在位于木板路的如家汽车旅馆1D房间。有严令禁止我们对这一地区发搜查令，但是我们可以公开监视他的活动。
美国海军国防情报局研究报告

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wan, Yang. Suspected Chinese Operative. Previous incarceration, 2062 in Canada suspected in connection with Niagara sabotage. Yang escaped custody during transport to Albany, NY. Intelligence reports of Chinese activity in Maryland prompted local search efforts, which yielded an anonymous tip leading to Yang's capture and transfer to Turtledove Detention Camp. Demonstrates remarkable resistance to interrogation, but yielded **CLASSIFIED**, connecting the Chinese Intelligence community to **CLASSIFIED**. <Admin Notice: File altered by Intelligence Officer SN#182-129>
ESP.TRADUIT: 杨婉，可疑的中国特务。她先前也受过监禁，2062年在加拿大，被怀疑与尼亚加拉恐怖活动有关。杨在被押往纽约奥尔巴尼的时候逃跑了。有关中国人在马里兰活动的情报引起了当地有关部门的注意，最终一个匿名情报使杨落网并被扭送斑鸠拘留所。面对审讯表现强硬，但是产生了**机密**， 联系中国情报委员会以**机密**。
美国海军国防情报局研究报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Brenner observed suspicious activity after lights out yesterday. Prisoners apparently snuck into morgue overnight. He had the good sense not to apprehend them before reporting the event. We've known for some time about a septic runoff access point in the basement which would be a good candidate for escapees. The runoff flows southwest of the camp about a quarter of a mile or so.
We'll keep a low profile about this and post guards in the area. They could make their break any night. Meanwhile I'll try and find an excuse to send somebody down there and check it out without arousing suspicion. I'd rather catch them in the act.
ESP.TRADUIT:
布伦纳昨天熄灯之后观察到了可疑的行为。囚犯们深夜偷偷爬进了太平间。他明智地选择了没有在报告之前逮捕他们。我们对于地下室中那条被腐蚀出来的径流已经了解了一段时间，而这很可能会成为逃犯们的首选。这条径流通往营地西南方向，距离大概是四分之一英里。
我们会对此保持低调并派往这一区域加派安保。他们可能说不定哪天晚上就会逃走的。同时我会试着找个借口派人下去调查一下，而又不引起他们的怀疑。我想，最好是能将他们当场抓获。
美国海军国防情报局研究报告

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yang succumbed under method D interrogation during the afternoon. Medical examiner called in and verified cause of death as natural for the records. She's filed away in the morgue downstairs for now, locker TD-0181. We're running out of space down there and may need to do a disposal early this quarter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天下午杨没能捱过审讯方案D，已经叫法医开了自然死亡的证明。她现在躺在楼下的停尸间里，柜号TD-0181。下面已经快没有空间了，可能这个季度要进行一次清理。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Protocol Codes: CONFIRMED
**Engineer must engage Failsafe Switch to confirm Self-Destruct
ESP.TRADUIT:
自曝密码：已确认
**工程师必须启动故障保险开关以确定自爆。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
CLASSIFIED DIRECTIVES CHINESE NAVAL COMMAND Mission Parameters: Routine Patrol/Observation
Vessel SSN-37-1A is ordered to patrol hostile waters between: +38° 3' 36.00", -76° 18' 36.00" +37° 49' 41.61", -76° 0' 37.02" +37° 5' 60.00", -76° 1' 12.00"
Variations from patrol are tolerated as required by evasive circumstances. Crew is under strict instruction not to engage enemy if detected. Self-destruct protocol must be initiated in event of imminent capture. Status updates are required at six hour intervals by one-way burst comm on orbital frequency #K17.18.v121.
ESP.TRADUIT:
机密指令 中国海军司令部 任务参数： 例行巡逻/监视
舰艇SSN-37-1A被要求巡逻敌方水域范围： +38?3' 36.00", -76?18' 36.00" +37?49' 41.61", -76?0' 37.02" +37?5' 60.00", -76?1' 12.00"
为逃避追踪，允许临时改变巡航路线。全体艇员必须严格按照指示，暴露后严禁交火。在无法逃脱的情况下，必须启动自爆装置。情报必须每隔六小时上报一次，使用短波通讯，通讯频率为#K17.18.v121。
玛塞拉的日志 - 离开联邦？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've done what good I can here. Need to get out before it catches up with me. Was able to barter passage on a boat headed south. Don't know where I'll end up, but that's the nature of His work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里已经倾尽所能了。我必须趁它没赶上我的时候逃离。混到了一张往南方去的船票。我不知道我最后会在哪里终结，但这正好是他的工作。
玛塞拉的日志 - 匹兹堡？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took shelter with a merchant caravan during a windstorm. More worrying tales from The Pitt. I wonder if my purpose will take me there one day? For now I must continue eastward to the Commonwealth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当暴风来临的时候，遇到了一只商队并和他们一起避难。更越来越多令人担忧的故事从匹兹堡传来。我怀疑我的意志能否保证我到达目的地，我现在必须继续向东寻找联邦。
玛塞拉的日志 - 首都废土

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tobar tied the Duchess up in the Capital Wasteland. I spent the afternoon trading at a place called Rivet City. Broke bread with a Father Clifford. Inspirational to see another believer of the Faith. Must make my way back here soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 船夫托巴把公爵夫人号停泊在首都废。我整个一下午都在一个叫铆钉城的地方做买卖，跟克利福德神父吃了顿饭。非常高兴能再见到又一个笃信教义的人。我必须尽快回到这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blue - Couldn’t raise you on the phone this morning, so I’m having Jenny bring you this note. Your delivery for the store got turned around on those new roads and had an accident. He’s run off the road by the Cathedral. They’ll need some time to sort things out, but Pagano probably won’t want to wait that long to replace the lighthouse’s beacon bulbs. You might want to get over to the wreck yourself and hand-deliver the bulbs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布鲁 - 我今早不能接你电话，所以我派詹尼给你送来这封信。你给商店的快递转到新路上去了，还发生了意外。邮递员在教堂那条路上把它弄掉了。现在需要一点时间去搞清楚这件事，但是帕加诺可能不会愿意等那么久去更换信号灯。你可能要亲自去送一趟了。
玛塞拉的日志 - 玩家

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey,
Those tribals cut your head up good, didn't they? Happened to us all, and you're lucky you've still got most of your marbles.
Anyway, if you ever want to get rid of that scar, just ask me up at the Ark & Dove Cathedral. I've got a few tricks I picked up, and it's easier than trying to work on it yourself.
- Nadine
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好，
那些部落土著把你开了瓢，是吧？我们都经历过，你应该庆幸你现在还能用脑子想事儿。
无所谓了，你如果想要弄掉这块疤，就找我帮忙好了，我在方舟与和平鸽大教堂。我学了点手艺，这样一来可比你自己弄容易多了。
- 娜丁

ESP.ORIGINAL: At last! The world is rid of that sniveling, disgusting, arrogant, brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于！世界摆脱了那个哭哭啼啼让人作呕的傲慢脑袋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_greeting_00008321_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think of it! Everything he learned! Everything he had! It's all here and it's all MINE! MINE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想吧！他所学到的一切！他所拥有的一切！都在这儿，都是我的！我的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_greeting_00008321_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC04DesmondREF.DesmondPostQuestAction to 2 DLC04DesmondRef.evp SetStage DLC04MQPQ 10
I'm busy. What do you want?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_greeting_00010f2e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. More questions. I guess we're best fuckin' friends now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。更多的问题。我想咱他妈现在是最好的朋友了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_greeting_00010f2f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't aware that we had anything else to say to each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没发现咱们还有什么话可说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_greeting_00010f30_1.ogg
NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_greeting_00008322_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew it! I knew that little bastard was behind all this! After all these years, he's stuck his head out, and this is my chance to cut it off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了！原来这些小混蛋躲在这些事情背后！过了这么多年，他终于露头了，对我来说，这是一个除掉他的好机会！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_greeting_00005a1c_1.ogg
NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_greeting_00005a1c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there something on your mind?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_greeting_00006640_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not getting' any ideas, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没想出任何主意，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_greeting_0000b3c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful. Professor Calvert's a tricky git.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心。卡尔弗特教授是一个狡猾的蠢货。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_greeting_0000849d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's me little helper. Don't you have a job to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我的小帮手。你不是有工作要做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_greeting_00005a1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you in here starin' at me? Didn't I give you something to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么还站在这里盯着我？难道我没有告诉你你该去做什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_greeting_0000849e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again? Shouldn't you be climbing that wheel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你？难道你不应该爬进那汽车里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_greeting_0000849f_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000b845_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How dare you violate my inner sanctum!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_greeting_00008323_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I demand that you exterminate Desmond at once!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要求你立即终结德斯蒙德！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_greeting_00008323_2.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000b846_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000e497_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_00006be3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep up! He can't be far!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000b847_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000b848_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on! He can't be far!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds Comment (NAM2) : "What the hell? I've been waiting here for a long time!" EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000b849_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready to go, princess? I've got a rival to kill!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了吗，公主？有个竞争者需要我除掉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds Comment (NAM2) : "What the hell? I've been waiting here for a long time!" EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000b84a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you ready? Who knows what he could be setting up in there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了吗？谁知道他会在那里设置什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds Comment (NAM2) : "What the hell? I've been waiting here for a long time!" EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000b84b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What the hell? Are you ready to go yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 到底怎么了？你还没准备好？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds Comment (NAM2) : "What the hell? I've been waiting here for a long time!" EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_0000b84c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He doesn't have the body to fuckin' do it himself, so he tried to blow me up? ME? Well, this ends today. Desmond Lockheart will finally win out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没有到该死的身体自己来做，所以他试图炸毁我吗？我？那么，这个将于今日结束。德斯蒙德洛克哈特将最终胜出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_00008324_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know where he is. He overplayed his hand this time. You and me are going to walk in there and end this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他在哪里。他这一次高估了自己的形势。你和我去那边来结束这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_greeting_00008324_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have one chance. Exactly one chance to fucking redeem yourself in my eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有一次机会。确切的说，只有他妈的一次机会，来改变你在我眼中的形象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_000088f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are going to go in there, and we are going to end this once and for fucking all. And you will help, or you will be my enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要进那儿去，我们要把这帐一次算清。你要么帮我，要么就是我的敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_000088f7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you do NOT want to be my enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会想要做我的敌人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_000088f7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go! Before he has time to prepare!
ESP.TRADUIT: 走吧！趁他还没时间准备！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_0000a40c_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_0000a40d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can smell him! He's just through here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能嗅到她！他就在这儿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_0000a40e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At last! The world is rid of that sniveling, disgusting, arrogant brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终！世界摆脱了那个哭哭啼啼让人作呕的傲慢脑袋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_0000a40f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think of it! Everything he learned! Everything he had! It's all here and it's all MINE! MINE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想想吧！他所学到的一切！他所拥有的一切！都在这儿，都是我的！我的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_0000a40f_2.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_greeting_0000a410_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you waiting for? DESTROY HIM!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds
NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds
NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds
NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds
NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds
NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds
NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds

ESP.ORIGINAL: You shouldn't be here. Get out of my home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不该出现在这里，滚出我的房间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly. Seriously angry. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000e20d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You were paid for your errand. Leave my home. Now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会为你的任务付出代价的。从我家出去。现在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000fbeb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. What are you doing in my house?
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持距离，你在我家干什么 ?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_00002ef0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, good. People should be able to sit and have a conversation, especially in times like these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好很好，人们应该坐下来交流，特别像这样及时的进行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000f934_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Civil discourse; the greatest of our lost arts. Wouldn't you agree?
ESP.TRADUIT: 公民论述；我们丢失的最伟大的艺术品。你同意吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000f934_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The book. You've found it. Quickly, give it to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了这本书。快，给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000fbec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had a bargain, roughneck. Hand the book over and collect your fee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有协定的，无赖。把书拿过来，然后拿走你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000e20e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't you be halfway to the ritual site by now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是现在应该在中途仪式的地方？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly, a little annoyed. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000fbee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what can I do for you now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好把，我现在能为你做点什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly, a bit impatient EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_00002ef2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait a moment. I need to know; has Obadiah sent you in search of a book?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一会儿，我需要知道奥巴迪亚给你一本研究中的书？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000fbef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please; there's nothing for us to discuss until you retrieve that book from the ritual site. You must hurry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请便，在你检索这本书中的仪式前，我们没什么好谈论的。你最好快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_0000fbf0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings, child. I'm Marcella, missionary and student of the Faith. How are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，孩子。我是玛塞拉宗教的传教士和学者。你好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_00002ef1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC04FF02.metMarcella to 1 set DLC04FF02.faithTop to 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_00010aaa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...thing on? Oh, I don't know why I even bother with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上？我不知道为什么因他困扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Speaker [0A01004F] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : Fiddling with recording equipment. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_greeting_00010aab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry and seal that hole from the attic! If you don't have any grenades then see if there's something nearby you can shoot that will explode!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快！把阁楼那个洞密封起来，如果你没有手榴弹，那就看看附近有没有能射爆的东西！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00B7F5] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02ld_greeting_0000fe74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good things, sweetie. Tonic's brewed and bottled. Here's your pay and cut of the batch. Enjoy it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 做得好，亲爱的。药剂酿造好并且装满了。这是你的报酬并且分给你一些！祝你愉快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_greeting_0000b465_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC04FF03 101 player.additem DLC04FF03Moonshine 6 player.additem caps001 300
Y'ain't have the look of a local, son. Think you could help a sick woman get on the mend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还没有拜访过当地，孩子。你认为你可以帮助生病的女士痊愈吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_greeting_00003f60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y'ain't have the look of a local, young lady. Think you could help a sick woman get on the mend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还没有拜访过当地，女士。你认为你可以帮助生病的女士痊愈吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_greeting_00003fba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you'd mend the still, sweetie. When did you plan on getting' to that, exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说过你要修，亲爱的。到底什么时候计划开始呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_greeting_00003f62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for mending the still, Sweetie. For this fee, the tonic had better taste like honey, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，谢谢你的修理。因为你的付出，药剂尝起来更像蜂蜜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_greeting_00003f61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for mending the still, Sweetie. You're a peach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，谢谢你的修理。你是个美人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_greeting_0000ecf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for mending the still, Sweetie. Here's your pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，谢谢你的修理。这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_greeting_00003fbb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if it ain't my favorite out of towner.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_greeting_00003f63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to Banckom Secure Teller. Vocal authorization requested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到银行安全出纳，需要语音认证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Voice-Activated Security System [0A005B94] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_greeting_00005b6a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC04FF05.holoPlaying to 0 ; safety Net in case you heard it before....
Safety deposit access granted. Have a pleasant day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安全的存款保障。愿你今天愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Voice-Activated Security System [0A005B94] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_greeting_00005b6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a hazardous area. For your own safety, please vacate the premises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是危险的区域。为了你的安全，请先撤离。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [0A00732E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_greeting_00007327_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a hazardous area. For your own safety, please vacate the premises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是危险的区域。为了你的安全，请先撤离。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [0A00732E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_greeting_00007328_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, my hero, huh? Think you came in and rescued me right in the nick of time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我的英雄，是吧？你想出现在关键时刻，然后救出我?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_greeting_00008454_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not hardly. Had it all well in hand, and I didn't even need to use the failsafe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几乎没什么。如果一切进展良好，我甚至不需要使用安全模式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_greeting_00008454_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that would've done a real number on some of the paintings, so just as well you were here. Anyway, name's Desmond.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是真正的号码会在这些图片里面，所以你最好待在这儿。不管怎样，名字叫德斯蒙德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_greeting_00008454_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help me take out these bastards while I figure out a plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮我击退那些混蛋在我考虑计划的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_greeting_00008455_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you mind? There's a tiny matter of a home invasion that I'm trying to repel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意吗?那有个关于小型团伙入侵的麻烦，我准备击退他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_greeting_00010730_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome, my friend! I am Tobar the Ferryman, and this fine vessel is the Duchess Gambit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎你，我的朋友！我是船长托巴尔，这艘战舰是公爵夫人号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_greeting_000072f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're just back from Point Lookout, but it won't be long before we set off again. Interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们刚从望海崖回来，但不久后又要起航，一起么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_greeting_000072f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome to Point Lookout, my friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到望海崖，我的朋友！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_greeting_000072f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The trip was fine, the weather's nice and damp, and everything out there looks pleasant as ever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行很不错，天气很宜人，那里的一切看起来都更棒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_greeting_000072f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You! Are you going to Point Lookout? I need your help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你！你要去望海崖？我需要你的帮助！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_greeting_000072f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My daughter stowed away on the Duchess Gambit a few weeks ago, and I've been worried sick ever since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我女儿几个星期前就去了公爵夫人号，我一直都很担心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_greeting_000072f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't heard anything from her, but if you're going there, could you look for her? Please, I'll do anything to help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很久没有她的任何消息了，但是如果你去那的话，你能帮我找到她吗？求求你了，我会尽力帮助你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_greeting_000072f4_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们出发前有什么问题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_greeting_000080f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no. Don't try to get up yet. You'll only hurt yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不。不要试图那么做。你这样指挥伤害到自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Break [0A00F9F3] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq02_greeting_00010f0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are welcome to our tribe.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_greeting_00009270_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who lingers at the threshold of transcendence?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_greeting_0000e1fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return with the wisdom of the Mother Punga, or not at all!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_greeting_00009271_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你有考虑过我的建议吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_greeting_00009272_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你想从我这里得到什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_greeting_00009273_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truly, the Mother Punga has bestowed her wisdom upon you, and your mind has been expanded!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，母亲膨葛将她的智慧赐予给你，而且你的思维已经开拓展！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_greeting_00009274_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You certainly make quite an entrance. It's a shame about what's-his-name, but frankly, he would have gotten himself killed, eventually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的确找到了入口。提起他的名字就是一种耻辱，但是坦白的说，他最终是自寻死路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_greeting_0000a84f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would have done it myself, if I only had arms to throttle him. Now, let's hope you're more useful than that one, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可以自己完成它，如果我有力量运转他的话。现在，我只有希望你比那个更有用，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_greeting_0000a84f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you're the mouse that was scurrying around here? Not much to look at, but at least you're not drooling all over yourself. I can work with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你就是那只到处乱窜的老鼠？没有太多的去看看，但至少你自己都没有失态过。我可以锲而不舍
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_greeting_0000ae42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now then, perhaps you can be more useful than that simpering spiritualist and his tribe of idiots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么现在，也许你可以比这那个笑的巫师和他部落里的白痴更有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_greeting_0000ae42_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like another newbie in the tribe! And still able to string together whole sentences - ain't you the lucky one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来像另一个部落新手！并且仍然能够整个句子串起来 - 是不是你就是那个幸运的人呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_greeting_00008453_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你已渗透进那些部落，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq03_greeting_0000e1fb_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : hopeful EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_00010069_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你还想继续玩下去？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : hopeful EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_00010069_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gosh. How'd you find me so fast?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀。你怎么这么快就找到我了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your turn to hide now.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, I was sure that was the last place you'd look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小子，我确定那是你最后一次看到的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006b_1.ogg
NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He he he. Okay, now it's your turn to hide!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿嘿嘿。好把，现在轮到你藏了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006c_1.ogg
NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006c_2.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing, playing tag EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006d_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing, playing tag EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006e_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing, playing tag EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0001006f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made it past my traps? Er, I mean: Get out of here, mister! Aren't you afraid the ghost will get you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的陷阱你过的去吗?呃，我的意思是:离开这里，先生！你就不怕鬼抓到你么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : scared, trying to get you to leave. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_00008148_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You made it past my traps? Er, I mean: Get out of here, lady! Aren't you afraid the ghost will get you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的陷阱你过的去吗?呃，我的意思是：滚开，女士！你就不怕鬼找你么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : scared, trying to get you to leave. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_00008149_1.ogg
NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_0000814a_1.ogg
NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_000102e4_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : matter of fact EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_000102e5_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : matter of fact EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_greeting_000102e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome! Welcome to my extraordinary Safari. Shall we get you registered?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎！欢迎来到奇妙之旅。我来给你登记下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari Comment (NAM2) : True Salesman, Born to serve. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll find a button inside. Give it a push and we'll get started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会找到一个里面的按钮，按一下我们就能开始了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tremendous showing! I do hope the experience was worth every cap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重大发现！我希望这次经历能够物超所值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's commemorate your first safari with a token of our friendship, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们以此来纪念你第一次狩猎时我们的友谊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b4c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This axe was, er, 'misplaced' by one of my other patrons. She won't be needing it anymore, and it's a weapon of gruesome distinction. Enjoy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这斧头是，呃，是我的一个顾客误放在这里的。她不再需要它了，这武器相当卓越。享受它吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b4c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF06 70 1 setStage DLC04FF06 100 player.additemHealthPercent DLC04WeapUniqueDismemberer 1 0.8
Welcome back. Do we fancy a bit of bloodshed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来！难不成我们钟情于杀戮？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_greeting_0000ecf6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mr. Plik's really outdone himself this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 水疱先生这次真正的克服了自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Humboldt [0A009BFE] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b4d_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 精彩的表演！非常棒的格斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Humboldt [0A009BFE] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're number three? Well, let's get this thing goin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是三号？很好，我们来谈个事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rip Smithy [0A009BF8] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome, by the way. You know, for saving your ass?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不客气，顺便说一下，拯救你的屁股吗？你知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rip Smithy [0A009BF8] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04ff06_greeting_00009b50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if it isn't my favorite traveler! And oh, what a trip you were on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不是我最喜爱的旅行！哦，你正在享受的是多美美好的旅行啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04generic_greeting_00011135_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, when you were under, you should have heard some of the things that came out of your mouth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，你在下面的时候，你应该把你所知道的事情亲口说出来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04generic_greeting_00011135_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I suppose you're more interested in what came out of your head, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我认为，从你头里面出来的东西会让你更感兴趣，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04generic_greeting_00011135_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This projection device is insufficient for my desires. It disgusts me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说，这投影装置远远不够。真恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04generic_greeting_00010f08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Silence! I have no time for your meaty prattle!
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静！我没时间和你这肌肉男闲聊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04generic_greeting_00010f09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is too much to contemplate without your pathetic mewling interrupting my important calculation!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太多需要考虑了如果不是你可怜的喵喵声打断了我重要的计算。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04generic_greeting_00010f0a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave me! I have much to plot and plan!
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我远点！我有太多的策划和计划！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04generic_greeting_00010f0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please wait until my meditations are complete.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Faction : Point Lookout Tribals Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_greeting_00010f0c_1.ogg

NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Faction : Point Lookout Tribals Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_greeting_00010f0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me while I commune with the higher planes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我更深层次的交谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Faction : Point Lookout Tribals Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_greeting_00010f0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are new! And you are welcome!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_greeting_0000a84d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Croatoa. I am not so new.
ESP.TRADUIT: 叫我克罗托亚。我不是很菜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_greeting_0000a84d_2.ogg

NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_greeting_00010c28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here to give me a piece of your mind?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04generic_greeting_00008450_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Rough spoken, but spoken approvingly EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04generic_greeting_00008451_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Rough spoken, but spoken approvingly EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04generic_greeting_00008452_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see y'all alive, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友，很高兴看到你们都还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea4d_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回到哈利的五金店！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y'all here to buy something? Step right in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这里是买什么东西的吧？你的选择很正确！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea4f_1.ogg

NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, just in time! Found out who went rooting around in our skulls, and you'll never guess who it was!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，就在此时！有种东西在我们的骨头里面生根，你永远都猜不到那是什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000f3c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a totally unrelated hint, I'm in charge of his boat, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 作一个完全无关的提示，我现在掌管着他的船！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000f3c5_2.ogg
NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000da49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess we never got a formal introduction, huh? Name's Nadine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜我们并没有作过介绍，哼？叫娜丁的家伙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000926f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you're not from around here, so what brought you out here? You looking for your fortune or running from your troubles?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你不是来自这周围，是什么把把你留在这里?寻找财富还是躲避麻烦?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000926f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hello there young traveler. The fates had told me that I would receive a visitor today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你好年轻的旅行者。命运告诉我，今天我将会有一个来访者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000a84c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm being rude! I am Madam Panada, and this is Madam Panada's House of Wares! For all things a traveler needs, I am here to provide!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我已经粗鲁了！我是帕娜达女士，这是帕娜达女生的仓库！我再这里提供旅行者所需的一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000a84c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bullets! Stimpaks! Armor! Weapons! Junk! If you need it, Madame Panada has already anticipated your need and procured it months ago!
ESP.TRADUIT: 子弹！治疗针！装甲！武器！垃圾！尽情挑选，帕娜达夫人已经在月前就预先采购好了你所需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000a84c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it is good to see you well, young traveler! And what brings you to Madam Panada's?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢,看来你很顺利,年轻的旅行者!谁把你带去见帕娜达女士的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I knew you would return. How may Madam Panada assist you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我就知道你会回来的。帕娜达女士是如何帮助你的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings once again, young traveler! Do you have a need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了，年轻的旅行者！你有什么需要吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another new member? What, are we offering a special?
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个新成员?什么，给我们提供特殊帮助的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Punga may have offered you wisdom, but it looks like it's still going to be a while before you really learn to accept it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 膨葛会给你提供智慧，但是看起来它还得过一会儿在你学会接受它之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea54_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until then, you answer to me. I'm Woodrose, the tribe mother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之前，你对我的答复。我是银背藤，部落之母。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000ea54_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我那所谓任性的孩子?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04generic_greeting_00010c29_1.ogg

NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04generic_greeting_00010c2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I hope you can find my Nadine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我希望你能找到我的娜丁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_000072f5_1.ogg
NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000f3fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if it isn't our hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果他不是我们的英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : non-sarcastic EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_greeting_0000f631_1.ogg
