ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen Marcella? What did she have to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看见玛塞拉了吗？她说什么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It pains me to say it: but thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很不愿说出口：但谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think our business is concluded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们的交易结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This never fuckin' ends! You and your pathetic threats!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这他妈永远不会结束！你可你可悲的威胁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_hello_0000e49e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, here we fuckin' go again!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_hello_0000e49f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And here we are again, I'm so fucking sick of your empty threats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们又来了，我受够了你空洞的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_hello_0000e4a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have none of your posturing!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always so full of talk, Calvert!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是滔滔不绝，卡尔弗特！

ESP.TRADUIT: 阿格-奎尔托斯归来了。战栗吧，懦夫们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are not welcome in this place.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly, affronted EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_hello_0000e20f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our business is at an end. Leave this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的交易结束了。离开这地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_hello_0000e210_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would it have killed you to wipe your feet?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_hello_0000fbe7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try not to get the filth on you while you're out there.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_hello_0000e2fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should have seen this place thirty years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你三十年前就该看看这地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_hello_0000f936_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lots of people out there, but too few trustworthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面有很多人，但几乎没有可信任的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_hello_0000f937_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you want to talk? I won't bite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想谈谈吗？我不会吃了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_hello_0000e300_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You findin' your way around, sweetie?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, I see you have returned to our world once more!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我看见你又一次回到了我们的世界！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_hello_0000a83b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the mood for a bit of violence?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_hello_0000ecf1_1.ogg
NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_hello_0000ecf2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't come here to make friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这儿可不是交朋友的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rip Smithy [0A009BF8] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04ff06_hello_0000ecf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try not to fall. Nothing down there but dark and rads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别摔下去。下面只有黑暗与辐射。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rip Smithy [0A009BF8] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04ff06_hello_00010a60_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我的东西有帮助，如果你拿去的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rip Smithy [0A009BF8] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04ff06_hello_00010a61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close - we'll both be better for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 靠近点，对我们都会好些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jacob Humboldt [0A009BFE] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff06_hello_0000ecf4_1.ogg
NPC : Jacob Humboldt [0A009BFE] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff06_hello_00010a62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I also can do repairs, if'n you need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也能修理，如果你需要的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_hello_0000ea5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a look around. Let me know if you need anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 四处看看。有需要告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_hello_0000ea5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: New people mean new business, so I'm always happy to see y'all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新人意味着这新买卖，所以我很高兴见到你们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_hello_0000ea5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't get a lot of new folks in here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_hello_0000ea5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always good to see a stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看见陌生人的感觉很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_hello_0000ea60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fates have told me that I have something you need. It is upon you to select well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 命运告诉我我有你需要的东西。问题在于你如何选择好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_hello_0000ea62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is all good merchandise, no? Surely you will need some. Now... or in the future!
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是上等货色，不是吗？你肯定会需要一些，现在或者不久的将来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_hello_0000ea63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you see something you need, simply ask me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果看到需要的，就告诉我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_hello_0000ea64_1.ogg

NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04generic_hello_0000f3b5_1.ogg

NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04generic_hello_0000f3b6_1.ogg

NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04generic_hello_0000f3b7_1.ogg

NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04generic_hello_0000f3b8_1.ogg
NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04generic_hello_00010c1e_1.ogg
NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04generic_hello_00010c2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let your earthly cares slip away, like a pebble in the sea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放开你世俗的牵挂，就像让卵石沉入大海。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04generic_hello_00010c1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The physical world holds nothing for us. Release any lingering connections to it.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04generic_hello_00010c2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Learn from the Punga. Accept simplicity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从膨葛中领悟。接受朴实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_hello_00010c20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Embrace the simple things in life.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_hello_00010c2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trust in the wisdom of your higher mind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信你内心深处的智慧吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04generic_hello_00010c21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Submerge your will in the depths of the astral sea!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让你的意识湮灭在星海的深渊中！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04generic_hello_00010c2e_1.ogg

NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Like a distrustful nanny. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04generic_hello_00010c22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: New girl, you try too hard. Be calm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新来的女孩，你太卖力了。冷静些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_hello_00010c23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you still here, my child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你还在这儿，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04generic_hello_00010c24_1.ogg

NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Faction : Point Lookout Tribals Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : quiet, long sigh like someone almost asleep EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04generic_hello_0000f3be_1.ogg
NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_goodbye_00010f2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I go back to work now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以回来继续我的工作了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_goodbye_00010f2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're running out of time. Go!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_goodbye_00005a1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get out of here. Go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在让我们离开这里。快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_goodbye_0000b3c5_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不要搞得像个陌生人似的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_goodbye_0000afd5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then away with your tiny insignificance!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_goodbye_0000a855_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I have to be going.
Yes, commune with him, while I see to my tribe. There is much to be done!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我去处理部落时，你去与他交谈。还有很多事要做呢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_goodbye_0000ae47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll go see the Transcendent Master, now.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_goodbye_00008146_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 求你了，帮我找到我的女儿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleading EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_0000b5e0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you can convince Nadine to come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你能说服娜丁回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleading EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_0001072f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you so much for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是太感谢你的帮助了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : pleading EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_0000f3ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful out there. Them swamp folk is nasty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在外小心。沼泽居民很凶恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_0000844c_1.ogg
NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_0000ea56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back any time, them swamp types are always bringin' me new stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随时再来，那些沼泽交货常给我带新玩意来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_0000ea57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, before you go. If you ever want to get rid of that scar on your head, just come and see me, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，你走之前。如果你想去除头上的疤痕，就来找我，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_00011134_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the greatest of care in the world, young traveler!
ESP.TRADUIT: 万事小心，年轻的旅行者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_0000b5df_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎再来，年轻的旅行者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_goodbye_0000ea59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whenever you're ready, just take a rest on the cot in the cabin. We'll be at Point Lookout in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你准备好，就到客舱里的简易床上休息吧。我们立马就到望海崖！

Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_losttocombat_0000d8a2_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_losttocombat_0000d8a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice try. Your payment is coming, and you're not getting a fucking pence until you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做得好。你会有报酬的，但在你完事前一个子儿也别想拿到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_speechchallengef_0000b3b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, did you come here for something, or are you just wasting my time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是找我有事，还只是浪费我时间？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_speechchallengef_0000b3b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: *cough* No, sweetie, this is the Orange Fever, and unless I get somebody to help me whip up some tonic, I'm as good as dust for the grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: *咳嗽*不，宝贝，这是橙流感，除非有人帮我赶制些补药，不然我就要入土为安了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_speechchallengef_00003f59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC04FF03.spChallAttempt to 1 set DLC04FF03.tonicTop to 1 ;setStage DLC04FF03 10
Well, we got a bargainer here, haven't we? No, dear, it brews just fine as it is, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，来了个买卖人，不是吗？不，亲爱的，它酿造得和它看起来一样好，谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_speechchallengef_00003f5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're headed back there anyway, how about I ride along for just 250 caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是你非要回那去，让我用250个瓶盖搭个便车如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nope. I'm doing just fine on my own. Gonna keep it that way. Find someplace else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。我一个人挺好。要保持这样。找别的地方吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_speechchallengef_0000813d_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : emphatic EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_speechchallengef_0000885b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My only secret is patience. If I could share it with you, I would.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一的秘密就是耐心。如果我能与你分享的话，我会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you share your secret to getting them to grow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能分享下你让他们生长的秘密吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_alertidle_0000d8af_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_alertidle_0000d8b1_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_alertidle_0000d8b2_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_alertidle_0000d8b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Step into the open and identify yourself.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00D966]DLC04GenericRobot) 0A00D966 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04gener_alertidle_0000d8ad_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00D966]DLC04GenericRobot) 0A00D966 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04gener_alertidle_0000d8ae_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_alertidle_0000cdea_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_alertidle_0000d8a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is someone messin' around over there?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_alertidle_0000d8aa_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_alertidle_0000d8ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm. I was sure I heard something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。我很确定我听到了什么声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_alertidle_0000d8ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: C'mon out, we ain't gonna bite!
ESP.TRADUIT: 出来吧，我们不会咬你的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_lostidle_0000d8e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't hide from me forever.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_lostidle_0000d8e2_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_deathresponse_00011236_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_deathresponse_00011237_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_deathresponse_0000cdf9_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_deathresponse_0000d8d8_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_deathresponse_0000d8d9_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_deathresponse_0000d8db_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_fleeresponse_00011232_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_fleeresponse_00011233_1.ogg

Quest : ([0A00CDFC]DLC04GenericSwampFolk) 0A00CDFC (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : with malice. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maleyokelsmall\dlc04gener_fleeresponse_000113fa_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_fleeresponse_0000d87d_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨！不要把我一个人留下来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_fleeresponse_0000d87e_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_fleeresponse_0000d87f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You go first! I'll cover you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_startcombatresp_0000cdfa_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_startcombatresp_0000d88e_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_startcombatresp_0000d88f_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_startcombatresp_0000d890_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_startcombatresp_0000d891_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That book is of the utmost importance, we shouldn't be chatting idly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那本书至关重要，我们不该如此怠慢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : polite but hurried. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04talksomethi_00010a96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else do you want to discuss?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04talksomethi_00002eee_1.ogg
NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04talksomethi_00009b48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you mean those people living in the old Cathedral?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是指那些住在老教堂里的家伙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not them. That lot wants for brains, but they're at least somewhat civilized. The swampfolk have no creed, no morals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不是他们。他们想吃人脑，但至少还懂点礼貌。这些沼泽居民毫无教条，毫无道德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obafolk02_00002ef4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be new here if you don't know the answer to that by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是你连这都不知道，肯定是新来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly. Disapproving EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obafolk01_00002efa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, they're dangerous. They shoot at, smash or try to eat anything that isn't them, and half the time they shoot at each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他们很危险。他们会花费一半的时间进行杀戮，毁坏或者试图吃掉一切异类，还有一半时间，他们互相射击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly. Disapproving EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obafolk01_00002efa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They may have been men once, but no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们或许曾经是人，但再也不是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly. Disapproving EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obafolk01_00002efa_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did they take your book?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们为什么要拿走你的书？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They think the book has a kind of occult power. Superstition and nonsense, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们认为那书有某种神秘力量。当然，这是荒谬的迷信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obafolk03_00002ef9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really seem to hate the swampfolk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你真的很讨厌那些沼泽民。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose larceny isn't enough reason to hate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想绝不单单因为盗窃吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obafolk00to_0000fbe1_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会去把你的书弄到手的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. The fools who stole it believe it has powers, so the thing is probably well-guarded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。那个偷东西的家伙以为这书有不寻常的力量才会被严加看守。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaquestacc_00002ef8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a ritual site east of the boardwalk, in the basement of a ruined house. I think you'll find it there. Bring it back to me, and be paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仪式之地就在板道东面，是某个废弃房屋的地下室。书应该就在那，带回来给我，你就能拿到你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaquestacc_00002ef8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC04FF02 10 showMap RitualSiteMarker 0 if DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 0 DLC04MarcellaREF.moveto DLC04BlackhallExtMarker endif

ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我聊聊有关布莱克霍尔庄园的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong? What did the letter say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么不对？信上说什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long ago, the Blackhall family possessed a terrible heirloom, a book of evil rituals, best forgotten. The Krvibi have their origins in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很久以前，布莱克霍尔家族拥有一个可怕的传家宝，一本最好能被忘却的邪恶仪式之书。卡维碧仪式便起源于此书。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04marcellale_00002ef3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The book was stolen years ago, though the Krvibi have never known of the theft. Their fear has kept the Blackhall Family safe these long years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这书在几年前被偷，不过他们对《黑暗圣经》失窃之事一无所知。他们的恐惧这些年来一直保护着布莱克霍尔家族的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04marcellale_00002ef3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obadiah Blackhall sent me. I have a letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔派我来的，我这有封信。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obadiah sent you? Well, then, let's see what he has to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥巴迪亚派你来的？好吧，来看看他要说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04marcellale_00002efb_1.ogg

NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04marcellale_00002efb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 10 1 removeNote DLC04FF02ObadiahLetter setStage DLC04FF02 15
Obadiah Blackhall sent me. I have a letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔派我来的，我这有封信。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The house looked abandoned, I just wandered in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这屋子看来已经荒废了，我进去看看。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, Blackhall Manor isn't abandoned; not yet. At least have the grace to come speak with her owner properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莱克霍尔庄园没有荒废，暂时还没有。至少还有得体的风度，来同她的主人交谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaintroa01_00002efc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The offer stands for now, though I won't abstain from soliciting other help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个请求只目前有效，不排除我有向其他人求助的可能性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaquestrej_00002eed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you expect me to do?
We must get it back before the Krvibi learn anything from it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须在《黑暗圣经》从中学到任何东西之前夺回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04marcellale_000030c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, I think you have to do this on your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，我觉得你应该自己去做这件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it, Obadiah. There's no reason for you to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意，奥巴迪亚。你不该死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friend! This is a truly noble thing you do. You mustn't fail, that book brings nothing but misery and madness to the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友！你的行为真是高尚。你不能失败，那书只会给世界带来痛苦与疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That can't be the only way to destroy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定还有别的办法来摧毁这东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Constance had a brother, Richard Dunwich. He was a wealthy businessman outside of the city to the north, had a company building there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 康斯坦丝有个兄弟，理查德?邓维奇。他在北方的城外是个富有的商人，并拥有一家公司。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: His obsession with the occult was as great as her own, and there's an object of great evil in that building. The book has been drawn to it before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他痴迷于各种神秘之事，这跟她简直一模一样，在公司大楼里有件十分邪恶的东西。曾有人把书带到过那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: To take the book there would destroy it. You would have to take that journey, though, and you must not fail if you attempt it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那就能摧毁这书。不过你需要长途跋涉，一旦开始就绝不容许失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't some ordinary book we can toss in a fire and be done with. I can destroy it here and now, but the ritual requires a sacrifice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这书不一般，不是扔到火里烧了就完事的。我现在就可以将其销毁，但这需要有人牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll kill me anyway. Now that they've possessed the book, they'll do anything to get it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何他们都会来杀我。他们已经丧心病狂了，并会不惜一切将其夺回。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There must be something we can do. We have the book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定还有什么办法。书在我们手上啊！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fear the Blackhalls are lost. The only thing left to do is to destroy this evil book, and spare the world further harm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕布莱克霍尔庄园家族已经不复存在了。剩下唯一要做的就是摧毁这邪恶的书，让世界不再遭受更深重的灾难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got to do what Constance should have done in the first place. There's a way to destroy the damned thing, though I will not survive it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 康斯坦丝一开始就该做的现在由我来完成。有个办法摧毁这受到诅咒的东西，尽管我无法活到那时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, Obadiah, but it's true. The book is here, with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，奥巴迪亚，但这书真的在这里，就在我这。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be bloody well damned. She was right. It's back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会被诅咒的。她说得没错。这书回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Krvibi had it, I took it, and now she's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这本来是卡维碧的，现在在我手上，她已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have it? God help us; you do. That damned book is back, and this time it'll be the death of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你手里？上天相助啊，你得到了书。诅咒之书回来了，这一次我面对的将是死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04obadiahboo_0000313d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She asked me to steal the Krivbeknih. When I returned, she was dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她此前拜托我去把《黑暗圣经》偷过来。当我回来时，她已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Impossible! That book's been lost to us for generations. You two must have been mistaken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能！那本书早在我们几代人以前就已经遗失了。你们肯定搞错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marcella? Why? She's done nothing to them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛塞拉？为什么？她什么也没做！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: They killed her, Obadiah. I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她已经死了，奥巴迪亚。我很抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Do what Marcella asks, and pray she's wrong about this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。按玛塞拉说的去做，真希望是她错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marcella said something about the Krivbeknih. I'm supposed to go look for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛塞拉说了一些关于《黑暗圣经》的事，我该去找找这书。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What good are you, then? Take her that letter; she's the only person who might know how to help me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对你又有什么好处呢？带封信给她；恐怕只有她会帮我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good job blocking off that hole! Hurry and get in here! It looks like they are about to breach from the East wing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 洞口堵住了！干得漂亮！快进来！看起来他们要从东翼突破了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Player just blocked the first breach from the attic in the West wing. Desmond meets him, possibly thanks him with some dialogue, then says they are EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_00003590_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry! Get in there before more of them come out! Find where they are coming from and stop them. Just like before I'll be keeping an eye out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快！在更多人来之前进去！看看他们是从哪进来的，阻止他们。和刚才一样，我会一直盯着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : At the door to the East wing after a small battle. Tells the player to basically do what he did before, and that he'll be keeping an eye out. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0000b65f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's one less way for them to get in. Follow me. I think we are about to get hit hard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们又少了一条可以进来的路。跟我来。咱们有场硬仗要打。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : After sealing the second attic breach he tells the player to follow him because they are about to get swarmed. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0000cf7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, here they come. Grab all the ammo and stimpaks you need. This is gonna be a rough one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶，他们来了。拿上你所需要的弹药和治疗针。这会很刺激！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Checkes the cameras quick, notices that he was right and they are about to breach from every angle. Tells the player to get prepared, and where to go EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0000cf7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have any mines, now's the time to use 'em. They could come in through any of the boarded up doors at any second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候用地雷了。那些木板门挡不了他们多久的，随时做好战斗准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Suggest player uses mines. Tells the player where the attackers are going to come from. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_00010289_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know who you are but you need to help me if you want to stay alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是谁，但想活命的话就帮我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : When player first sees Desmond. He's in a hurry. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_00003591_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've been at it all night. I think they are just about to breach the inner walls. Follow me. I'm going to go check it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们整晚都在。我想他们就要突破内墙了。跟着我。我们去查看一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Looking at the security monitors he notices they are about to breach the inners walls in the West wing. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_00003592_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks like they are coming in from somewhere upstairs. Hurry, follow me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来他们从楼上另一处来。快点，跟着我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Looking up at a hole he notices where they are coming in from. Tells the player to follow him as if he has something for him to do. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_00003593_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go through these doors and up the stairs. Find where they are coming in and stop them. I'll be keeping an eye on the cameras down here. Hurry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 从这门上楼。看看他们从哪进来的，一定要阻止他们。我会在这里从摄像机中观察。快去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Orders the player to get up there and find out what's going on. Reminds the player that he'll be keeping an eye on him through the security cameras. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_00003594_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, now hurry up and seal that hole. It looks like an explosion should do the trick. Maybe there's something explosive near the hole you can shoot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，现在快封住洞口。看来一次爆炸足够了。或许洞口附近有什么可用于引爆的东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00B7F5] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Speaking to player through intercom. Notices that there aren't any more invaders and that the hole in ceiling looks week and that a well placed expl EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0000b65e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the mine, Kenny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于矿井的事，肯尼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old Man Herzog's Mine-hole? Isn't much, but it's home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 老赫尔佐格的矿井？不多，但那是家！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04mine_00008141_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about this mine, Kenny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于矿井的事，肯尼。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04mine_00008142_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What in the world have we tapped into? Sample Site Three is showing bio-gas concentration off the charts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢想象我们在开发什么东西！样本地点三显示出生化气体集中在测绘图之外！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wetlands substratum is surprisingly dense limestone at all excavation sites, and we've had no trouble locating naturally-formed chambers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 塘池底层开凿的洞穴里，充斥着惊人密度的石灰岩，并且找到天然形成的洞室对我们来说很容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This and the dense calcite formations suggest that subterranean water flow has eroded a vast network of caves and grottoes throughout the region.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个和高密度的方解石的构成说明了地下水流雕刻出了一个巨大的洞穴网络，并且洞室也遍布整个区域。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mapping these will be a monumental effort, and necessary to fully uncover the bounty of natural gas resources captured down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地图的绘制将成为纪念性的成就，并且也能全面揭开埋藏在这里的天然气体的神秘面纱，这一切都是必须的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I don't understand is the amount of lye residue we're encountering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能理解的是我们遇上相当数量的碱残渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to try and touch base with some of my academic contacts and see if we can find any precedent for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会去尝试联系一下我在学术上的朋友，看看有没有类似的范例。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll have plenty of time to work that out, though; I've no doubt Bysshe will want to set up shop here and drill their little hearts out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管我们有很充足的时间来研究；我毫不怀疑彼希会在这里设立一个钻井平台，把它们的心给挖出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is principal geological chemist Caroline Saunders, for Bysshe natural gas survey MD-16-001.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是卡洛琳·桑德斯，首席地质化学家，为彼希测量天然气，编号MD-16-001。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider this my authorization signature on Sample Site three.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我的样本地点三的授权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Far as I'm concerned, this is a prime location for bio-gas harvesting, and a treasure trove for some field research.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我看来，这里是开采生化气体的最佳地点，并且对某些领域来说，这里也有不可估量的研究价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f28_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caroline Saunders speaking, principal geological chemist on Bysshe natural gas survey MD-16-001.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是卡洛琳·桑德斯，首席地质化学家，为彼希测量天然气，编号MD-16-001。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Preliminary results from Sample Site Two are promising; we're posting similar concentrations as in the first site.
ESP.TRADUIT: 初步结果显示样本地点二是有希望的；我们获得与第一个站点中的类似的浓度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Similar bio-gas makeup here as well, including a few organic compounds that I'm not familiar with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里也有相似的生化气体，成分里还包含其他我不太熟悉的有机化合物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f27_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've also discovered heavy lye residue in a naturally-formed chamber at this excavation site.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这发掘点的天然洞穴里，我们也发现了重碱液残渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f27_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lucky we were wearing caustics gear to begin with, or somebody might have suffered some serious chemical burns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很幸运的，我们携带着热线仪器，否则会有人不幸遭受严重烧伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f27_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to analyze the site further, see if there's any connection between these compounds and the lye deposits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打算进一步研究这个地点，看看这个化合物与碱堆积有何关联。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f27_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My tech is telling me he needs a couple of hours to work on our ventilator unit. I suppose I'll move on to Site Three in the meantime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的技术人员告诉我他需要几个小时的时间来处理通风管道装备的工作。我想我在这段时间应该去三号地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f27_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Further analysis is for my own curiosity, anyway. This is my authorization signature on Sample Site Two.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，更多地分析不过是为了满足我们自己的好奇心。这是我的样本地点二的授权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f27_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is Caroline Saunders, principal geological chemist, for Bysshe natural gas survey MD-16-001.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是卡洛琳·桑德斯，首席地质化学家，为彼希测量天然气，编号MD-16-001。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sample set one shows promising concentration of bio-gas in mostly limestone substratum of wetlands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 样本的分析指出生化气体最有可能会在塘持的石灰岩底层。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No exact levels yet, but this site should exhibit more than enough extraction potential to meet survey goals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有具体数据显示可能会在多深处，但是这个地点应该有足够的量来萃取以达到测量目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f29_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to leave a couple of interns here to handle the minutiae, but it's a formality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将会留下几个实习生来处理细节上的东西，但是那都不过是形式上的措施罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f29_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll move on to the other sites now to make sure this isn't an aberration. Consider this my authorization signature on Sample Site One.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在就去下一个地点，以确定测量上没有差错。可以把这当成是我的样本地点一的授权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A003F2C] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F18]DLC04FF01) An Antique Land EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff01_dlc04ff01holotop_00003f29_5.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Telling the player look at him instead of take off in the wrong direction. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0001028a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, any second now. Get ready!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，随时会来。做好准备！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Final Wave: Telling the player where the attackers are coming from EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0001037e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here they come! Second floor, on the right!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Final Wave: Telling the player where the attackers are coming from EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0001028b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More of them! On the right, first floor!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Final Wave: Telling the player where the attackers are coming from EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0001028c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The door on the left! First Floor!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Final Wave: Telling the player where the attackers are coming from EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0001028d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're at the front door! Get Ready!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Final Wave: Telling the player where the attackers are coming from EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0001028e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That looks like the last of 'em. You're a pretty good shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来是最后一波了。你枪法不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A0035BF]DLC04MQ02LD) Defending The Mansion Comment (NAM2) : Lets the player know the final wave is over. Says something snarkier than what i wrote. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02l_dlc04mq02desmon_0001028f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does this tonic really cure anything at all?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种活力水真的能治好什么病么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, just about whatever ails you, sweetie! A real cure-all. Say, I don't reckon you're the dry type, is you? Oh, nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论是什么让你不适，宝贝！真正包治百病。我认为你不是那种干燥的类型，对吗？噢，别介意。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04tonicreally_00003f64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why exactly should I help you, again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到底为什么还要再帮你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't rightly expect you to help me out of goodness, though I welcome you to prove me wrong, sweetie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我并不期望你出于好意帮助我，但我欢迎你证明我错了，宝贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04tonicwhyhel_00003f58_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we brew this batch of tonic up, you'll have rights to a share for yourself, and a payday of 300 caps to boot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我们制好了这批补药，你将可以分得自己的一份，以及开始每日300瓶盖的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04tonicwhyhel_00003f58_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got everything. Now we wait while it brews. Three days should do the trick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万事俱备了。现在等着它调制吧。三天应该就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questzwaiti_00003f6b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me some time to brew.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questzwaiti_0001116b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, what do we need first?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们首先需要什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I can fix it. No charge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我可以修好它，不要钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you a smart one? Sweeter tonic's better for both of us, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是一个聪明人吗？毕竟，甜一些的补药对我们俩都好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margrepairn_00003f6d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC04FF03.repairJob to 1 set DLC04FF03.repairJobProBono to 1
I'll get it working like new, but I want 200 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以让它工作得像新的一样，但我想要200个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon you've got a deal, sweetie, but I'd better notice a difference in the tonic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为你做了笔买卖，宝贝，但我最好能看到补药的不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margrepairc_00003f54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC04FF03.repairJob to 1 set DLC04FF03.repair2Xfee to 1
I can fix it up. Let's call it 100 caps of work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以修好它，代价是100个瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon I can scrape that together. Go ahead and do what you can for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我能把那弄到一起。去吧，尽力而为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margrepairf_00003f5f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your still could stand to be fixed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你仍然可以随时来这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could it, now? I suppose you'd know how to see to that, wouldn't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢，可以了么？我猜想你可以照顾好那个了吧，你说呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margrepairs_00003f53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you fake being sick?
Here I thought you were a quick one.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margaboutyo_00003f6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, sweetie, I reckon you'd have shot me as soon as walked in here if you weren't a kind soul or at least an enterprising type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，宝贝，你若不是个善心人或者至少是一个有胆识的人的话，我认为你一走进这儿就会把我毙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margaboutyo_00003f6c_2.ogg

NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margchanges_00003f4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing you can catch, if that's what you were wondering. Marsh folk catch it all the time. Lucky my family has a special still pot for tonic-makin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么也捉不到吧，如果你正纳闷的是这事。沼泽居民却总能捉到。多亏我的家族有一个炼制补药的特殊蒸馏壶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margaboutyo_00003f5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you build that still yourself?
That old thing's been in my family for years and years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个老古董在我家族中流传了很多很多年。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margaboutyo_00003f51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well before the bombs, there was a time folks couldn't get no tonic by law, and my family did okay helping them get what they needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在核弹爆炸前，曾有一段居民们不能依法获得补药的时光，而我的家族很非常乐意帮助他们取得所需。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margaboutyo_00003f51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Point Lookout?
Things aren't wonderful, but I reckon it's hard all around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世事并不美好，但我认为在这儿一向如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margaboutyo_00003f5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My family's lived hereabouts since well before the War, and I reckon we'll be here a long time yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的家族早在战争之前就住在这一带，我认为我们还会在这儿住上很久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margaboutyo_00003f5c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know more about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道更多关于你的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, I'm just folk. What more is there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，我只是个平民。还有什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04marg00about_00003f4d_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来谈谈恢复药剂的事吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secret family technique, been so for generations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 家族秘传的技术，已经相传了几代了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04tonic00topl_00003f55_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help me brew some up by gatherin' ingredients. I'll share the batch to make it worth your while, and sweeten the deal with 300 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮我用收集来的这些配方酿酒。我会给你很好的报酬的，比如说那美妙的300瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04tonic00topl_00003f55_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're gonna love it, sweetie. Just you wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你会爱上它的，亲爱的。先稍等片刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04tonic00topl_00003f56_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're faking. We both know it. So let's just cut to the chase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在装，我们心里都有数。来吧，让我们开门见山地说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set DLC04FF03.spChallWon to 1 set DLC04FF03.spChallAttempt to 1 set DLC04FF03.tonicTop to 1 ;setStage DLC04FF03 10
I'm sorry, I guess I just haven't heard of that illness. Maybe I can help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很遗憾听到这些，我想我从来没听说过这种病。或许我能帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon you can, at that. I just need some help brewing up a little tonic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且我认为你能做到。我只是需要点帮助来调制补药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margmedskil_00003f52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've treated enough illnesses to know there's no such thing as Orange Fever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我碰过的病太多了，我知道根本没有橙流感这种东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that is just an awfully rude thing to say, sweetie.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margplayerm_00003f5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? I've got the mauve plague. So let's just try not to cough on each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是么？我也得病了，是紫瘟。所以我们尽量都不要对着彼此咳嗽吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well sweetie, even if you ain't got sympathy in your heart, I think you need the 'ol tonic as bad as me, even if'n you don't know it yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝贝，即使你没有同情心，我想你也跟我一样急需这补药，尽管你还没发现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margplayers_00003f50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orange Fever? That sounds bad. Can I help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 橙流感? 听起来很吓人。有什么我能帮上忙的么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Awful malady, I do swear. There's a tonic for it, but I reckon I'm not well enough to make it myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怕的疾病，我发誓。有种补药可以治，但我认为我一个人做不出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margplayerb_00003f5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Twenty wild Punga Fruit, just for you.
Little scrawny, but they'll do. Thank you, sweetie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小个了点，但也行。谢谢你，宝贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questpungat_00003fb4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
player.removeItem DLC04PungaWild 20 set DLC04FF03a.fruitDone to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF03 40 1 if DLC04FF03a.batchActive && DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone == 0 if DLC04FF03a.fruitDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.yeastDone == 1 ;if DLC04FF03a.waterDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.batteriesDone == 1
; got all the stuff, advance. setStage DLC04FF03 90 set DLC04FF03a.brewDay to gameDaysPassed set DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone to 1 endif ;endif endif endif endif
Here, take ten of these refined Punga Fruit.
Sweet and ripe, too. These will do just fine.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questpungat_00003fb6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
player.removeItem DLC04PungaRefined 10 set DLC04FF03a.fruitDone to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF03 40 1 if DLC04FF03a.batchActive && DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone == 0 if DLC04FF03a.fruitDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.yeastDone == 1 ;if DLC04FF03a.waterDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.batteriesDone == 1
; got all the stuff, advance. setStage DLC04FF03 90 set DLC04FF03a.brewDay to gameDaysPassed set DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone to 1 endif ;endif endif endif endif
I'm going to hang onto it for now.
I apologize that I cannot receive you in person, agent Jiang. Our Norfolk contact confirms your arrival.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉我不能亲自接待你，姜特工。我们诺福克的联络人在你到达以后会与你接触。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain Comment (NAM2) : Mandarin for "Good Luck" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05contact_00004364_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How eager the Americans are to believe that a great mind of the People would defect! Our countrymen will herald you as a hero when your work is done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 美国人多么热切地希望人类那些伟大的思想会变节！在你完成你的工作以后，我们的同胞将会把你视为英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain Comment (NAM2) : Mandarin for "Good Luck" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05contact_00004364_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: To that end, let us turn to the details of your mission. This room will be your safehouse in Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 话说回来，还是让我们先看看你任务的细节。而这个屋子将会成为你在望海崖的根据地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain Comment (NAM2) : Mandarin for "Good Luck" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05contact_00004364_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Focus initially on playing the American lapdog. Do not arouse suspicion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先要把精力集中在美国狗身上。不要打草惊蛇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain Comment (NAM2) : Mandarin for "Good Luck" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05contact_00004364_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it is safe, use the key you were given in Norfolk to open one of the public rental lockers on the boardwalk near the Motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当确认安全之后，使用在诺福克取得的钥匙，打开板道附近汽车旅馆里的公共寄物柜，拿走里面的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain Comment (NAM2) : Mandarin for "Good Luck" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05contact_00004364_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will be provided with the password you'll need to access your mission debriefing. The agreed-upon payment will be paid upon extraction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将会提供你密码，以用于获取任务简报，至于报酬，将会按照我们的协议，在你完成任务以后支付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain Comment (NAM2) : Mandarin for "Good Luck" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05contact_00004364_6.ogg

NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain Comment (NAM2) : Mandarin for "Good Luck" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05contact_00004364_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is I, Professor Calvert! Don't bother looking around, I'm in your mind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是我，卡尔弗特教授！不用到处看了，我就在你的心里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq04_dlc04braintalkpl_00005a22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about instead of playing his game, you destroy that nasty little device?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要帮他做事了，帮我除掉那个令人讨厌的设备，你看怎么样啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq04_dlc04braintalkpl_0000663b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deposit it in the nearby trash compactor and we will never have to worry about it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只要把它放到离你最近的垃圾压缩机里，我们就永远不用去担心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq04_dlc04braintalkpl_0000b3c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assure you that the gratitude of Professor Calvert is worth a great deal more than that of a washed up old limey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我保证卡尔弗特教授的感激要远比那个英国佬来得要有价值得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq04_dlc04braintalkpl_0000849c_1.ogg

NPC : Voice-Activated Security System [0A005B94] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05bankrej_00005b68_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Password: Verified! Voice ID: Mismatch! Access denied - User voice unauthorized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 密码：通过验证！声音身份：匹配错误！拒绝访问 - 用户声音未经授权。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Voice-Activated Security System [0A005B94] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05banksub_00005b67_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Voice ID or password not recognized. Access Denied.
ESP.TRADUIT: 声音身份或密码未能识别。拒绝访问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Voice-Activated Security System [0A005B94] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05bankzba_00005b6d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go to the bank and use password xмn tian weng. The software is configured to recognize only our voices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去银行，并且使用密码xin tian weng。软件已被设置为只会识别我们的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain Comment (NAM2) : Chinese man with an almost perfect "American" accent. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05passhol_00005b6c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! Most excellent! I knew that you would make the right choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！真的是太好了！我就知道你能做出正确的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq04_dlc04braintalkpl_00006639_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now it is time for Desmond to meet his end! He's made a fatal mistake!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，是时候让德斯蒙德去死了！它已经犯下了一个极其严重的错误！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq04_dlc04braintalkpl_0000b3c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Calvert Mansion. I have something there that I'd like you to see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到卡尔弗特公馆里。我有一些东西想让你瞧瞧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq04_dlc04braintalkpl_0000663a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agent Jiang; as you know, an important Chinese surveillance vessel was lost in American waters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 姜特工；如你所知，一艘中国侦察船在美国海域失踪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05debrief_00006aad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your mission is to destroy derelict submarine SSN-37-1A before the Americans can recover and analyze it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的任务是在美国人修复以及开始分析之前摧毁掉被抛弃的潜水艇SSN-37-1A号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05debrief_00006aad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The recovery location is included in this dossier, and your cover ensures that the Americans will allow you access to their recovery operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份文件里有说明修复作业的详细地点，并且你的伪装也会使你顺利加入到他们的修复作业当中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05debrief_00006aad_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: However; you will need an authorization code to trigger the self-destruct sequence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而；你需要授权码来启动自毁装置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05debrief_00006aad_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of our field operatives in your area, Agent Yang, has these codes hidden in a dental capsule, but her current whereabouts are unknown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一位战地联络员，杨特工，拥有这个授权码，她将这一信息隐藏在一个胶囊里。但是目前她去向不明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05debrief_00006aad_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locate and rendezvous with Agent Yang, then destroy the submarine. Report to your safehouse for extraction information when the mission is complete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 取得与杨特工的联系，并且与她会合，然后摧毁潜艇。当完成任务后，回到据点作任务简报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05debrief_00006aad_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The will of the People protect you, Agent Jiang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿人民的意志保佑你，姜特工。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05debrief_00006aad_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you two just talk it over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们俩为什么不谈谈呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talking is irrelevant! He must be destroyed!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000cc7e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assist me, and your reward will be great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助我，你将有丰厚的报酬！
