ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000cc7e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so sick of you. Both of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们两个真是，太恶心了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your sickness is irrelevant! If you require it, I shall reward you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的病不会影响大局！如果你想要，我可以奖赏给你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000cc79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is my enemy! And you will be rewarded!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是我的敌人！我会付你报酬的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000cc7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way I'm paying that. I'll stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会付这个钱的。我就留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm kind of busy. Find her on your own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点忙，你自己找她吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, I'm not asking for much. But if you're going to Point Lookout, and you find a girl named Nadine, just give her this note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求求你，我不会要求太多。如果你要去望海崖，并且找到一个名叫娜丁的女孩的话，请把这张纸条给她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_dlc04catherinegr_000072ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She stowed away on that boat, and I haven't heard from her ever since. I'll do anything if it'll help find her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从她离开船以后，我就再也没听过关于她的消息。我会尽我一切力量帮助你找到她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_dlc04catherinegr_000072ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't promise anything, but I'll look for her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能承诺什么，但我会去试着找找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, bless you! Her name is Nadine, and she left a couple weeks ago. Said she wanted to see the world, silly little thing that she is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，祝福你！她的名字叫娜丁，她几周前就已经离开这里了。她说她想要用自己的双眼去看看这个世界，多么愚蠢的小女孩啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_dlc04catherinegr_000072ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Tobar said he dropped her off at Point Lookout, but who knows what's happened to her since then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 托巴尔说她在望海崖就下船了，但是谁知道那之后她又遇上了什么事情呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_dlc04catherinegr_000072ea_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you can convince my little Nadine to come back, but just give her this note from me, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你能否把我的小娜丁带回来，但是至少请把这张纸条带给她，可以吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_dlc04catherinegr_000072ea_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dad taught me never to accept rides from strangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爸爸告诉我，永远不要任由陌生人摆布。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, but he's not here, now is he? And besides, I'm no stranger! I'm Tobar the Ferryman, at your service!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他不在这儿，对吧？再者，我不是陌生人！我是船长托巴尔，愿为你效劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobargreeti_000072f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might be. What's so special about Point Lookout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我或许是的。望海崖有什么特别之处么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like a man who's been around the wastes, so I'll cut right to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像是个拾荒者，那我就直入主题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobargreeti_000072f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In Point Lookout, you'll find fresh-grown food, mysterious locales, and treasures as-of-yet un-looted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在望海崖，你能找到新鲜成熟的食物，神秘的地点和尚未被洗劫的宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobargreeti_000072f6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But keep your wits about you, because you'll find more than a few exotic critters and inhospitable locals. So stay here if you're not man enough!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你也要放机灵点，因为你会发现不止一种外来生物和不好客的本地人。要是你还不够强壮就先待在这儿吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobargreeti_000072f6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look like a woman who's been around the wastes, so I'll cut right to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来像是个拾荒者，那我就直入主题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobargreeti_0000b5de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In Point Lookout, you'll find fresh-grown food, mysterious locales, and treasures as-of-yet un-looted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在望海崖，你能找到新鲜成熟的食物，神秘的地点和尚未被洗劫的宝藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobargreeti_0000b5de_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But keep your wits about you, because there's more than a few exotic critters and inhospitable locals. So stay here if you're too dainty to rough it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你也要放机灵点，因为你会发现不止一种外来生物和不好客的本地人。要是你还太娇贵就先待在这儿吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobargreeti_0000b5de_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to book passage to Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想预定去 望海崖的行程。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice boat. You must have seen a lot of places with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是条不错的船，你一定开着它去过了好多地方吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should have seen her back in her heyday! Why, we traveled up and down the coast, from the Commonwealth to the Broken Banks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该看看她最光辉时候的样子！我们沿着海岸旅行，从联邦旅行到破碎海岸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutduche_000072ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good times, but these days she's not fit to take out to the coast. Too many spouts ready to drown her, and too many critters looking for lunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是一段美好的时光，但是最近她都没有再去海岸。太多的人打算用口水淹没她，而且也有太多饥饿的家伙在寻找午餐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutduche_000072ec_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Point Lookout run is good enough for now. We've got a sweet deal ferrying cargo and the occasional traveler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是去望海崖的旅程在目前来说就已经足够了。我们已经达成了一个甜蜜的交易，去运送一些货物，有时候也运送一些旅行者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutduche_000072ec_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if getStageDone DLC04MQ01 30 == 0 setStage DLC04MQ01 30 endif
I've been around for a long goddamn time. The last time I knew a bird named Nadine, I still had skin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这待了很长时间了。上次我见着叫娜丁的鸟时，我还保存了她的皮呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutnadine_0000844e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was some girl who came nosing around here a few weeks back, but she ran off before I could... introduce myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几周前有个女孩子跑到这里来四处闲晃，但是在我还没来得及做自我介绍的时候，那个女孩子就跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutnadine_0000844e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen a woman named Nadine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过一个叫娜丁的女人吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, Nadine! Spritely little tomboy with more curiosity than common sense, that one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊， 娜丁！像个假小子一样，知道的不多，好奇心不少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_000072f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caused so much trouble on the trip that I probably would have thrown her overboard... if she hadn't reminded me of myself at her age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她在旅途中总是制造麻烦，要不是因为她钩起了我儿时的回忆，我早就把她扔到水里去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_000072f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't seen her since we hit land at Point Lookout. But knowing her, I'll bet she's gotten herself in plenty of trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到达望海崖后我就没再见过她。但是基于我对她的了解，她肯定有卷入到什么麻烦里了吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_000072f1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A girl named Nadine caught a ride on your ship. Any idea where she is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫娜丁的女孩搭过你的船。知道她现在在哪吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's about your age, and when she left, her hair was dyed bright orange. You shouldn't have any problem recognizing her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她跟你差不多大，并且她离开的时候，染了橘红色的头发。你肯定一眼就能认出她来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000844d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She told me she wanted to go find her fortune, but I thought it was too dangerous. I should've known better than to say that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她告诉我说她要去寻找财富，但是我认为那太过危险了。我应该多劝劝她就好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000844d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moment I told her she couldn't go, it was just a matter of time before she ran off...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时候我跟她说不要走，实际上，她的离开只是时间上的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000844d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about your daughter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于你的女儿你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds like her. Too busy having her adventures to think about family. Like mother, like daughter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那听起来像是她的所作所为。总是忙于她自己的冒险以至于没什么时间去考虑家庭。像是母亲，或者女儿一类的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000f3a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I talked to your daughter, but she says she can't come back yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你女儿谈过了，但她说她现在还不打算回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got Nadine back, safe and sound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把娜丁安然无恙地带回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been around for a long goddamn time. The last time I knew a bird named Nadine, I still had skin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这待了很长时间了。上次我见着叫娜丁的鸟时，我还保存了她的皮呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000b5e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was some girl who came nosing around here a few weeks back, but she ran off before I could ... introduce myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几周前有个女孩子跑到这里来四处闲晃，但是在我还没来得及做自我介绍的时候，那个女孩子就跑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000b5e6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you seen a woman named Nadine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过一个叫娜丁的女人吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this, a date? You start making a move, and it's stabbing time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这算什么，约会吗？你倒是挺主动，不过，也是该出手的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000da42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? There's not much to say. I ran off from home to see the world and find a fortune. And I'm doing it now, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我没什么可说的。我从家里跑出来就是为了看看这个世界，找找财宝。并且我可以告诉你，我现在也是这么做的，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000da43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No really, tell me about yourself.
There's not much to say. I ran off from home to see the world and find a fortune. And I'm doing it now, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没什么可说的。我从家里跑出来就是为了看看这个世界，找找财宝。并且我可以告诉你，我现在也是这么做的，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutnadin_0000da44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me more about Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我更多关于望海崖的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here on my own business. You wouldn't understand it even if I tried to explain it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里是来处理我的私事的。即使我给你解释了你也不会理解的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutpointl_00008444_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know why anyone would bother with this shithole. It's filled with a bunch of disgusting inbreds and half-crazed loons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白为什么这些家伙都这么在意这个屎洞一般的地方。那不过是一个充满恶心的傻子和半疯的狂人的地方罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutpointl_00008444_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna do what I came to do, and then get the fuck out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里有我的目的，达成后我他妈的就离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutpointl_00008444_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here on my own business. You wouldn't understand it even if I tried to explain it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里是来处理我的私事的。即使我给你解释了你也不会理解的.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutpointl_0000e12b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know why anyone would bother with this shithole. It's filled with a bunch of disgusting inbreds and half-crazed loons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白为什么这些家伙都这么在意这个屎洞一般的地方。那不过是一个充满恶心的傻子和半疯的狂人的地方罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutpointl_0000e12b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna do what I came to do, and then get the fuck out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里有我的目的，达成后我他妈的就离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutpointl_0000e12b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在南边，海湾的这边，那里有一个被侵透的海滩叫望海崖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_000072e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's got it all. Ruins of ancient pleasure towns, mysterious swamps bristling with treasure, and all practically untouched by outsiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这里什么都有啊。镇子的废墟，充满宝物的神秘沼泽，并且几乎都没有被外界玷污过。无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富、权利或者是吹牛的筹码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_000072e9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you're curious, I could offer you a ride over to that faraway land. For a nominal fee, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_000072e9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And sorry, but I don't do group trips. If you want to see Point Lookout, you'll have to leave your friend here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并且很抱歉，我不喜欢组队旅行。如果你打算去望海崖，你需要把你的朋友留在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_000072e9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if getStageDone DLC04MQ01 30 == 0 setStage DLC04MQ01 30 endif

ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: if getStageDone DLC04MQ01 30 == 0 setStage DLC04MQ01 30 endif
Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在南边，海湾的这边，那里有一个被侵透的海滩叫望海崖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_0000b5e2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's got it all. Ruins of ancient pleasure towns, mysterious swamps bristling with treasure, and all practically untouched by outsiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这里什么都有啊。镇子的废墟，充满宝物的神秘沼泽，并且几乎都没有被外界玷污过。无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富，权利或者是吹牛的筹码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_0000b5e2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you're curious, I could offer you a ride over to that faraway land. For a nominal fee, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_0000b5e2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're staring at it, friend! Drink it in!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在盯着他瞧，朋友！喝掉它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_0000b5e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See the glorious boardwalk, fabled pleasure-town of the sunny past! And beyond it lies the haunted swamplands. Who knows what's hidden in them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这光辉的栈道，传说中的欢乐之镇，让你仿佛置身于阳光明媚的美好时光！而不远处就是那遭到诅咒的沼泽。谁知道这里有什么秘密呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_0000b5e3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But while you get your bearings, my friend runs an excellent supply shop right here, near the boardwalk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 趁着你身上带着这些东西的时候，去我朋友那里看看吧，我朋友在栈道那里经营一家商店。很显然，无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富、权利或者是吹牛的筹码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_0000b5e3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only that it's where Tobar gets those Punga Fruits he sells off. Must be making a good profit off of them, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 托巴都是从那里搞到膨葛的。他肯定靠这个得到不少好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_0000b5e4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear rumors the place is full of swamps and killer plants, but I don't know about all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谣传说那里到处都是沼泽和杀人植物，但是具体情况我就不清楚了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpoint_0000b5e4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Point Lookout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么关于望海崖的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did the Punga Fruit come from?
Good stuff, isn't it? Actual, healthy food, grown in the actual ground and everything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好东西不是吗？实际上啊，这可是健康食品，这可是在土里面长的哦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_000072eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a few places out in the Point where it grows naturally. One group of Tribals have cultivated and refined it, but they're not big on sharing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在望海崖附近地区，有野生的这种果子。有这么一个部族耕种并培育这种东西，但是量不大，不足以与外人分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_000072eb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even ask how I get my hands on the refined crop. A magician never reveals his secrets, does he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要问我是从哪里搞来的这些植物的。魔法师从来不会揭穿自己魔法的秘密，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_000072eb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Punga grows strong. I help Punga grow stronger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 膨葛长得很茂盛。我帮助膨葛长得更加茂盛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000da3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Punga understands me. I understand Punga.
ESP.TRADUIT: 膨葛理解我，我理解膨葛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000da3c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is all it needs to be.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000da3c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么搞到那么多膨葛种在这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you kidding? Why wouldn't we? As much as we want to reject earthly desires, we still need to eat, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你开玩笑吗？为什么不呢？即使我们抛弃对尘世的渴望，但是我还们还是需要吃东西的啊，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000f3b1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It grows fast, fills you up, and you can make a lot of things with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它长得很快，能填饱你的肚子，也可以拿来做很多的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000f3b1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything it doesn't provide, we can get by trading it to outsiders. That shifty bastard Tobar's always looking to buy more from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它不能提供给我们的东西，就需要我们去从外来者那里购买。那个叫托巴尔的混蛋总是想赚我们一笔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000f3b1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you grow so much Punga here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要种那么多的膨葛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is a gift from the earth itself, in acknowledgement of our perfect balance with nature and the higher planes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是大地的馈赠，是对于我们与大自然和更高的层次实现完美平衡的奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000f3b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She recognizes that we seek to leave behind the corrupt physical, and she nurtures us in our quest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她对我们抛弃身上腐朽废物的做法非常认可，并在我们的征途中给我们以指导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000f3b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么搞到那么多膨葛种在这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell the truth, I got no idea. Ground's probably pretty fertile here, on account of the graveyard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你说，我完全不知道。这里的土地之所以很富饶，我估计跟那个墓地有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plus, we got lots of people tending the gardens. Especially the big man, Croatoa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，我们有很多人都在照料那个花园。特别是那位大人，克罗托亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000f3b3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guy's got a knack for plants. Makes sense - mentally, they're on the same level.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对如何照料植物有自己的敲门。挺管用的 - 也就是心理作用吧，大家的水平其实都差不多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutpunga_0000f3b3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么搞到那么多膨葛种在这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please step inside, agent. Extraction details can be found on the terminal inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请进，特工。您将会在里面的终端找到详细信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [0A00732E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05protpro_00007325_1.ogg

NPC : Protectron [0A00732E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05protnev_00007324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clearance acknowledged. Follow me for your extraction debriefing, Comrade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得到许可。请随我来做任务情况汇报，同志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [0A00732E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_dlc04ff05protpas_00007326_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So? It's smoke. Things burn down all the time. Especially around me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么？这不过是烟而已。每时每刻都有东西烧着，尤其在我周围。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That smoke's coming from old Calvert Mansion. I always heard it was haunted, but more importantly, I always heard it was full of pre-war treasure!
ESP.TRADUIT: 烟从老卡尔弗特公馆出来。我一直听说那儿闹鬼，但更重要的是，总听到那里满是战前宝藏！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobarwelcom_000080f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I said Point Lookout was perfect for treasure hunters, but it's a rare day when you get a beacon like that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我说过望海崖是财宝猎人的圣地，但现在能有那么个灯塔很稀奇了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobarwelcom_000080f8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should I be worried? What's over there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该担心吗？那儿有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, nothing much. Just old Calvert Mansion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么。就是老卡尔弗特公馆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobarwelcom_000080f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just a huge, abandoned estate teaming with who knows what opportunities for profitable scavenging. Y'know, nothing much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是做不知道有没有搜刮价值的巨大废弃的地产而已。你知道，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobarwelcom_000080f6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I said Point Lookout was perfect for treasure hunters, but it's a rare day when you get a beacon like that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我说过望海崖是财宝猎人的圣地，但现在能拥有那样的一个灯塔就很稀奇了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq01_dlc04tobarwelcom_000080f6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a house in MEGATON?TENPENNY?. Do you know Tobar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一间房子。核弹镇？特配尼？你知道托巴尔么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not safe here. Let me put a roof over your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里不安全。让我来保护你吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll have loads of fun. I promise!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会很快乐的，我保证！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haha, just kidding! Boy, I had you going, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，我是开玩笑的！孩子，我会把你也带着的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kenny, would you like to come live with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯尼，你愿意跟我一起走么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anybody ever say you talk too much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人见过你说这么多话吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04backtot_00008152_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. I was getting tired of that anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，不管怎么说我也对那感到厌倦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04backtot_00008153_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you survive in here all alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么一个人在这种地方活下来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I go out to play some days and might bag me a shellman to eat. Most days I just sit here with my stories and toys, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有时候出去玩，也许还会要点果仁吃。大多数时候我只会坐在这里玩我的玩具，讲我自己的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04minesur_00008155_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you hiding down here?
Swamp Folk know Ol' Herzog's Mine-hole. Say it's haunted. So I knew most folk wouldn't wander this way, except outsiders like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 住在沼泽的人都知道赫尔佐格的那个矿洞。传闻说里面闹鬼。所以说住在这里的人都不会去靠近的，除了像你这样的外来者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04minewhy_00008154_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't usually take more than a clapper-jaw on the leg to scare them off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要吓走他们恐怕不会很容易吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04minewhy_00008154_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Old Man Herzog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于老赫尔佐格的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a mean old man, owned this mine a million years ago. Made the miners work real hard and didn't give them any money or food for their kin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个非常小气的老家伙，很多年前就获得了这矿井的所有权。他对矿工很苛刻，逼着矿工干很多活，但是又不给他们工钱或者食物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : telling a story

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day a bunch of miners sat down and just stopped working. Old man Herzog, he didn't like that. Not a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次，一些矿工停下手里的活坐下来休息。那个老家伙赫尔佐格，不喜欢那些矿工这样做，一点也不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : telling a story EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04mineher_00008139_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, he blew them all up! With a million-million tons of dynamite!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以他就把他们都炸飞了！用了好多好多炸药！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : telling a story EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04mineher_00008139_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one wanted to work in the mine after that. Then Ol' Herzog came down here and hung himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从那以后，就没有人为他工作了。然后他就一个人来到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : telling a story EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04mineher_00008139_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say his angry ghost still haunts the mine. That doesn't scare me, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说那个生气的幽灵经常在矿井附近出没。不过我并不害怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : telling a story EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04mineher_00008139_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's it like living in Point Lookout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在望海崖生活是什么样的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: The grownups like my mama and pop just live in the wet. They're okay, they just don't trust outsiders like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像我妈妈爸爸这样的大人都只是生活在湿地。他们是好人，只是不太信任像你这样的外来者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04aboutpt_0000813b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most think I'm an outsider too, because I don't got the markings on me. I tend to stay away from the grownups.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人认为为我也是个外来者，因为在我身上没有什么标示。我总是尝试远离那些大人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04aboutpt_0000813b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Except when they have a campfire. Some nights I hear them dancing. Then I sneak out to watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非有篝火。有时候我能听见他们在跳舞。然后我就在一旁偷看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04aboutpt_0000813b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dunno. I ran away a long time ago. I live here all by myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我从那里跑出来已经很久了。我一直一个人生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : sad EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04aboutpa_0000813e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already told you. I ran away. Shut up about it, all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经告诉你了。我从那里跑出来了。不要再提这件事情了，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : doesn't want to talk about it EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04aboutpa_0000813f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Settle down. I'm not going to hurt you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，我不会伤害你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, you weren't "born right"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是什么意思？你说你 “生下来就是个错误”？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at me. I don't got the marks. I go around the wets and folk will shoot at me! Thinking I was one of your type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看着我。我身上没有标示。我走过湿地就会有人朝我射击！想象一下我曾经就像你一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04aboutno_00008151_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you run away from home, Kenny?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要离家出走，肯尼?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't born right. Mama hid me in the basement and pappy kinda just forgot about me, but I knew I had to go before I grew up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我生得不是时候。妈妈把我藏在地下室，爸爸好像是把我忘了一样，但是我知道我要在我长大之前离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04aboutru_0000813c_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于你的事，肯尼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know I once bagged a Mirelurk ten feet tall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我曾经搞到过一个10英尺高的蟹人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : He's exaggerating! - -emphasis on "ten feet tall," like it's "TEN FEET TALL" EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04about_0000814c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you can't beat me in a race. You look reeeal slow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌你跑得肯定没有我快。你看起来真的很慢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04about_0000814d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet I can burp louder than you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌我打嗝的声音比你大！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04about_0000814f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cut the crap, kid. That light show isn't scaring anybody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废话少说，小子。这光线不会伤害任何人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I mean it, mister. The ghost will melt your brain to mush! You need to get out here. And fast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是认真的，先生。那僵尸会把你的大脑变成玉米粥！你必须赶快离开这里。要快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : trying to scare off an intruder EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04greetin_00008144_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I mean it, lady. The ghost will melt your brain to mush! You need to get out here. And fast!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是认真的，女士。那僵尸会把你的大脑变成玉米粥！你必须赶快离开这里。要快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : trying to scare off an intruder EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04greetin_0000f921_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ghost? Where? We'd better get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 僵尸？在哪？我们最好离开这儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you'd better scram - if he looks you in the eyes, your brain will melt!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你最好快跑 - 如果你与他的双眼对视，你的大脑就会被溶化！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : exaggerating EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04greetin_00008157_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the traps and noises, that was all you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这些陷阱和声音都是你弄出来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what if it was? I've bagged meaner than you, and I'll do it again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是真的又怎么样？我抢的比你要多得多，让我再来一次也没关系！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04greetin_0000813a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come over here, boy. Let's talk.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05abrain_0000831b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come over here, girl. Let's talk.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05abrain_0000b842_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had something I wanted to ask you...

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_00008320_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_00008325_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At last! Our game is ending!
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于！我们的游戏要结束了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000831f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you attack the mansion?
Damned if I know. It was abandoned when I got here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我根本就不知道。在我来这里之前那里就被遗弃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutmansio_00008443_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's plenty hidden away here, none of it would be useful to to a bunch of crazed inbreds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有很多的隐蔽通道，不过对于那些疯狂的蠢蛋，这些都毫无意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04aboutmansio_00008443_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would they want to attack the mansion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们为什么想要攻击这公馆？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our most enlightened one divined that the fates themselves did decree the mansion must be burnt to the ground!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最智慧的指引者预言说，命运早已注定了这公馆必须要被烧成灰烬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a83c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly? I got no idea. Word came down on high that the place had to come down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白的说，我不知道。上面传下话来说那个地方要被拆掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000e159_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackson said he saw its destruction in a vision. There were some concerns, but when the leader says it's a mandate from beyond, you don't ask why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克逊说他看到了它的毁灭。虽然还有一些疑问和忧虑，但是如果首领说那是神谕，你就不能问为什么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a83d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That hill is holy. It must be cleared. Jackson told us this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克逊跟我们说，那个小山是神圣之所，必需要被净化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a83e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some went to fight. I stayed with Punga.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人已经去战斗了。我留下来待在膨葛身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a83e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Punga does not fight. Punga grows where it can. Punga knows what is important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 膨葛不参加战斗。膨葛尽可能得到处生长。膨葛知道什么是重要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a83e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We take no pleasure in violence. Our goal was merely to remove the ghoul. His presence is an offense to the Transcendent Master's astral dominion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不喜欢用暴力解决问题。我们的目标仅仅是除掉那个僵尸。他的出现是对我们至高无上主人的星之领土的冒犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a83f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I cannot claim to understand the exact reasons that the mansion's resident caused such disruption, however. To understand fully, ask the Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公馆里的居民造成如此破坏的具体原因我并不清楚。如果想知道的话，你应该去找主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a83f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I did, but that moron thought it was one of his addled visions. The real goal was to destroy the ghouls' jamming device!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。但是那个傻子还以为是他那愚蠢的“神谕”呢。实际上，真正的目的是去摧毁僵尸的干扰设施。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a840_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, those fools aren't worth the meat they're made of. A minion that can't follow directions is no use at all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白地说，那些傻子一点存在的价值都没有。奴才要是不听话，那就一点用都没有！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000a840_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you tell the Tribals to attack the mansion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你下令让部落攻击这公馆的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woah, woah, woah! That was all Jackson's crazy idea. I knew better than to volunteer for that suicide mission!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，哇哦，哇哦！这很显然是杰克逊出的疯狂的主意。这种自愿去送死的做法，我一眼就能看出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000da4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I wandered too close to that mansion, some old ghoul sicced his dogs on me. Screw that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次我打算接近那公馆，结果有些老僵尸竟然把狗放出来咬我。去他娘的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutmansi_0000da4a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're brainless morons who worship some crazy spirit. What's to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都是些没大脑的白痴，崇拜着某个疯狂的灵魂。但是知道到底怎么回事呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04abouttribal_00008442_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about the Tribals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么关于部落的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're brainless morons who worship some crazy spirit. What's to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都是些没大脑的白痴，崇拜着某个疯狂的灵魂。但是知道到底怎么回事呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000b5dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about the Tribals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道什么关于部落的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We espouse the expansion of the perfect mind, and the rejection of the corrupt physical!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们崇尚对完美思想的延伸和对腐朽肉体的拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000a846_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The material world is destroyed and imperfect. We seek to release our minds from their tainted cages, so as to find a better world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的物质世界已经分崩离析，并且也十分的不完美。我们在寻找并且传播我们的理念，好让人们从他们的枷锁中得到解放，我们要把这个世界变得更美好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000a846_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does this tribe believe in?
We're all about expansion of the mind, denying the physical, all that good stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都在扩展着我们的思想，鄙弃我们的肉体以及其他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000f3ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, have you looked around? This world sucks the big fat one, so we're ditching it and going off to fantasyland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，你看到你的周围了么？核弹摧残着这个世界，所以我们要抛弃它，去追寻梦想的天堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000f3ad_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only, not imaginary fantasyland. Real fantasyland, right? A world of perfect thought. Anywhere but this shithole, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是，不是什么幻想世界，而是真正的梦想世界，对么？一个充满着完美想法的世界。不管它在哪，它绝不会在这个糟糕的洞穴里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000f3ad_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does this tribe believe in?
I'm denmother. I keep us safe and make sure everyone remembers to eat and sleep. It's more work than you might think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是洞穴之母。我保证大家的安全，并且确保每个人都记得吃东西，去睡觉。这工作比你想象的要辛苦得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Using a polite metaphor for them being insane or nearly catatonic. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000a847_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do in this tribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这个部落里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We dream. Dream of a better world, not falling apart like ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们梦想着。梦想身处在一个美好的世界里，而不是这个分崩离析的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000a848_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when we find a dream that makes us forget this world, we dream that we do not have to wake up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并且当我们找到了那个梦想世界的时候我们就忘掉这个世界，我们梦想着自己不需要醒来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000a848_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are a family of dreamers, a band of astral explorers, and a church of the mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们梦想之人是一个大家庭，是一群星界的旅行者，是思想的教堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000a849_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In time, we will be free of the horrors of the base physical world. We will play amongst the pure thoughts of the universe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 迟早，我们要从这个以物质为基础的世界里解脱。我们要在宇宙里的纯粹的思想世界里畅游。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04abouttriba_0000a849_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, hold on there. Not so fuckin' fast. You can be useful to me. I need someone willing to get their hands dirty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先等等。现在还不他妈的是时候。你能帮上我的忙。我需要个愿意干脏活的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desfakegood_00008446_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, here's the deal: I help you get in with those Tribals, you help me get what I want, and I'll make you fuckin' rich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以说，我们需要达成一个交易：我帮你解决那些部落造成的问题，你帮我得到我想要的东西，我就可以把你变成他妈的富翁了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desfakegood_00008446_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just try not to sprain a lobe while you're thinking about it. My time is short.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你考虑的时候可要小心别扭伤了你的脑子。我没那么多闲工夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desfakegood_00008446_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance of getting more training?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么得到更多训练的机会么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, there's always a chance, certainly. But what you earn depends on how well you can follow directions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当然了，机会总是有的。但是你能获得什么，要取决于你在多大程度上服从于我的命令了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not the most incompetent waster I've ever met. I think we could put you to work and figure out what's going on here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你并不是我见过最无能的废物。我想，这里有点工作需要你去做，并且看看这里到底放生了什么事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondgree_0000844f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your reward would be considerable, since I know that's what you wasters value. Decide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现你这个垃圾有点价值吗，我会考虑关于奖励的问题的。 决定吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondgree_0000844f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of failsafe are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的安全故障是什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know why the Tribals were attacking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那部落为什么要发动攻击么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a fuckin' clue. It'd be easy to chalk it up to their crazy religion, but if I'm right, and I always am, there's something else going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点他妈的线索都没有。但是仍然很容易就能联系到这与他们该死的疯狂的宗教有关，如果我的猜测是对的话，当然了，我的猜测总是对的，他们肯定在谋划着什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondgree_00008447_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the third attack in a month, so somebody's got a grudge with me. Whether it's a man or a god, I intend to set them straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这已经是这个月第三次袭击了，所以，这看起来有人对我充满了怨恨。不管这背后是人还是神的指使，我都要跟他们算算账。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondgree_00008447_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are they attacking? Can't we reason with them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们为什么要发起攻击？不能跟他们讲道理么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you? How do I know I can trust you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？我怎么知道你不会害我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I'm taking orders from you, pipsqueak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我要听命于你这小鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How does Professor Calvert control the Tribals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡尔弗特教授是怎么控制部落的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You saw it. He uses his device to talk to their soft-headed leader in those caves. They think he's a fuckin' god, and they do what he wants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看见了。他使用了某种装置在洞穴里跟他们的蠢蛋领袖交流。他们以为他是他妈个神，便任由他使唤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_0000848e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The blighters are too stupid to get it right most of the time. But, seeing as how they figured to attack me here, Calvert is getting close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些家伙太愚蠢了，命令他们办事可不容易。不过，他们既然能到这来袭击我，看来卡尔弗特就快成功了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_0000848e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if their "god" goes silent, then they won't be a problem anymore, now will they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果他们的“神”沉默了，那他们就不再有威胁了，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_0000848e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does the Cogwave Jammer do?
At some point, Professor Calvert developed the ability to speak inside people's heads. Problem is, he's not so good at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从某种角度讲，卡尔弗特教授发展出一种建立在人脑中通话能力。问题是，他还不能很好地驾驭这种能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_00008496_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's using something to boost his power and talk to those Tribal simps. The fools think he's God or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他用某种东西加强了与部落白痴们的交流。那些傻瓜以为他是神之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_00008496_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I jam up his signal, he won't be able to get them to do what he wants, and I'll be able to find where the little fuck is hiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我阻断他的信号，他就无法随心所欲的操纵部落了，而这个时候我就能找到那个小杂种的藏身处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_00008496_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need me to do again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你接下来还想要我干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were you not paying attention? I need you to take that Cogwave Jammer over to the Ferris wheel by the docks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没听见吗？把脑波干扰器带到码头边的摩天轮那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_0000849a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attach it to one of the cars, then raise it as high as it will go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 装到一个客厢上，再转到最高点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_0000849a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the only way we'll be able to shut off the Professor's ability to talk to those simple bastards who work for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教授能跟那些弱智混蛋进行通话，从而来操控他们。只用通过这个我们才能阻止他们的通话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_0000849a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's just too bad, ain't it? But since you're so afraid, attach the thing to one of the cars and then spin it around to get it to the top.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，那太糟了，不是吗？但既然你这么害怕，那就随便装到一个客厢上，再转到高处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008497_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll watch from here and turn it on when it's ready. Then we'll see where our little Professor is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就从这里观察，就绪了便开启开关。然后就能知道咱们的小教授在哪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008497_2.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008497_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Player.AddItem DLC04Jammer 1 SetStage DLC04MQ04 20
;// swap the wheels DLC04FerrisWheelStaticREF.disable DLC04FerrisWheelREF.enable
That big wheel down by the docks, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 港口下面的巨轮，没错吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right. Attach it to the bottom car, then turn it on and spin the jammer to the top. No fuckin' problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。装到最下面的客厢上，开启开关，把干扰器转到最高处。绝对他妈的没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000848f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll watch from here and turn it on. Then we'll see where our little professor is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就从这里观察并开启开关。然后就能知道咱们的小教授在哪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000848f_2.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000848f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Player.AddItem DLC04Jammer 1 SetStage DLC04MQ04 20
;// swap the wheels DLC04FerrisWheelStaticREF.disable DLC04FerrisWheelREF.enable
So, how do we shut him down?
If I know the Professor, he's using a high frequency cognitive sine broadcast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要说我了解教授的话，他肯定正用一种高频感知正弦广播。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_000084a0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the perfect device to jam up that little worm's talkbox. All you need to do is take it to the highest point around and install it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个绝佳的装置来干扰他那小小的发音盒。你要做的就是将其带到海滩上的最高点并安置好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_000084a0_2.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_000084a0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I know Professor Calvert, and I do, he's using a high frequency cognitive sine broadcast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要说我了解卡尔弗特教授的话，我确实了解他，他在用一种高频感知正弦广播。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008498_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the perfect device to jam up his little talkbox. All you need to do is take it to the highest point on the shore and install it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个绝佳的装置来干扰他那小小的发音盒。你要做的就是将其带到海滩上的最高点并安置好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008498_2.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008498_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I can't wait to hear this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我都已经等不及要听听了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, those half-wits are getting messages from the Professor, right? So, he's off somewhere broadcasting to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些智障在接受教授的信息，对吗？所以他肯定从某处发出了信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008491_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But without those buggers to do things for him, he can't do much for himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦离开这些为他卖命的混蛋，他自己就没什么能耐了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008491_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, we cut off his ability to talk to them, and he'll need to try harder. Maybe then I can find the squishy little worm and finish him off for good!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们废掉他们相互交谈的能力，他就有麻烦了。或许我们就能找到这个软黏黏的蠕虫，永远除掉他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008491_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want me to do?
So, those half-wits are getting messages from the Professor, right? So, he's off somewhere broadcasting to 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些智障在接受教授的信息，对吗？所以他肯定从某处发出了信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000848d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But without those buggers to do things for him, he can't do much for himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦离开这些为他卖命的混蛋，他自己就没什么能耐了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000848d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, we cut off his ability to talk to 'em, and he'll need to try harder. Maybe then I can find the squishy little worm and finish him off for good!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们废掉他们相互交谈的能力，他就有麻烦了。或许我们就能找到这个软黏黏的蠕虫，永远除掉他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000848d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There'd better be something good at the end of this.
Nothing but the best for people who stay in my good graces. Now, you ready to stop whining and listen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我决不会亏待我所赏识的人。现在，你能闭上臭嘴听我说两句吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008495_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, right. You're mean, we get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，没错。我们都看出来了，你很小气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're goddamn right, I am. Now, let's get on with the work, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太他妈正确了，这就是我。现在，咱们开始干正事吧，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000849b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should watch your tone, old man.
Or what? You think I haven't been shot before? Think that you, over the thousands who have tried, can take me down?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想怎样？你以为我没中过枪吗？无数的人都想要我的命，你以为你能行？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008490_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd best wise the hell up and play along. I'll get what I want, and you'll get rich, and then we can go about our separate goddamn ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好放聪明点，乖乖听我的。我拿到我想要的，你也会得到报酬，然后我们就能他妈的分道扬镳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008490_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, now you want me to do something else, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你现在想让我干点什么，是么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course I fucking want you to do something else. You don't expect me to trod around this mudhole my self, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈当然想让你干点别的。你难道以为我会自己踩进泥坑里磕磕绊绊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008494_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know this guy? What's going on here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识这家伙么？这里是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calvert is my old rival. Centuries, we've played this game. I knew he'd be stupid enough to hide so close to his family home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡尔弗特是我的老冤家。几世纪以来，我们一直在玩游戏。我就知道他会藏在离家这么近的地方，只有他这么蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008499_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not a matter of hate, it's a matter of destiny. He is my enemy, and I do not suffer any bastard who opposes me to live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这无关恨，只是宿命。他是我的敌人，我不能容忍任何反抗我的杂种活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008499_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew he was here, and it is my intent to find him, and call down a righteous fucking hammer on his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道他在这儿，我只是想找到他，让上帝把那该死的正义锤子砸在他脑袋上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008499_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 只是夸张了点。他的脑袋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008499_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, who is this brain thing, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这个教授到底是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Members of the Calvert family were influential all over the world. They practically owned a deed to the US government.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡尔弗特的家族成员在全球都极富影响力。实际上他们在美国政府大有势力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008493_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In their best days, there were no less than three Calvert family senators, seven members of the house, and two governors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在最辉煌的日子，卡尔弗特家族有至少三名参议员、七名众议员和两名州长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008493_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They even had a top candiate for president, until that scandal with the dog forced him to drop out of the race. I was particularly proud of that one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们甚至有过最有希望的总统候选人，直到与狗的丑闻迫使他们放弃了竞选。我对此感到分外自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_00008493_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice curtains. Could you try not to bleed on them when I kill you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是漂亮的窗帘啊。我可不想你的血弄脏了这些窗帘，能配合下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tough, are you? Good, I might have use for that. Come, let's talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真狠啊，不是吗？很好，我可不那么好惹。来吧，我们谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaintroa03_0000885f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just admiring the architecture. I didn't mean any offense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在欣赏这建筑，没有任何恶意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in Blackhall Manor. This isn't a tourist attraction, but I appreciate your good taste. Come, let's talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你身处布莱克霍尔庄园。这不是旅游胜地，但我欣赏你的品位。来吧，我们谈谈。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaintroa02_00002efd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just admiring the architecture. I didn't mean any offense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是在欣赏这建筑，没有任何恶意。
我找到你的泰迪熊了。<撒谎>

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;NOTE by not making this a top level this is essentially being cut from quest ;This is being done because he doesn't tell you you can move in, and we are post text lock - if we weren't in text lock, I'd move this into the DLC04FF04Teddy topic ;I'm leaving it in case we decide need the voice assets
player.removeItem TeddyBear01 1 set DLC04FF04.fetchTeddy to 2 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF04 10 1
Okay. I'll go get it for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会帮你把它搞到手的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gee, thanks! I dropped him near the shaft, so he's probably at the bottom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耶啊，谢谢！我把他掉进那个通风管道里了，也许你能在最底部找到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_0000885a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't go back there much - it's real dark and there's lots of critters. You should be fine, though!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不常去那里 - 因为里面太黑了，而且里面有很多吓人东西。但是你肯定能应付！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_0000885c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm still looking for your teddy bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还在找你的泰迪熊呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring him back as fast as you can!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04teddy_00008861_1.ogg
NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04teddy_00008862_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC04FF04 100 set DLC04FF04.fetchTeddy to 3 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF04 20 1 player.removeItem DLC04FF04KennyBear 1

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : hoping he's found a new friend EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04teddy_0000f922_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So hey. You can use this place as your hideout if you want. Hide from the folk out there. Stash your stuff. Okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，嘿。如果你想的话你可以把这里当做你的藏身之处。藏起来不被外面那些家伙发现。存放你的东西。好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : hoping he's found a new friend EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04teddy_0000f922_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC04FF04 100 set DLC04FF04.fetchTeddy to 3 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF04 20 1 player.removeItem DLC04FF04KennyBear 1
No, Calvert! I brought someone with me, someone very special. This stranger tricked you into letting me find where you were hiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000831c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I certainly can do one thing that you can't: I can fucking well walk!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有件事你不能做而我能：我他妈能好好走路！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e4a6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you! Always with empty fucking threats and meaningless drivel, but never the will to act!
ESP.TRADUIT: 而你！他妈的只会耍嘴皮子吓唬别人，整天胡言乱语，但从不付之行动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e4a7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000cc78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, Calvert! I brought someone with me, someone very special. This stranger tricked you into letting me find where you were hiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00B84D]DLC04MQ05Conv) 0A00B84D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05c_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000b83b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah yes, Mister Lockheart. At last we meet, face to jar. But I'm afraid that at the end of this, it is you who will meet his end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，洛克哈特先生。我们终于见面了。但恐怕最终见到末日的会是你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000831d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So vulgar, Mister Lockheart! After all this time, you still haven't learned to expand your vocabulary! Fool!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太粗俗了，洛克哈特先生！事隔这么久，你还是没能扩展你的词汇！蠢货！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e4a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your words mean nothing to me, Mr. Lockheart. You are a foolish and vulgar man, incapable of the slightest forethought!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的话对我毫无意义，洛克哈特先生。你是个愚蠢粗俗的人，没有一点深谋远虑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e4a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you are, you slippery bastard! At last! Let's end this, here and now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于逮到你了，你这狡猾的混蛋！终于！就在这里，做个了断吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_00008326_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个没实体而可悲的小脑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e498_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个恶心滑腻的混蛋，还没头盖骨！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e499_1.ogg

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000cc88_1.ogg
