ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me more about this Book that's so important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我更多关于那本书的事，这很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Obadiah's a good man, but his family has an evil past. This book is an unwanted heirloom, and the foundation of the heathen Krvibi ritualists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥巴迪亚是个好人，但他的家庭有着邪恶的过去。这本书是不义的传家宝，野蛮的卡维碧仪式的基石。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04marcellabo_00009248_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What should I be doing again?
I told you about their ritual site, remember? See if they're hiding the book there and bring it back to me. From there? I don't yet know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟你说过他们的仪式场所，记得吗？看看他们有没有把书藏在那儿，有的话带回来？我可说不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04marcellabo_0000924b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we discuss the Blackhall situation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能谈谈布莱克霍尔的情况么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fear Obadiah is in dire straits. What do you want to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕奥巴迪亚状况不妙。你想谈什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02g_dlc04marcellabo_00009247_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much of a housekeeper, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不止是个管家吧，对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did it work? Is the ritual complete?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这管用么？仪式完成了么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a time, we feared your mind had journeyed too far from your body, and you had departed our world. But you returned to us again, at long last!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有那么一阵，我们都怕你的意识游离于躯体太远，你已经离开了我们的世界。但你还是回来了，姗姗来迟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1b_00009262_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1b_00009262_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened sister!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的姐妹！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1b_00009262_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a time, we feared your mind had journeyed too far from your body, and you had departed our world. But you returned to us again, at long last!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有那么一阵，我们都怕你的意识游离于躯体太远，你已经离开了我们的世界。但你还是回来了，姗姗来迟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1b_00010f04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1b_00010f04_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened brother!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的兄弟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1b_00010f04_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're still going to be like that, huh? I suppose it was too much to hope that transcendental enlightenment had taught you some manners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还是会像那样做，哼？我想我我对超脱的启迪能教你些礼貌抱太高的期望了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1b_00009263_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, you'll learn some humility eventually, even if Woodrose has to beat it into you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你最终还是会学会的有些人性，即便银背藤要对你强行灌输。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just get inside the sacred cathedral. You're enlightened now, so try to act like it, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 进神圣大教堂去吧。你已经开化了，表现得像样点，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1b_00009263_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You again? Why couldn't I hallucinate someone who's not a moron?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又是你？我的幻觉里面为什么就不能出现一个智力正常的家伙呢！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to me? Why does my head hurt so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么了？我的头怎么那么疼？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is merely the sensation of your consciousness rushing to embrace its true potential. It is the feeling of having no boundaries. No limits!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只是你那急于揭开真正潜力的意识的感受。那是没有边界，没有极限的感受！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1a_0000926d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1a_0000926d_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的姐妹！

ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的兄弟！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04wakeup1a_0000926e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, be that way. It's called the Ritual of the Mother Seed. Laugh if you want, but it will open your mind to the world!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，就那样吧。这叫做母亲之种仪式。想笑就笑吧，但它能解放你的思想！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009266_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去西边的大沼泽冒险吧，在那儿你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人更高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009266_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect its seeds, and you will be welcome in the tribe. Then you shall learn the true wisdom of our ways!
ESP.TRADUIT: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009266_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really think they'll just let me in like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的认为他们会就这样让我进去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are people who think cutting a hole in their skull can expand their mind. They're not exactly scholars over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是群想着在脑袋上开个洞来扩展思想的人。他们可不是什么知识分子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_0000926b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just head up to the Cathedral and ask real nice. When you're in, you find the bastard in charge and find out what they're up to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去大教堂好好问问。你进去以后，去找那个混蛋管事的，看看到底发生了什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_0000926b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, like you've never done something unpleasant for the promise of your own personal gain? Give it a rest, saint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你这么说就好像是你从来都没因为自己的私利而作过不好的事情一样？你算了吧，圣人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009260_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just head up to the Cathedral and ask real nice. When you're in, you find the bastard in charge and find out what they're up to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去大教堂好好问问。你进去以后，去找那个混蛋管事的，看看到底发生了什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009260_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, but that's not really an option. I was only being polite in pretending that it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，但是那并不是一个选择。只是出于礼貌我才说它是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits Comment (NAM2) : Intimidating - knows he's the only game in town. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009265_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you what, take a while and roll it around in your tiny brain. Consider your other options, if you think you've got any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你吧，用你的小脑袋好好想一想。考虑一下你的另一个选择，当然了，假如你还能再想出来一个的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits Comment (NAM2) : Intimidating - knows he's the only game in town. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009265_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of reward are you offering?
The only reliable currency in the world: information. You provide me with valuable info about the Tribals, I pay in kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个世界上最可靠的货币：信息。如果你能提供我一些关于部落有价值的信息，那么你将获得很好的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a few more tricks I can share with you, if that's not enough to get you barking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这还不够让你叫唤的话，我还有一些小把戏可以与你分享，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, but how can I infiltrate them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但我怎么混进他们中间去呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy-peasy, right about now they'll be wondering what happened to their hunting party.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相当容易，这样一来他们就会想要知道，他们的狩猎小队出了什么事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_0000926a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to learn to pay attention when I speak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我说话的时候你要注意听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009276_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those mud-lovers want me dead, and haven't extended the common fucking courtesy of telling me why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些玩泥的家伙想要我死，并且还不不能指望他们像正常人一样告诉我为什么要杀死我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009276_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I need you to find a way into their commune and figure out what's going through their addled little heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你跟他们混熟，并且从他们的愚蠢的小脑袋里面找出他们在想些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009276_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be a good pup, and Ol' Desmond will give you a treat. And, of course, who knows what riches they have for you to steal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 乖乖听话，老德斯蒙德会好好地招待你的。当然了，谁知道他们有什么好东西值得你去偷呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009276_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want me to do about the Tribals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于那部落，你想让我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Do you have to make some sort of tea out of magic beans, or play a song for their lizard king?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你打算从那个神奇的豆子里搞出点茶来还是说你打算去给他们的蜥蜴国王唱首歌啊?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009277_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please. They're a pack of religious nutballs. Grow a pair and just go through the motions. Anyone with a brain knows that it's all bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求求你了。那些都不过是宗教性质的歪理邪说。有点风吹草动就把事情带有感情地夸大到不行。有点大脑的人就会明白那些都是胡扯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq02_dlc04desmondoffe_00009277_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Tribals want me to do some ritual before they'll let me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那部落要我举行某种仪式才可以进去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去西边的大沼泽冒险吧，在那儿你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人更高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009269_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009269_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not so sure about this. Tell me more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这个不是很确定。多告诉我一些吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去西边的大沼泽冒险吧，在那儿你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人更高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009275_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009275_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no fear. I will take your test, and I will be victorious!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有恐惧。我会接受你的测验，而且我一定会获胜！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You may not be so brave when you face the Ritual of the Mother Seed. Stronger souls than you have attempted it and lost their minds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你面对母亲之种仪式时，可能就不会这么勇敢了。更强大的的人也已经尝试过，但都丢失了自己的意识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009267_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去西边的大沼泽冒险吧，在那儿你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人更高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009267_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009267_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously? "The threshold of transcendence"? Just let me in, already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当真？“无我之境”？让我进去就好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, you're doing it wrong! If you want to join, you're supposed to get into the right mindset, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，你做错了！如果你想加入，你应该进入正确的精神状态，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_0000926c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't just take any recruit, either. You've got to be willing to see the world a different way. You may not understand, but it's important to us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也不会招募任何人。你肯定愿意从不同的角度看待世界。你可能不明白，但对我们来说很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_0000926c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that means you can't get in unless you've gone through the ritual. Don't worry, it's nothing big. But it really does makes a difference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那意味着在完成仪式前，你不能加入。别担心，没什么大不了的。但却真的会有所不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_0000926c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I seek the wisdom of your people. May I join your tribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在寻找了你的子民的智慧。我可以加入你的部落么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's this? A humble traveler, seeking the guidance of our awakened minds? Truly, this is a glorious day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？一位谦逊的旅行者，寻求我们苏醒意识的指引？真的，这是光荣的一天！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are from far away, and must be strong indeed to have traveled this far! But strength is nothing without the guidance of the enlightened mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从远方来，你确实很强壮，走了这么远的路！但没有觉醒的意识指引，力量将一无是处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009264_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you seek entry, you must be prepared to expand your consciousness. You must prove yourself worthy to transcend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你在找入口，你必须准备好拓展你的意识。你必须证明自己值得超脱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04tribalentry_00009264_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nadine, your mother asked me to find you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 娜丁， 你妈妈让我来找你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, it's not that I don't want to go home, or anything. I mean, I love my ma, even if she does make me want to claw my eyes out sometimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，事情不是这样的，并不是我不想回家。我的意思是，我爱我的母亲，虽然有时候她会逼我发狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinefoun_00009261_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just, I came out here to find a fortune. To make my mark. To be able to bring something with me when I do come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里只不过是为了发财。我要成名。我可不想空着手回去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinefoun_00009261_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just wait 'till mom sees the haul I'm bringing home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就等着我把这些东西带回家吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinefoun_0000f3a6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance you're going home now?
They may have killed her twice. It was pretty messy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许她死了两次。这真她妈混乱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Spare me the details, you goon.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A00F939]DLC04FF02graveyard) graveyard for unused topics EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pretty sure I just saved your life, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我十分确定我刚刚救了你的命，你知道的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but you helped me out, and that's something. Can't let you think I'm not a gracious host, can I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，只要你帮我解决了这个问题，那不就可以了吗。我怎么可能会让你觉得我不是一个仁慈的主人呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondrewa_0000c1e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, tell you what I'll do, I'll share a few tips for the next time you're making a dramatic final stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，告诉我我将要做什么，我会分享一些能使你在下一次战斗中戏剧性地站到最后的技巧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondrewa_0000c1e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;set DLC04MQ01.DogFriend to 1 ;SetAlly DLC04PetDogFaction PlayerFaction 0 0 player.addperk DLC04SuperiorDefender showMessage DLC04MQ01PerkAdded
Have I tried to chew on your skull, sir? Perhaps you've noticed my ability to string words into complete sentences?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先生，我曾经尝试过对你如此品头论足过么？也许你已经发现了我的能力是把闲言碎语组织起来？讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari Comment (NAM2) : Sarcasm barely bridled by good manners EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hosteth_00009b47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These ferals are nothing like myself. I'm no more a monster for providing them than you are for slaughtering them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟那些野蛮的家伙可不一样。我可不是被你屠宰的怪物。讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari Comment (NAM2) : Sarcasm barely bridled by good manners EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hosteth_00009b47_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have I tried to chew on your skull? Perhaps you've noticed my ability to string words into complete sentences?
ESP.TRADUIT: 先生，我曾经尝试过对你如此品头论足过么？也许你已经发现了我的能力是把闲言碎语组织起来？讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari Comment (NAM2) : Sarcasm barely bridled by good manners EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hosteth_00011093_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These ferals are nothing like myself. I'm no more a monster for providing them than you are for slaughtering them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟那些野蛮的家伙可不一样。我可不是被你屠宰的怪物。讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari Comment (NAM2) : Sarcasm barely bridled by good manners EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hosteth_00011093_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if we get overwhelmed? How do I get out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们输了怎么办？我怎么逃出去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not an option, I'm afraid. The thrill wouldn't be the same if you knew I'd release you at the first sign of trouble, now would it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可不行。如果在一开始就给你制造麻烦的话，那会减少乐趣的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06ruleses_00009b46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll remotely release groups of ferals against which you must defend yourself. Don't worry, I'll make sure there aren't too many loose at one time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会远程遥控，释放一定数量的未驯服的野兽，而你则需要保护自己不被杀死。不要担心，我会确定一次不释放太多野兽的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06rulesba_00009b42_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're in for quite a treat, if I do say so myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说的话，你简直是来这里享受大餐的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06rulesba_00009b42_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have weapons for me to use?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么武器可以给我用的么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapons are your own responsibility, ma'am. I'm sure you have your own preferences, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要自己解决武器问题，女士。毕竟你有自己的武器偏好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06rulessu_00009b45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapons are your own responsibility, sir. I'm sure you have your own preferences, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要自己解决武器问题，先生。毕竟你有自己的武器偏好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06rulessu_0000ecef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me more about the Safari.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我更多关于狩猎的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, but of course. What would you like to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，当然了。你想要知道些什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06rules00_0000f290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do hope you enjoyed it. What shall we discuss?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真希望你能乐在其中。我们需要讨论一些什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06rules00_00009b49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need a refresher, do we? What would you like to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要学习一下，是吗？你想要知道些什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06rules00_0000f291_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's go over the Safari again.
I'm a bit short on caps at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在手头没那么多瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps you're in the wrong place? Do come back when you have the means.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你找错地方了吧?当你想到解决办法的时候再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostpay_00009b44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's 1,000 caps. Let's get this show on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你1000个瓶盖，我们开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the spirit! The other participants are waiting, so just press the button inside to let me know when to begin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要的就是这种精神！其它的参与者都在等着呢，如果你准备好的话就按下那个按钮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostpay_00009b51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeItem caps001 1000 DLC04FF06HostREF.additem caps001 1000 DLC04FF06ArenaDoorREF.unlock setStage DLC04FF06 50

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_00010678_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000a3fc_1.ogg
Quest : ([0A00B84D]DLC04MQ05Conv) 0A00B84D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05c_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000b83d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000a3fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05bdesmo_00010679_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00B84D]DLC04MQ05Conv) 0A00B84D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05c_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000b83e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is she on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道她会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000cc87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道他会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e17c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know nothing! You are nothing! If you're such a man of will, attack me and be done with it! Or do you fear for your life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道些什么！你这杂种！如果你意志坚定，那就跟我做个了断吧！还是说你贪生怕死？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e49b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! You make me laugh! So proud! So foolish! Yet, you are all talk! Attack me, if you wish to be done with this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！真是笑话！如此自大！如此愚蠢！废话连篇！想做个了断的话，就放马过来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000e49c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is she on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道她会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000a3f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Desmond. But who's side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were do bad at choosing your allies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道他会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A00B84D]DLC04MQ05Conv) 0A00B84D (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05c_dlc04mq05bdesmo_0000b843_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neat! I want some of it.
You're free to take whatever you find in this disgusting place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个令人恶心的地方，你找到的东西都归你所有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dlc04desmondst18_000108d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I came for is of no interest to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里的原因与你无关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dlc04desmondst18_000108d3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enjoy your spoils. I don't think our paths will ever cross again. And I think we can both thank Christ and say hallelujah for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好好享用你的战利品吧，我想我们以后的道路不再会有交集了。并且我们可以为此感谢主，并说声哈利路亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dlc04desmondst18_000108d3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC04DesmondREF.DesmondPostQuestAction to 2 DLC04DesmondRef.evp Player.Additem DLC04MQ05RewardKey 1 SetStage DLC04MQ05b 200 SetStage DLC04MQPQ 10
What's so great about his stuff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的东西好在什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dlc04desmondst18_0000a3fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟卡尔弗特已经打了200多年的仗了！而现在，终于，一切都结束了，我赢了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dlc04desmondst18_0000a3fe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这200年里，无论他打败我这件事情，还是从我这里偷走的知识，技术和研究成果，现在都已经不再重要了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dlc04desmondst18_0000a3fe_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down, there. You'll make a mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，你会把事情搞糟的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

ESP.TRADUIT: 在这200年里，无论他打败我这件事情，还是从我这里偷走的知识，技术和研究成果，现在都已经不再重要了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dlc04desmondst18_00010781_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst1_0000a400_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟卡尔弗特已经打了200多年的仗了！而现在，终于，一切都结束了，我赢了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst1_0000a400_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这200年里，无论他打败我这件事情，还是从我这里偷走的知识，技术和研究成果，现在都已经不再重要了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst1_0000a400_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. You were right not to trust me. Die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你不相信我是对的。死吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: If nothing else, I have to say that you were good sport!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a405_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll be the appetizer before I destroy the professor!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你将会成为我消灭教授前的开胃菜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a405_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy DLC04DesmondFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondREF.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondREF.StartCombat Player
It happens to us all. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 碰巧就落到我们头上了。走吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brace yourself, my friend. You're about to witness the end of an era!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要打起精神，我的朋友，因为你将见证一个时代的终结！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a404_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I wanted to. Just like I want to kill you now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我乐意。就像我现在乐意干掉你一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nihilism is so boring. Try it if you must, I could use the warmup before I kill the professor!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怀疑主义实在是无聊。如果你想试一下就去吧，我就把这个当作是杀死教授前的暖身运动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a408_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy DLC04DesmondFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondREF.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondREF.StartCombat Player
I figured it was the best way to get him to drop his guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为这是让他放松警惕的最好办法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I had you wrong. And that in itself is a once in a lifetime event.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我误解你了。我想这在我的一生中不会再犯第二次了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a3fa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I'm done taking orders from you. After this, we're through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我受够了听从你的指挥了。从现在开始，我们没关系了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After this, I won't require your services any longer. I suppose that works out now, doesn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切结束以后，我就不再需要你的服务了。我想这就解决了我们之间的问题，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a3fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, since we're in agreement about this, let's go in there and "retire" the good professor!
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你已经同意了，那么就让我们进去，让那个大教授“退休”吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a3fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brace yourself, you're about to witness the end of an era!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要打起精神，我的朋友，因为你将见证一个时代的终结！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a3fd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very nice. Now can you say "please don't kill me?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你现在能说“请别杀我”么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I can't. But let's see if you can!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不能。但是也许你能！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a3ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy DLC04DesmondFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondREF.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondREF.StartCombat Player
And I'm supposed to help you for free?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么说我应该免费帮你么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm 250 years old, so I think I have a shiny thing or two that might interest your tiny brain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经250岁了，所以说我有一两个好东西可能会让你的小脑袋感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a401_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if it's riches and weapons and things that you want, I have more than enough to spare. And all you have to do is do what you do best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，如果你想要财富或者武器又或者是其他东西的话，我的储藏足够与你分享。而你则做你擅长做的事就好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a401_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow orders, and end Professor Calvert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听从命令，杀了卡尔弗特教授。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a401_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've waited a long time for this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为了这一刻已经等了很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a402_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Savor the moment, my friend. This is the end of an era.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好好品味这一时刻吧，我的朋友。这是一个时代的终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a402_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now you'll pay for it with your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是你拿命来偿还的时候了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that so? I've come a long way, my friend. I highly doubt that my journey will end today!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是这样吗？这么长时间了，我一路走过来，我的朋友。我觉得我的旅程会在今天结束！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a403_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't take orders from anyone.
Fine then. Would it make your little feelbads all better if I said please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧。我如果对你说“请”，感觉会好点吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds Comment (NAM2) : Extreme sarcasm. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a407_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then pretty please, fucking help me rid the world of Professor Calvert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么就非常的、非常的请你他妈的帮我解决掉卡尔弗特教授。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds Comment (NAM2) : Extreme sarcasm. EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a407_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to see you up close when I told you I was going to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是希望当我告诉你我要干掉你的时候，你乖乖地靠过来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After 250 years, you think I'll go down to you? Ha! Try it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 250年了，你以为我会臣服在你的脚下？哈，有本事你就试啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a40a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetEnemy DLC04DesmondFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondREF.RemoveFromFaction PlayerFaction DLC04DesmondREF.StartCombat Player
I've been looking for you. I'm not going to side with this crazy brain thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在找你。我不会支持这个疯狂的教授的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well now, finally you show some goddamn sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，你终于说出点他妈的人话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a3f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if you're on my side, why did you destroy my jammer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果你是站在我这边的，那你为什么还要摧毁我的干扰设备呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a3f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm tired of you pushing me around, Desmond.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受够你的摆布了，德斯蒙德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? You betrayed me because I wasn't polite? Are you out of your fucking mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你背叛我就因为我没有礼貌？你他妈是不是疯了啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05b_dlc04desmondst5_0000a409_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what? You're going to kill yourself?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainnotice_0000a85e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need eyes to know you're there. Come here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不用眼睛就知道你在哪里。过来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainnotice_0000ae3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, we shall be free of all limitations! Thank you, master. We shall be the instrument of your mighty will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们不应受任何界线的阻碍！谢谢你，主人。我们将辅佐你万能的意念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04scene7_0000a839_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, fine, go destroy the house and its "impurities." Just stop that jammer, and I'll be free of you morons, once and for all!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，好，去摧毁那房子和那“干扰器”，我就放了你这个白痴，你就永远自由了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04scene6_0000a842_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to worry, enlightened one. We shall re-consecrate the mansion, and remove the impurities disrupting your perfect guidance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没必要担心，文明人。我们会重新供奉公馆，并清除一切干扰你完美指引的杂志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04scene5_0000a841_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not "astral knowledge" you simpleton! Psychic domination! And that still won't be possible until you destroy Desmond's jamming device.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不是“星界知识”，你这呆子！心灵控制！而且要等你摧毁了德斯蒙德的干扰器后才有可能！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04scene4_0000a836_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, and you will be able to spread your knowledge across the astral plane for all those wise enough to accept it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你将可以在整个星界对那些足够聪明的人散播你的知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04scene3_0000a83a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon, your sacred land shall be cleared of all obstacles. No longer shall its mystical powers be diminished!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久，你神圣的土地将清除所有障碍。所蕴藏的神秘力量将不再衰弱！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04scene1_0000a837_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't sound like you're having much fun here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你在这里过得不是很高兴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only been here a week or so, but I'm about ready to ditch this bunch of dummies. I already stole all the Punga I could ever need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我到这里也不过一个星期左右，但是我已经准备好甩开这些白痴了。我已经偷到了足够多的膨葛了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, if you still wanna know where Jackson's hiding, I can help you out. No reason for me to give a damn about this place, y'know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，如果你还打算寻找杰克逊的藏身之处的话，我可以帮你。我他妈的才不关心这个地方呢，你要知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: His cave's under the Cathedral, but it's hard to find. Use this key to get in through a wrecked ship down at sea cliffs to the east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的洞穴就在大教堂下面，但是很难找到。用这把钥匙到东边海崖下的失事船那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000da48_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to know where he's at.
Sure, fine. Why not? I'm planning on ditching this place, anyway. If you're about to cause trouble with Jackson, all the more reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，好吧。为什么不呢？我本也在计划离开这里了。如果你想跟杰克逊一起在这里制造麻烦的话，那就更有理由了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: His cave's under the Cathedral, but it's hard to find. Use this key to get in through a wrecked ship down at sea cliffs to the east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的洞穴就在大教堂下面，但是很难找到。用这把钥匙到东边海崖下的失事船那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you find that old idiot, tell him thanks for all the Punga I could steal!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你找到那个老笨蛋的时候，替我转告他，我十分感激他种了那么多膨葛让我偷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000a850_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我该到哪儿去找杰克逊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not so fast, grub. You haven't earned the right to go to the transcendent master's retreat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还不是时候，食物。你还没有得到许可，去进入至高无上的主人的休养地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000a843_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Couldn't tell you where he goes for his meditations. I swear, nobody tells me nothing. Maybe ask one of the others?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他去哪里冥想去了。我发誓，我什么都不知道。也许你应该问问其他人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000da3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alas, only the worthy may enter his nexus of meditation. He has not seen fit to enlighten me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊呀呀，只有有价值的人才能进入到他那奢华的冥想之地。我可不值得他的启发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000da3f_1.ogg
NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000da40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Off at his magical thinking-cave, I guess. We're not allowed to know where it is. He says we're not enlightened enough to understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他在那个神奇的冥想之洞里吧。他不告诉我们他在哪里。他说我们不够格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000da41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I swear, that sort of stuff pisses me off so much. I thought joining would be all drugs and magic, but it's just the same crap as everywhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发誓，这还真是让我生气。我原以为加入过程可能会涉及到一些药品或者魔法什么的，结果发现跟其他地方的那些垃圾事情也没什么不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000da41_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess that's why I trailed Jackson to his stupid mystery cave!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜那就是为什么杰克逊把我带到他那愚蠢的洞穴里的原因！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonloca_0000da41_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leader? That would be Jackson, a man of great wisdom. He has withdrawn to his Cavern of Communion, the better to contemplate the unknowable!
ESP.TRADUIT: 首领？我想那是杰克逊，一个充满了智慧的人。他离开了圣仪洞窟，是为了更好的冥想未知的事物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a856_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the righteous are trusted to know where this nexus of understanding lies. And alas, I am not so blessed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有正直的人才会被信任，而去了解那些一目了然的谎言之间的关系。但是我并没受到那种祝福。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a856_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would be Jackson. He's normally in here, leading sermons, tending to our needs, and speaking to us of his journeys in the realm of pure thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 肯定是杰克逊。他通常都在这里传授知识，或者倾听我们的需求，又或者是用他那纯净的思想来讲述旅行故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000da46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess he went off on one of his meditations again. He's always off praying for guidance, especially these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我估计他肯能又去做什么冥想了吧。他总是祈祷能得到引导，尤其是这段日子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000da46_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean Jackson? I thought he was inside. I guess you could check there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说杰克逊吗？我估计他可能在里面吧，你进去找找吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimson [0A00927D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a859_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you mean Jackson. He speaks the word of enlightenment at us, but he ain't fit to lead a song, much less this bunch of morons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你说的是杰克逊吧。他时常开导我们，但是他却不是什么当领导的料，在一群白痴面前更是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000da47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I been meaning to talk to him about this place, but he's off doing his meditation thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来是打算跟他谈谈关于这个地方的事情的，但是他好像又去做什么冥想了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000da47_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, you are wet behind the ears. Jackson leads us, and don't you forget. When he talks, you listen up and catch every word!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，你还真是嫩得一无所知呢。杰克逊领导我们，你可别忘了这一点哦。每当他说话的时候，你要注意去听他说的每一个词。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a85a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that you'll be hearing much for now. He's off meditating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你暂时是听不到什么了。他去冥想了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Woodrose [0A00A862] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femaletribal\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a85a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look to Jackson. He is the one who knows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心杰克逊。没人了解那个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a85b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But do not strain to see him here. Jackson is away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别那么想着去见他了，杰克逊已经离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a85b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it may seem that I am a brave shepherd to my flock, but the truth is far more humble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，这可能看上去我是我们这些人中勇敢的指引人，但是事实上，我是很卑微的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a85c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we are not swimming aimlessly! No, we have a beacon! The shining mind speaks to me in my meditations, and guides us always.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们并不是漫无目的地去畅游！不，我们有一个指引人！那光辉的思想总是引导着我的思维，引导着我们的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutleade_0000a85c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you lead the tribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么领导这个部落的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you are interacting with is merely a holographic projection. And a rather clumsy one, at that, but it's all I can manage at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你交互作用的东西不过是个全息图像投影仪。而且还是个残次品，不过吗，这也是目前我所能做到的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for myself, you gaze upon one of America's greatest minds, preserved through the miracles of SCIENCE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于我吗，你目前正在凝视的，就是由创造奇迹的科学所保存的，美利坚最伟大的思想精华！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainmeetwh_0000ae43_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much more elegant than shambling on as some rotting corpse for all eternity, don't you agree?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这比那个令人作呕的僵尸的永生来得要文雅得多，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainmeetwh_0000ae43_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might be able to help you. But first I want to know more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可以帮助你，但我需要先多了解一些事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. I cannot tell you how satisfying it is to find a suitable assistant after all these years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了，这么多年，我终于找到了像你这样合适的帮手，这可真是太令我满意了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, the ghoul is a pain, and may require disposal, but Desmond is only of secondary importance. The real target is a device in his possession.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个僵尸是个障碍，也许应该除掉他，不过吗，德斯蒙德不那么重要，那个设备才是头等大事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't promise anything, but tell me more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在不能承诺你任何事，但你可以先多告诉我一些事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What have you got against the Ghoul?
More than you could possibly imagine with your squishy pink mind, but the only pressing matter at the moment is a device in his possession.
ESP.TRADUIT: 理由甚至比你那扁铲脑袋能够想象到的要多得多，但最令人心烦的是他手里的那台设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: He has a jammer that limits my projection range to this pathetic cave. Remove that, and I can extend my reach so much further...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的那个干扰设备限制了我的对这个可怜的洞穴的控制。除掉那个东西，我就可以将我的思想传播得更远了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainmeet2a_0000ae37_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing Desmond would be a nice plus, but I'm sure we can get around to that later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能除掉德斯蒙德那当然是更好了，不过吗，我想我们可以以后再考虑这件事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainmeet2a_0000ae37_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Useful? What are you using the tribe for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有用？你打算用这个部落做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: At the moment, they've been no use at all, but I have very few options. They can't even seem to remove a single ghoul from a house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前来说，这些人一点用都没有，但是我的选择并不多。他们连个房子里的僵尸都搞不定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you come to lead this tribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么成为这个部落的首领的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jackson believes me to be some kind of god. You'd think that would be good, but his interpretations of my commands leaves something to be desired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克逊还以为我是什么神呢。你也许认为这不错，但是他对我的命令的解释说明却延缓了我渴望要做的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, I trust you can be more effective than he has been. I need your help on an important task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，你做事会比他更有效率吧。我需要你帮我做一个非常重要的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainmeet1a_0000ae38_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a troublesome ghoul who lives in Calvert Mansion. I need him destroyed, and his jamming device neutralized, immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个非常麻烦的僵尸，他住在卡尔弗特公馆。我需要你立刻把它杀死，并且毁掉它的干扰设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainmeet1a_0000ae38_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He thinks I'm some sort of god, and I have no reason to disabuse him of the notion. This makes me de facto leader of the tribe, as it were.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他以为我是个神，并且我也没有理由去纠正他错误的想法。在某种程度上，这使我成为这个部族的实际首领。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, I trust you can be more effective than he has been. I need your help on an important task.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，你做事会比他更有效率吧。我需要你帮我做一个非常重要的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainmeet1a_0000ae39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a troublesome ghoul who lives in Calvert Mansion. I need him destroyed, and his jamming device neutralized, immediately.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个非常麻烦的僵尸，他住在卡尔弗特公馆。我需要你立刻把它杀死，并且毁掉它的干扰设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq03_dlc04brainmeet1a_0000ae39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why was Jackson talking to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰克逊为什么要跟你谈话？

ESP.ORIGINAL: May I meet the Transcendent Master?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以见见至高无上的主人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is very rare that others are permitted to commune with the master. Many are too foolish to understand the great truths of his higher mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，与主人直接交谈是非常少见的。很少有人能够理解他那更加高尚的思想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I sense in you a great potential. Perhaps you have what is needed to accept his teachings and grow from his wisdom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我感觉你很有潜力。也许你能够理解他所传授的东西并且从他的智慧中获益。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae3a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He manifests here, high on a ledge in the great sea cave's well. Seek him out, and all shall be revealed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在这里显灵，就在海蚀洞里的一个岩石上。找到他，你所有的疑问就会被解答了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae3a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean, you're not really the one in charge of the tribe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的意思是，你不是这个部落真正管事的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would that I was so wise! No, true leadership of the tribe belongs to the higher mind of the enlightened one!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是那样的话，我可就太聪明了！不，我们部族真正的领导者属于那个高明且具有崇高思想的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although his mind has moved beyond the need for flesh, his consciousness still returns here to guide our people. I merely interpret his wishes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管他的思想已经超越了肉体，他的意识还留在这里引导我们。我只不过在口述他的希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He manifests here, high on a ledge in the great sea cave's well. Perhaps if you are fortunate, he will choose to share his wisdom with you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在此显灵，就在伟大海洋旁边洞穴里的一个平台处。如果你够幸运的话，他会与你分享他的智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae3b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to meet the Tribal leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想跟部落的领导见一面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I may be the man who leads our physical affairs, but I cannot claim true wisdom. I take my orders from a higher master!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我大概可以被称为是这里实际事务的决策者，但是我并不是精神领袖。有更高阶的领导给与我命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whether it be how to explore higher planes, or the decision to remove the disruptive ghoul, all wisdom comes from the Transcendent Master.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论是定下长远目标，还是决定除掉恼人的僵尸，所有的智慧，学问与正确的判断都来自于那个至高无上的主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae3e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was drawn to your eternal wisdom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被你永恒的智慧所吸引了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How wonderful! Perhaps you shall be the one who can clear the holy land of its disruptive presence!
ESP.TRADUIT: 多好啊！也许你就是那个能够净化这片残破不堪的圣地的救世主。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, but the Transcendent Master will want to hear of this! And as one so obviously led by visions, it is your right and honor to tell him yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，但是这个消息要通知给至高无上的主人！你要亲自告诉给主人，这是你的权利也是你的荣誉，因为这一消息是多么显而易见的神谕啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae49_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, it is he who makes all true decisions about the spiritual growth of our tribe, including the decision to cleanse the mansion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，他才是我们部族精神上的决策者，决策也包括净化那公馆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jackson [0A006637] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq03_dlc04jacksonmeet_0000ae49_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You best keep this one to yourself, sweetie. The family tonic gets real kick from our secret ingredient. We just need a lil' bit of battery acid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好把这个留给自己，宝贝。家传秘密配方炼制的补药可带劲了。我们只需要一点电池酸液。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questbatter_00003f69_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, don't look like that, now.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questbatter_00003f69_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You reckon I'd be around to tell you about it if it weren't safe enough? Bring me six fission batteries and I'll scrape 'em into the mix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是危险的话，你以为我还会在这儿告诉你这些吗？给我六块电池，我来把它们磨成碎屑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questbatter_00003f69_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought so. Those things do carry a smell, don't they? Let me take 'em off your hands, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也这么想。那些东西真的很难闻，不是吗？快丢掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questbatter_00003fbf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
player.removeItem fissionBattery 6 set DLC04FF03a.batteriesDone to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF03 70 1 if DLC04FF03a.batchActive && DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone == 0 if DLC04FF03a.fruitDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.yeastDone == 1 ;if DLC04FF03a.waterDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.batteriesDone == 1
; got all the stuff, advance. setStage DLC04FF03 90 set DLC04FF03a.brewDay to gameDaysPassed set DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone to 1 endif ;endif endif endif endif
Well, we'll need yeast. You can find it about anywhere, but there's a big stash on the boardwalk. Three sacks is enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我们需要酵母。那东西到处都是，不过木板路上有一大片。三袋就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questyeast_00003f67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Thank you kindly for these.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂了。谢谢你这些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questyeast_00003fbd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
player.removeItem Yeast 3 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF03 50 1 set DLC04FF03a.yeastDone to 1 if DLC04FF03a.batchActive && DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone == 0 if DLC04FF03a.fruitDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.yeastDone == 1 ;if DLC04FF03a.waterDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.batteriesDone == 1
; got all the stuff, advance. setStage DLC04FF03 90 set DLC04FF03a.brewDay to gameDaysPassed set DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone to 1 endif ;endif endif endif endif
I've got the yeast with me.
How much water do we need?
Punga fruit and lots of it. The stuff those loonies make at the church is best. Ten of those will do, but might cost you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 膨葛水果要很多。最好是那帮疯子在教堂种的。10个就行，不过可能要费点力气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questpunga_00003f57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wild fruit will do the trick, but you'll need twice as much of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 野生水果也可以，但那样需要两倍的量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questpunga_00003f57_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, ten from the growers at the cathedral, or twenty wild ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，教堂的10个，或者野生的20个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questpunga_00003f66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's quite a haul you have there, sweetie. You prefer to hand over the wild or the refined fruit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔，好大一堆水果啊，宝贝。你是要给我野生的还是精制的呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questpunga_00003fbc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This enough Punga Fruit for you?
Wild fruit, eh? Just as good, if a sight weaker for flavor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 野生水果，嗯哼？也不错，希望味道不会太浓烈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questpunga_0000afd9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
player.removeItem DLC04PungaWild 20 set DLC04FF03a.fruitDone to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF03 40 1 if getStage DLC04FF03 >= 15 && getStage DLC04FF03 < 90 if DLC04FF03a.fruitDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.yeastDone == 1 ;if DLC04FF03a.waterDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.batteriesDone == 1
; got all the stuff, advance. setStage DLC04FF03 90 set DLC04FF03a.brewDay to gameDaysPassed
endif ;endif endif endif endif
This enough Punga Fruit for you?
I see you sprung for the refined fruit. Good for you, sweetie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看你搞到了精制水果。太棒了，宝贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04questpunga_0000afda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
player.removeItem DLC04PungaRefined 10 set DLC04FF03a.fruitDone to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF03 40 1 if getStage DLC04FF03 >= 15 && getStage DLC04FF03 < 90 if DLC04FF03a.fruitDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.yeastDone == 1 ;if DLC04FF03a.waterDone == 1 if DLC04FF03a.batteriesDone == 1
; got all the stuff, advance. setStage DLC04FF03 90 set DLC04FF03a.brewDay to gameDaysPassed
endif ;endif endif endif endif
This enough Punga Fruit for you?

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来谈谈补药的事吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should be ready in a matter of hours. Check back soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该能在数小时内准备完毕。再联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04quest00topl_0000afd1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brewin' low and slow, sweetie. Process takes about a day. Why don't you come back in a piece?
ESP.TRADUIT: 酿酒是很无聊的，并且还要花很长的时间的，亲爱的。整个过程大概要花上一天左右。你为什么不晚点再来呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04quest00topl_0000afd2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the status on the tonic?
You're an eager one, ain't ya? I have to let the still air out a few days between brews. Check back with me later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还真热心，不是么?在酿酒期间，我需要把不流动的空气排放一下，这需要花上几天。过一段时间再回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04quest00topl_0000afd0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we make another batch of tonic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能再做一些补药么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon we can. Let's go over the ingredients again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们能行。让我再检查一下配料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04quest00topl_0000b466_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we make another batch of tonic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能再做一些补药么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There aren't too many ingredients, but I brew large batches, so we need a good bit of each.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这里配料不多，但是我想要大批量的酿酒，所以每种配料我都需要一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04quest00topl_0000afd3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm ready. Let me know what you need for your tonic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好了，让我们看看你要拿你的补药来做什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to gather up the ingredients.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要把配料集中起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04quest00topl_0000afd4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a righteous shame, but the offer stands. You just say the word, hon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是遗憾，但提议仍然成立。只要你开口，亲爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04tonicquestr_0000afcf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll bite. What do we need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我要了。 我们需要些什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This and that. Let me know when you want to work out the details.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样那样。想知道细节就来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04tonicquesta_0000afd7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't a game, you twit. Piss off and do what you're told.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可不是闹着玩，你这蠢货。快滚去干你的活吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Piss off and do what you're told.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't decided. I'll let you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没想好。决定的时候我会告诉你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you cross me, it'll be the last fuckin' mistake you ever make in this life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是你惹火了我，那他妈的就是你这辈子犯的最后一个错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now what else do you want?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3ba_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why would I do that? We're buddies, you and me!
