ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么会那么做？你跟我可是好伙伴啊！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever we are, we are not "buddies."
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论怎样，我们都不会是“伙伴”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, what the bloody Christ else did you want?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3b9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might be. Motivate me not to.
Are you fucking joking? I suppose you aren't. What is it you people use for money these days? Those bottle caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈在开玩笑？我看不像。最近你的人都把什么当作货币？就这些瓶盖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right. Well, here's a bunch of those. Now go do your goddamn job before my patience runs out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。唔，这还有一串。现在，在我失去耐心之前滚回去做你那该死的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3be_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then why are you wasting my fuckin' time? Don't you have somewhere to be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你他妈干嘛浪费我时间？没地方可去了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That brain contacted me. He wants me to destroy the Jammer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教授联系了我，他让我摧毁干扰器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't exactly say I'm surprised. You're not thinking about doing it, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只能说这在意料之中。你没想要这么做，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq01desmond_0000b3bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm glad I could be of fuckin' help to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔，很高兴我他妈帮了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_0000b3b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about what I'm supposed to be doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于我要去做的事，我有些问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, get on with it. We haven't got a lot of time, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有话快说。你明白，我们没多少时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq04_dlc04mq04desmond_0000b3b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fool! What have you done? You will pay for this! PAY!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这个笨蛋！看看你都做了些什么？你要为此付出代价！代价！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A39] (mod) Quest : ([0A005849]DLC04MQ04) Thought Control EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq04_dlc04braintalkpl_0000b3bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will I need anything else for the trip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在旅行之前我还应该准备些什么别的东西么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to buy a ticket.
I know you think you're ready for anything, but the threats you'll face in the swamp make those super mutants look like playful puppies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你认为自己已经做好面对一切的准备，但是你即将要面对的是是把沼泽里的超级变种人搞得束手无策这样的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0000b5da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So just be sure you know what you're getting into, okay? You still want to head out to Point Lookout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你将要卷入一个什么样的事件里么？即使如此，你仍然打算去望海崖？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0000b5da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking for fame and fortune? Hoping to cultivate the delicious Punga fruit? Or just looking to run away from your life on these dreary shores?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在寻找财富与名誉么?渴望播种美味的膨葛果吗?还是说打算离开这个阴郁的海岸?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0001027f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if DLC04TobarREF.getItemCount DLC04BoatTicket == 0 DLC04TobarREF.additem DLC04BoatTicket 1 endif set DLC04MQ01.TicketVend to 1 ShowBarterMenu
Let's see what you've got to trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你都有些什么东西要卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0000b5db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if DLC04TobarREF.getItemCount DLC04BoatTicket == 0 DLC04TobarREF.additem DLC04BoatTicket 1 endif set DLC04MQ01.TicketVend to 1 ShowBarterMenu

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0000b5dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if DLC04TobarREF.getItemCount DLC04BoatTicket == 0 DLC04TobarREF.additem DLC04BoatTicket 1 endif set DLC04MQ01.TicketVend to 1 ShowBarterMenu
At last! He's just ahead! I'll circle around and distract him. You take him from the front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于！要逮到他了！我绕着分散他的注意力。你从正面进攻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05adesmo_0000b839_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not hardly. I'll be here, and you'll be back. But you'd best hurry, or I may reconsider that reward I promised you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还没完呢。我就在这，你也会回来。但你最好赶快，否则我要重新考虑下你的报酬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b840_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a lifetime to wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一辈子时间来等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b840_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let's go in there and do this.
Now that's more like it. Follow me! You're about to witness the end of an era!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才像话嘛。跟着我！你将见证一个时代的终结！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b836_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need some time to get ready.
I suggest you hurry your pretty self up. I'm sure the bastard's got some sort of escape plan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好抓紧时间。我保证那个混蛋会想法子跑掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b83c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's great to see you alive! I was worried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到你活着真是太棒了！我一直在担心你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, aren't you a fuckin' softie. But Calvert is here. He's got a lab under the lighthouse, the little fuck. Right under my nose the whole time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔，你太他妈软了。但卡尔弗特就在这里。灯塔下有一座他的实验室，那个小杂种。一直在我眼皮底下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b838_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's down there, hiding behind robots and machines, sucking life! Pathetic! He dies now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就在下面，躲在机器人与机器身后，悲惨的生活！悲哀！现在去死吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b838_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lighthouse. He's got a lab under there, the little fuck. Right under my nose the whole time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那灯塔。他在下面有座实验室，那个小杂种。一直在我眼皮底下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b841_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's down there, hiding behind robots and machines, sucking life! Pathetic! He dies now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就在下面，躲在机器人与机器身后，悲惨的生活！悲哀！现在去死吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b841_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm really tired of being a pawn in this game, Desmond.
ESP.TRADUIT: 整天都被当成工具使唤，我已经受够了。德斯蒙德。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's good since the game is almost done. He's in the lighthouse, the little fuck. Right under my nose the whole time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔，还好游戏要结束了。他在灯塔里，那个小杂种。一直就在我眼皮底下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b844_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hiding behind robots and machines, what a miserable life! Pathetic! He dies now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 躲在机器与机器人身后，多么可悲的生活！悲哀！现在就去死吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000b844_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You! You're no tribal! Get in here and help me fight these bastards off, goddamnit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你！你不是部族的人！快来帮我对付这些混蛋，该死！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04mansionsieg_0000b859_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, you! I see you out there. Stop dicking around and help me, or else these cocksuckers will be coming after you next!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是你！我看见你了。别在那里乱晃，快过来帮我，不然的话这些兔崽子们对付完我就会对付你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04mansionsieg_00010652_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't stay barricaded in this saferoom forever. Now get in here and lend a hand!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能永远都这样藏着。现在进来帮我啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04mansionsieg_00010653_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to shit or get off the pot, joker. Get inside and help, or get off my damned lawn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是清理尿壶或者拉屎的时间了，开玩笑。给我滚进来帮忙，要不然就给我滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04mansionsieg_00010654_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of failsafe are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的安全故障是什么东西？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The type that kills everyone outside of my saferoom and leaves a hell of a mess to clean up. Standard type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一类型就是杀掉我的房间外所有人，然后留下个他妈的大烂摊子。标准类型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondrewa_0000c1e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not worth wasting on ignorant savages like them, honestly. Just as well you came along when you did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦白的说，那些愚蠢的野蛮人并没有活下去的价值。杀死他们无妨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondrewa_0000c1e6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, tell you what I'll do, I'll share a few tips for the next time you're making a dramatic final stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，告诉我我将要做什么，我会分享一些能使你在下一次战斗中戏剧性地站到最后的技巧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq01_dlc04desmondrewa_0000c1e6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;set DLC04MQ01.DogFriend to 1 ;SetAlly DLC04PetDogFaction PlayerFaction 0 0 player.addperk DLC04SuperiorDefender showMessage DLC04MQ01PerkAdded
Air Com, we have multiple flashpoints on horizon, come back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 空军指挥部，我们发现地平线有多处闪光点，请指示？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dead Pilot [0A00C2B7] (mod) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Excitable/Stressed. Cockpit recording. No-nonsense Military Jargon. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04blackboxto_0000c2b5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Air Command, USN Three-Five-Oh requesting landing vector. Have zero ceiling visbility and low on state, somebody get me a landing clearance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空军指挥部，美国海军3-5-0请求着陆航线。当前能见度为零并且器械运转状态不佳，请给与着陆指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dead Pilot [0A00C2B7] (mod) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Excitable/Stressed. Cockpit recording. No-nonsense Military Jargon. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04blackboxto_0000c2b5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: State One plus one zero to splash, have zero read on outer marker. This is USN Three-Five-Oh, I'm blind out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 状态为离斑点1+10处，雷达无显示。这里是美国海军3-5-0，我失去定位能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dead Pilot [0A00C2B7] (mod) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Excitable/Stressed. Cockpit recording. No-nonsense Military Jargon. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04blackboxto_0000c2b5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attempting Emergency Landing over water. INS pinger active on distress band. Flaps up, descent to eight cherubs. Three green, over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尝试紧急水上迫降。惯性导航系统声波发生器紧急启动。有振动，高度降至800。通话结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dead Pilot [0A00C2B7] (mod) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Excitable/Stressed. Cockpit recording. No-nonsense Military Jargon. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04blackboxto_0000c2b5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Five cherubs, treeline up, throttle easy on four lights. Prepping to pull the loud handle. <Static>
ESP.TRADUIT: 高度降至500，垂直下降，油门调节可轻易达到四灯。做好拉起飞机准备。<静电声>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dead Pilot [0A00C2B7] (mod) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Excitable/Stressed. Cockpit recording. No-nonsense Military Jargon. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04blackboxto_0000c2b5_5.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 所有机器人！启动！干掉德斯蒙德！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04mq05bbrain_0000c6fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll let you know when I decide what to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我决定怎么做的时候再来找你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you waiting for? Why do you hesitate? DESTROY HIM!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还等什么？还犹豫什么？消灭他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_00006be0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it. Desmond will die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我接受。德斯蒙德的生命到此为止了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_00006be1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 1 Player.RemoveFromFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04DesmondFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetStage DLC04MQ05b 125
How about I kill you instead?
Surely you mean that you will TRY!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_00006bdf_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_00006bdf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 2 Set DLC04TheBrainREF.BrainHatesPlayer to 1 Set DLC04TheBrainREF.FightState to 1 SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction DLC04DesmondFaction
SetEssential DLC04Desmond 1 SetStage DLC04MQ05b 175
Killing you is going to be more fun than killing Desmond.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得干掉你比干掉德斯蒙德更有意思。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly hope you enjoy your final moments!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然希望你能享受最后的时刻！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc72_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc72_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Set DLC04TheBrainREF.BrainHatesPlayer to 1 Set DLC04TheBrainREF.FightState to 1 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 2 SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction DLC04DesmondFaction
SetStage DLC04MQ05b 180
Ha ha ha ha ha! YES! LET'S!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc7c_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc7c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Set DLC04TheBrainREF.BrainHatesPlayer to 1 Set DLC04TheBrainREF.FightState to 1 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 2 SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction DLC04DesmondFaction
SetStage DLC04MQ05b 180
Before you kill me, I have questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你动手之前，我有几个问题要问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I should have seen this coming.
Don't think of it as betrayal. No no no, betrayal is for lesser men! Your use to me has simply expired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别把这当做背叛。不不不，小人才会背叛！只是你对我已经没用了而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now, I will dispose of you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc7f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Betrayal? No no no, betrayal is for lesser men! Your use to me has simply expired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 背叛？不不不，小人才会背叛！只是你对我已经没用了而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now, I will dispose of you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc76_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All in a day's work. Now share your wisdom with me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天天如此。现在，跟我分享一下你的智慧吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc7d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to show Desmond that no one pushes me around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要让德斯蒙德知道，没人能摆布我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I would have expected nothing less from you. And now, I have a very special gift:
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想到你会这么无能。现在，我有份特别的礼物：
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc73_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc73_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. So, what do I get for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有道理。那我能有什么好处呢？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584B]DLC04MQ05b) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05b_dlc04thebrainst_0000cc7b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, are you going to stab me in the neck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你要在我的脖子上刺个洞？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? Nah, not unless you try any funny business. Besides, you already got stabbed enough today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？不，除非你尝试点有意思的事。再说，你今天已经被捅够多刀子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, guess you don't know. For the last part of the ritual, after you pass out, this guy brings you back, cuts open your skull, and "frees your mind."
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，看来你还不知道。仪式最后一部分。你晕倒后，他们找人把你带回来，切开你的头颅，然后“释放你的思想”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da3d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you look like a lively one, so welcome to the tribe! My name's Nadine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，你还上去还算有生气，所以欢迎来到部落！我叫娜丁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da3d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll go crazy soon enough if you keep talking like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是再这么说话，我就会被你逼疯的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's gotta be the sanest thing I've heard all day! Of course, 'round here that's not saying a whole lot. Ritual hit most of them pretty hard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我今天听到最理智的声音！当然，在这没什么人说话。仪式对大多数人打击很大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, guess you don't know. For the last part of the ritual, after you pass out, this guy brings you back, cuts open your skull, and "frees your mind."
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，看来你还不知道。仪式最后一部分。你晕倒后，他们找人把你带回来，切开你的头颅，然后“释放你的思想”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you look like a lively one, so welcome to the tribe! My name's Nadine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，你还上去还算有生气，所以欢迎来到部落！我叫娜丁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da39_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heads cut open? What are you talking about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 脑袋被切开了？你在说什么啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure you're feeling okay in there? You might want to check your head for a scar. We all get 'em after going to that bog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定你没事？或许想要看看你脑袋上有没有伤痕。我们去了那片沼泽后都有了伤疤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices

ESP.ORIGINAL: Y'know, the last part of the ritual. After you pass out, they get a guy to bring you back, cut open your skull, and "free your mind."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，仪式最后一部分。你晕倒后，他们找人把你带回来，切开头颅，然后“释放你的思想”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you look like a lively one, so welcome to the tribe! My name's Nadine!
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，你还上去还算有生气，所以欢迎来到部落！我叫娜丁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da3b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice to meet someone else who isn't crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 能碰见另一个神志清楚的家伙还真是幸运啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, now! I might still be ten kinds of crazy! You don't even know me, and you can't tell just from looking!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在！我可能还是疯疯癫癫的呢！就算看到了我，你甚至不知道我是谁！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could be the "friendly 'til she stabs you in the neck" kinda crazy. Then where'd you be, smart-aleck? All surprised and stabbed, that's where!
ESP.TRADUIT: “我一直对她很友好，直到她发狂的捅了你一刀。”你会怎么办，自作聪明的家伙？被捅了，然后大吃一惊，就是这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da45_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm not a vegetable, so I'm sane enough. The rest weren't so lucky when they got their heads cut open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我还没变成植物人，所以算是清醒。其他人被开脑时可就没那么幸运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da45_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still remember your name? Math? How's your memory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还记得你叫什么吗？伙计？你还记得点什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I came back, there were bits in my memory where all I could recall was a white light and a jumble of voices. Crazy, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我醒来时，脑中只有一片白光和嘈杂的声音嗡嗡作响。听上去很疯狂，呃？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da3a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you're not drooling, so you're doing okay. The rest weren't so lucky when they got their heads cut open.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你还清醒，看来情况不算太糟。其他人被开脑时可就没那么幸运了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq03_dlc04nadinegreet_0000da3a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any place you recommend in Point Lookout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 望海崖有什么值得一去的地方么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depends what you're looking for. If you need supplies, head to the shop over at the end of these docks. Convenient, and I get caps for referring you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那要看你要找什么了。如果需要什么补给，就到码头尽头的商店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarinter_0000e15d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you need a place to stay, there's an old motel further into town. The beds there are still pretty soft, even if it's because they're full of lice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果需要住宿，城里再远一点有家旅馆。那儿的床还很柔软。很舒适，而且我引荐你还能拿回扣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarinter_0000e15d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you're looking for some hunting, there's a fellow named Plik who runs a club out in the northeast. Strictly for high-rollers, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你要打猎，有个叫水疱的家伙在东北开了家俱乐部。不过，只对大客户开放。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarinter_0000e15d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showMap DLC04BoardwalkVendorMapMarkerREF ShowMap DLC04MotelMapMarker showMap DLC04CoastalGrottoMapMarker
Two days ago I was caught stealing from the groups' claim.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0A00E1E9] (ID) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04executionh_0000e1e8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Today, with the consent of my father, I am to be shot and killed on the cliffs of the old cathedral by the hands of my brother, Richard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天，在我父亲的许可之下，我将会在大教堂那里的悬崖上被枪决，而执行枪决的人是我的弟弟，理查德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0A00E1E9] (ID) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04executionh_0000e1e8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With my execution, my punishment is exacted and the Adlam name will be avenged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被枪决以后，我将受到应有的惩罚，而且阿德拉姆家也会被正名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0A00E1E9] (ID) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04executionh_0000e1e8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let my punishment be a reminder to those who may be tempted to do as I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就让对我的惩罚警告后人不要步我后尘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0A00E1E9] (ID) Quest : ([0A00C2B6]DLC04Holotapes) 0A00C2B6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04holot_dlc04executionh_0000e1e8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you know about Desmond?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对德斯蒙德知道多少?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Were it not for his interference, I would still have a body. Still, its absence has only honed my brilliance, so perhaps I owe him my thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是因为他的干扰，我还不至于丢掉我的身体。不过没了身体的我却因此获得了卓越的才华，也许我应该感谢他呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutdesmo_0000e1f6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: An appreciation I'll show in the form of a quick and messy death! HA HA HA!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快速而又肮脏的死亡就是我的感激！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Holographic Projection [0A00A860] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04gener_dlc04aboutdesmo_0000e1f6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those idiots let me in with open arms. I have the location of their leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些白痴就这么毫不设防地让我进来了，我已经找到他们的首领在哪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't waste your time reporting back. Go find him and figure out what he wants with this place, you moron!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要浪费时间汇报。去找他，看看他到底要用这个地方做什么，你这个傻子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq03_dlc04destribalre_0000e1f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm in. I found out where their leader is hiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我进去了。我发现他们的首领躲藏的地方了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And? You didn't go track him down and grill him for information?
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后呢？你没有捉住他然后拷问他？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq03_dlc04destribalre_0000e1f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not your daddy. Don't waste your time checking in! Go find him and figure out what he wants with this place, you moron!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不是你老爸。不要浪费时间！去找他，看看他到底要用这个地方做什么，你这个傻子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A005848]DLC04MQ03) Hearing Voices EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq03_dlc04destribalre_0000e1f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why should I work with you, again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我要跟你再一次共事呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the difference between you and me, kid? What makes a gifted killer like yourself into a rock-hard bastard like me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟我之间有什么不同呢，孩子？是什么让一个有着杀人天赋的你跟我这样铁石心肠的混蛋混在一起的呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04desmondrew_0000e1f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The answer is training, you ignorant fuck! I've got a hundred years of experience on you, and don't you forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 答案就是训练，你这个无知的笨蛋！我比你的经验要多上百年，可不要忘记这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04desmondrew_0000e1f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stick by me, and you'll get a master's class in doing what has to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着我好好干，包你会成为这一行当里的翘楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04desmondrew_0000e1f3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My story? Tell you what, kid. My story's a lot like a Deathclaw's tongue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的事？告诉你吧，孩子。我的故事简直有死亡爪的舌头那么长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04desmondpas_0000e1f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's long, messy, and you don't want to get too personal with it. Understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 故事很长，很混乱，并且你也不会想要涉入太深的，明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04desmondpas_0000e1f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Suffice it to say, I have business in Point Lookout. If you help, you will be repaid for your efforts. That's all you want to fucking know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想说，我在望海崖有事要做。如果你肯帮忙的话，你将会得到报酬。这他妈的就是你想要知道的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04gener_dlc04desmondpas_0000e1f4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't be here. Roger that, I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本就不该来。知道了，我这就走！

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly, dismissive EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obacellarqu_0000e20b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought this occult nonsense was below you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来你比这些鬼事还要离谱！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't play at what you misunderstand, troglodyte. Get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别什么事都不懂装懂，穴居人。滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obacellarqu_0000e211_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I usually hide my bodies in the river, but this is nice, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一般都是躲在河里的，但这样也不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are nothing alike. More so than you could ever comprehend. Go now, and never return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们完全不同。你完全无法理解。走吧，别再回来了。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obacellarqu_0000e209_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 玛塞拉死了，你这绝情的家伙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forgive my indiscretion. Still, with her death I see no reason for you to keep hold of that book. For all you know, the same fate may befall you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原谅我的草率。不过，既然她死了，你就更没理由留着那书了。你应该知道，同样的命运也可能降临在你身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obamarcella_0000e20a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marcella's dead, actually. I figured you had something to do with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛塞拉死了，实际上。我认为这跟你有点关系吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say that I did, but that's all the more reason you should give the book to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不敢说我做过，但现在你更该把书给我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly. surprised but not remorseful EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obamarcella_0000e208_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you make of all the bones and dolls on sticks around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这附近那些插在棍子上的骨头跟人偶有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swampfolk fetishes or totems. They probably mark territorial lines, or maybe are involved with rituals of some kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沼泽居民的神像或图腾。可能是用来标记地盘，或者参与某种仪式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marptlookou_0000e2a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've read about a lot of primitive beliefs that use similar symbols. Vodou magic, Santerнa, Obeah. Fascinating, if somewhat disturbing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我读到过大量用到类似符号的原始信仰。巫毒术，桑泰利亚教派，奥比巫术。很迷人，也很可怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marptlookou_0000e2a9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though the underlying beliefs seem quite dark, I'm not sure they're anything more than an empty set of traditions to the swampfolk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管这些底层的信仰似乎很黑暗，但我不知道他们与沼泽居民这套空洞无物的传统有什么不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marptlookou_0000e2a9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't you be at the Cathedral with the Tribals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是应该在大教堂跟部落的人在一起么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's an ironic choice of words, actually.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marintro03_0000e2a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Cathedral was once a sanctuary of the Faith, true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那座大教堂原本是信仰的圣殿，真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marintro03_0000e2a8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those who inhabit it now, however, are not of the Faith and won't suffer my presence. So no, child - that Cathedral is no place for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在住在里面的人，并无信仰，也不能忍受我的出现。所以不，孩子，大教堂不是我该去的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marintro03_0000e2a8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not exactly. I'd be happy to tell you more about my beliefs, if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不太确切。我很乐意告诉你更多我的信仰，如果你感兴趣的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marintro02_0000e2a7_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 见到你很高兴， 玛塞拉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The feeling is mutual, child. I'd enjoy sharing my belief in the Faith, if you'll listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感受是相互的，孩子。我很高兴与你分享我坚定地信念，如果你要听的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marintro01_0000e2cd_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000e3be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When great men rise, they will clash. It's inevitable. Calvert and I are both men of great power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当伟人崛起时，他们就会碰撞。这不可避免。卡尔弗特和我都是能力强大的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000e3bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But today, our rivalry ends. Now let's go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但今天，我会终结这种对峙。开始吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq04desmon_0000e3bd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You both give me a headache. I need to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们两个真让我头疼。我需要考虑一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must decide! Do it now!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000e49d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah. I think I'll kill you.
Then you shall die along with him!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000e49a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Set DLC04TheBrainREF.BrainHatesPlayer to 1 Set DLC04TheBrainREF.FightState to 1 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 2 SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction DLC04DesmondFaction
SetStage DLC04MQ05a 102
Fine. I'll do it. Desmond will die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我会去干掉德斯蒙德。
太棒了！干掉他！干掉德斯蒙德！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000e494_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveFromFaction DLC04DesmondFaction Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 1 SetEnemy DLC04DesmondFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetStage DLC04MQ05a 101
You cannot! The doors are locked! You will remain here until you destroy Desmond!
ESP.TRADUIT: 走不掉的！门已经锁了！德斯蒙德死之前前，你都无法离开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000e496_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is with you two anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们两个身上到底有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a rivalry that has lasted for centuries! You cannot possibly understand with your tiny meaty brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这场斗争已经持续了几个世纪！你那小肉脑袋不可能理解！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000e48f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Creatures of great power must collide! It is inevitable!
ESP.TRADUIT: 伟大力量必会碰撞！不可避免！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000e48f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Destroy Desmond! Help me to end this, and I will give you a reward beyond your imagination!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干掉德斯蒙德！帮我这个忙，我会给你意想不到的惊喜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000e48f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of reward are we talking about here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在方便讨论一下报酬吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One beyond your imagination! Beyond reckoning! The most amazing gift a living creature can be granted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 超乎你的想象！你绝不会失望的！作为一个活人，这是最不可思议的礼物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brainb_0000e495_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dad always said, "Never trust a disembodied brain."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爸爸总是说，“永远别相信没有肉体的脑袋”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You would have been wise to listen to him!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e493_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e493_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Set DLC04TheBrainREF.BrainHatesPlayer to 1 Set DLC04TheBrainREF.FightState to 1 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 2 SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction DLC04DesmondFaction
SetStage DLC04MQ05a 175

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能把话说清楚吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are permitted to talk while you DIE!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么话等下地狱再说吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e4a3_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e4a3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Set DLC04TheBrainREF.BrainHatesPlayer to 1 Set DLC04TheBrainREF.FightState to 1 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 2 SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction DLC04DesmondFaction
SetStage DLC04MQ05a 175
Oh, you've got to be kidding me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你一定是在跟我开玩笑吧。
卡尔弗特教授从不说笑！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e491_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e491_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Set DLC04TheBrainREF.BrainHatesPlayer to 1 Set DLC04TheBrainREF.FightState to 1 Set DLC04Generic.MQ05PlayerTarget to 2 SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction PlayerFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainFaction DLC04DesmondFaction SetEnemy DLC04BrainRobotFaction DLC04DesmondFaction
SetStage DLC04MQ05a 175
That's right. And what do I get for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就对了。那么，我能得到什么好处？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e490_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now Desmond knows that no one pushes me around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在德斯蒙德应该清楚，没人可以摆布我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I would have expected nothing less from you. And now, I have a very special gift:
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没想到你会这么无能。现在，我有份特别的礼物：
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e492_1.ogg

NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e492_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All in a day's work. Now, share your wisdom with me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天的功夫。现在，跟我分享一下你的智慧吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : The Brain [0A005A38] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquethebrain\dlc04mq05a_dlc04mq05brains_0000e48e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to talk about you, Haley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈你的事情， 哈利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's not much to tell. What do you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好说的。你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleyabout_0000ea4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing. Are you here to buy something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。你是来买东西的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea3f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do you get your stock from?
I found some of it. Some was here when I got here. I get some from them smugglers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些东西是我自己找到的，有些是本来就在这个商店里的。还有一些东西是从走私者那里搞来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And every once in a while, that weirdo with the boat comes up here and trades a few good things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并且每隔一段时间，那个划船来的古怪家伙就会来这里一次并且做一些交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea45_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how long have you had this store?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这家店开了多长时间了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is, I don't even remember much before that. Woke up here with a headache a couple years ago with the shop already set up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我不太记得在那之前发生的事情。几年前，当我带着头痛醒来的时候，这家商店就已经建好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea3e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People came in, and started trading. I didn't complain. It just became a job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们来到这里，买卖东西。我没什么可抱怨的。因为这已经变成了我的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea3e_3.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 你一般做什么人的生意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The swamp folk, mostly. I guess they don't bother me none because I was born here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般来说都是些沼泽居民。他们打搅我是因为我生在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They mostly trade meat and fruit. Never any cash or goods.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般他们都用肉或者水果来交易。从来不用现金或者货物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea3d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Them mercs are good for some trade in real hardware, so if'n you need ammo or anything like that, I can help you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 佣兵对这方面的交易很在行，所以，如果你需要弹药或者其它类似的东西的话，我是可以帮你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea3d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no. Not at all! I'm just not used to people all the way out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不。一点也不！我这里很少有从大老远来的客人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My usual customers, well. I usually smell 'em before I see 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的客人。一般来说他们到我这里之前，我先嗅到他们的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no. Not at all! I'm just not used to people all the way out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不。一点也不！我这里很少有从大老远来的客人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My usual customers, well. I usually smell 'em before I see 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的客人。一般来说他们到我这里之前，我先嗅到他们的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04haleygreet_0000ea3c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you repair some things for me?
Sure as a swamp folk's head is squishy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真像个沼泽居民脑袋一样粘糊糊的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04repair_0000ea41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't met the gun I couldn't fix.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04repair_0000ea42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. I learned many tricks from my father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我从父亲那儿学了很多技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04repair_0000ea43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Certainly. Madam Panada is quite handy with a wrench.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。帕娜达女士很会使扳手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04repair_0000ea44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Show me what you have for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04services_0000ea46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got all sorts of stuff. Take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这里什么都有。看看我的货吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04services_0000ea47_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里就是为了这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Haley [0A00EA7D] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04services_0000ea48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of Madam Panada's wares are top quality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕娜达女士的商品可都是最优质的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04services_0000ea4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what is it you would like to purchase?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Panada [0A00EA7C] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04generic_dlc04services_0000ea4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't tease somebody come down with Orange Fever, sweetie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不该戏弄得了橙流感的人，宝贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margplaying_0000ece7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I already took care of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我已经处理好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll be. Here, let me give you something for your trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会的。来，给你点东西对付你的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marguerite [0A003F6E] (mod) Quest : ([0A003F70]DLC04FF03) A Spoonful of Whiskey EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff03_dlc04margrepaira_0000ece9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm short on caps at the moment...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在手头没那么多瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you're good for it, but I require cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你行，但是我想要现金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostpay_0000ece8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you'll reconsider. Simply not the same without you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你重新考虑。你绝对是不二人选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostpay_0000ecea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gristle and gore await! Proceed inside and use the button, as before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 软骨和血块在等待着你！进到里面来，并且按下那个按钮，就像以前一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostpay_0000ece5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeItem Caps001 500 set DLC04FF06.eventStarted to 1 DLC04FF06ArenaDoorREF.unlock set DLC04FF06.bodyCount to 0
That was fun! Can we do it again?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有趣，我们能再来一次么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your enthusiasm is flattering, but I'll need time to round up more fodder. Could I trouble you to return in a day or two?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的热情真是讨人喜欢，但是我需要更多的时间。我可不可以麻烦你一二天之内再返回呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostpay_0000ecec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, certainly! You're already registered, but I'll need five hundred caps to enter this particular safari. You understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，当然了！你已经注册了，但是你还需要再交500个瓶盖来加入到这个旅行当中。你是明白的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostpay_0000eced_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to do the Safari again.
I've found that price keeps the riff-raff out. You aren't riff-raff, now, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现这个价位能把不入流的人拒之门外。你不是这种人，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostpay_0000ecee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the sound of this. I'm out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢这种声音，我要走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your loss, I'm afraid. Come back if you reconsider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你输了。如果你打算再次尝试的话就来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostreg_0000eceb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the finest bit of sport you've ever enjoyed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对是你从未体验过的最棒的运动！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostreg_0000ece6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once we review the rules and see to a nominal thousand caps registration fee, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，只要我们重新检查一下规则，并且交个象征性的1000个瓶盖更名费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Plik [0A009B5A] (mod) Quest : ([0A009B5E]DLC04FF06) Plik's Safari EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04ff06_dlc04ff06hostreg_0000ece6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remind me not to mess with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记得提醒我离你远一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn right! Now, why can't the rest of the world figure that one out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太他妈对了，其他人怎么就想不到呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that leaves me with a boat, a load of Punga, and a wicked scar. Damn if I haven't earned that adventure I came out looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都得到了些什么？一艘船，一批膨葛，和一道诡异的伤疤。要是出来没碰上这通冒险，我真他妈要后悔死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think I'll take over running this ship. I can travel as I like, and always head back to the Wasteland to see mom. Not a bad way to live, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就由我来接管这艘船吧。想去哪就去哪，还可以常回废土看看妈妈。不错的主意，你说呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, you can always ride for free!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，随时欢迎你来，完全免费！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, now what are you going to do?
First off, I'm claiming this boat. I put Tobar down, so it's mine, them's the rules of the ocean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我要占有这艘船。我扳倒了托巴尔，所以船归我了，这就是大海的规则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So that leaves me with a boat, a load of Punga, and a wicked scar. Damn if I haven't earned that adventure I came out looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我都得到了些什么？一艘船，一批膨葛，和一道诡异的伤疤。要是出来没碰上这通冒险，我真他妈要后悔死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think I'll take over running this ship. I can travel as I like, and always head back to the Wasteland to see mom. Not a bad way to live, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就由我来接管这艘船吧。想去哪就去哪，还可以常回废土看看妈妈。不错的主意，你说呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, you can always ride for free!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，随时欢迎你来，完全免费！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, looks like it. When the Tribals would send someone to the swamp, he'd be waiting around to nab them when the Punga seeds gassed them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恩，至少看来是如此。他一直蹲守在沼泽，一旦部落的人被膨葛种子熏倒，就会落入他的手中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'd do his amateur surgery for the Tribals and let us wander back, all in exchange for Punga Fruit to trade. Sweet little deal he had going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他以业余水平给部落的人进行手术，让我们晃悠回来，只为换来可以交易的膨葛水果。他的小买卖还真可爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3af_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I figured you'd want a shot at some revenge, so I put him under citizen's arrest, sorta.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总之，我发现你试图进行报复，所以我将他交予于市民进行关押。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3af_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I consider it payment for what he did to my poor, sliced-up brain. I was going to do the same to him, but I figured you'd want the honor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对我的大脑所做的一些，我要让他付出代价。我要以其人之道还治其人之身，但看来你也很乐意这么干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems that when the Tribals would send someone to the swamp, he'd be waiting around to nab them when the Punga seeds gassed them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 似乎他一直守在沼泽，一旦部落派的人被膨葛种子熏倒，就会落入他的手中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'd do his amateur surgery for the Tribals and let us wander back, all in exchange for Punga Fruit to trade. Sweet little deal he had going on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他以业余水平给部落的人进行手术，让我们晃悠回来，只为换来可以交易的膨葛水果。他的小买卖还真可爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I know you're telling the truth?
Sounds pretty wacko, right? Well, I wouldn't have believed me either, until I snuck a peek in Tobar's engine room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听上去很疯狂吧？唔，如果不是我溜进了托巴尔的引擎室，我也不会相信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From the look of it, he kept every bit of gray matter he cut out, and he had quite a collection! You can take a look, if your stomach's up to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看上去，他保留了切下的所有灰质，竟如此之多！你可以看看，希望不会给你的胃带来太大负担。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And while you're in there, feel free to give Tobar my love. Preferably with the sharp end of a hot knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，你进去时，尽情对托巴尔献上我的爱意。锐利的刀锋是个不错的主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3a4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he seemed nice enough, didn't he? I wouldn't have figured it out if I hadn't snuck into his engine room while waiting for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他看上去挺不错，不是吗？要不是等你的时候溜进引擎室，我也还被蒙在鼓里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: From the look of it, he kept every bit of gray matter he cut out, and he had quite a collection! You can take a look, if your stomach's up to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看上去，他保留了切下的所有灰质，竟如此之多！你可以看看，希望不会给你的胃带来太大负担。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3b0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And while you're in there, feel free to give Tobar my love. Preferably with the sharp end of a hot knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，你进去时，尽情对托巴尔献上我的爱意。锐利的刀锋是个不错的主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinetoba_0000f3b0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a lucky one, and it probably didn't do any permanent damage. Scar'll heal up on its own, and you'll be good as new.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很幸运，受伤并不严重。伤口会慢慢愈合，而你也会慢慢好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinebrai_0000f3c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, you'll still be missing a chunk of brain, but it looks like you didn't need that bit anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你的大脑还是会缺一块，但看起来缺的那块你也用不上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinebrai_0000f3c2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, hold still and I'll see if I can't help you look like your old self again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在呢，不要动，让我看看我能否帮你恢复到原样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinebrai_0000f3c2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you get rid of my scar?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能把我的疤给去了么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all a little fuzzy for me, but I've got a hunch. I'm gonna go do some snooping, see what I can figure out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都令我很困惑，但我有种预感。我会去打探一下，看能找到些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinebrai_0000f3c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet me by the riverboat in a day or so, and maybe I'll have something for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约一天后在船那碰头，也许我能搞到一些有用的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04nadinebrai_0000f3c3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setEssential DLC04Tobar 0 set DLC04MQ01.NadineSearch to 3 DLC04NadineREF.evp
Guess you and plants think alike, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许你跟这些植物想到一起去了，是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. We are both simple. But simple is not the same as stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧。我们都很单纯。但是单纯不等于傻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have some secret farming trick?
It feels good to work with dirt, doesn't it? Some people call it work, but they don't understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟土打交道的感觉可是相当好的，不是吗？有些人说那叫工作，实际上他们根本不理解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take my shovel. It has seen much use, and much dirt. Maybe it will help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿上我的铲子。已经使用过很多次了，上面还有不少泥土。也许能帮上你的忙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: But be careful not to cut yourself with it. It can make you sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，不要被它割伤。不然你会因此得病的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04croatoa1a_0000f3a9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love digging in the dirt, but I never can get anything to grow right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢在地上挖洞，但我从来都看不到有什么正经东西从里面长出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not know if this is a secret, but I have always used this shovel. It has seen much work, and much dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这算不算是个秘密，因为我经常使用这个铲子。这个铲子见证了许多的工作和泥土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it helps, have it. But be careful not to cut yourself. It can make you sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果能帮上忙的话，你就把它拿去。小心点，不要被它割伤。不然你会因此得病的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you share your secret to getting them to grow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我你让它们长得那么好的窍门么？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Croatoa [0A00A864] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, I don't want to hang out with a little kid. Thanks anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不想跟一个小屁孩混在一起，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll, okay. But if you change your mind, you can always hang out here. I won't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。但是如果你改变主意的话，你还可以回来，这里永远都欢迎你。我不会介意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : disappointed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04teddymo_0000f914_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're welcome. So, um, what do you want to do now? You wanna play a game? Like hide or seek, or tag or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太客气了。嗯，你打算做什么呢？你想玩捉迷藏么，还是其他游戏?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : hoping he's found a new friend EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04teddymo_0000f919_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good instincts. You can't trust me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出色的直觉。你的确不能相信我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just get out of here, okay, mister? Don't make me hurt you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶紧离开这里，可以吗，先生？不要逼我伤害你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : scared EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_0000f91a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just get out of here, okay, lady? Don't make me hurt you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 赶紧离开这里，可以吗，女士？不要逼我伤害你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : scared EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_0000f91b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry kid, I'm not in the teddy bear retrieval business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，小子，我可不是专门管泰迪熊的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. You're a dumb head. I didn't want your help anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就算了。你是个笨蛋。再说了，我也不想让你帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : disappointed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_0000f923_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There must be some way to prove I'm on your side. Besides, aren't you lonely?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定会有某些办法证明我是站在你这边的。对了，你不寂寞么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to have Kenny-Bear around, but he fell down the big shaft back there. It's too scary for me to go get him. Maybe you can, though?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前有肯尼熊，但是他掉到那个通风管道里面去了。我太害怕了，不敢下去找。也许你可以帮我？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_00008860_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not going to hurt you. I just need a hideout from time to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会伤害你的，我只是有时需要个藏身的地方而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, do you like games? Wanna play hide and seek, or tag or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你喜欢玩游戏吗？想要玩捉迷藏游戏，或者其他游戏？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : hoping he's found a new friend EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_0000f91e_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们再玩一次吧，好不好？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I didn't want to play with you anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。我本来也没打算跟你玩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : disappointed EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04playno_0000f912_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here and count to 10. Slowly! Then see if you can find me. Okay? No cheating! Close your eyes and count to ten. Go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就在这里，数到十。要慢点数啊！然后看看能不能找到我，好吗？不许作弊！闭上你的眼睛然后开始数。开始！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : happy playing hide and seek EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04playhid_0000f917_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you wanna play? Hide and seek? Or tag?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想玩什么，捉迷藏？还是什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : excited to have a new friend EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04play_0000f91f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh come on! Don't be a dork face. It'll be fun!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，拜托！别一脸傻样，这会很有趣的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Fine. I guess you can hang out here. You can keep your stuff here too, I won't mess with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以。好吧。我想你可以留在这里。你也可以把东西保存在这里，我不会动你的东西的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : excited to have a new friend EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_0000f918_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you want to do first? Play hide and seek, or tag?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你打算做什么呢？玩捉迷藏游戏，或者其他游戏？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : excited to have a new friend EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04hideout_0000f918_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems like a good hideout. I could use a place to crash and stash my gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这看起来是个不错的藏身之处。我可以在这里存放我的装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Kenny, what do you want to be when you grow up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，肯尼，你长大以后想做什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm grown up enough already. And I'm the only thing I can be - me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经长大了。我已经成为了我唯一能成为的人 - 我自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : defiant EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04aboutgr_0000f915_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where'd you learn how to make traps like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿学会像这样制作陷阱的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got bored locked up in the basement all the time. So, I started taking things apart and putting them back together again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在地下室里的生活实在是无聊。所以，我就开始学着把东西拆开然后再组装起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : philosophical EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04abouttr_0000f920_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Things aren't so strange when you can see all the stuff that makes them. You know? See something's insides? That's where the real thing is.
