ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，如果你明白其中的构造，你就不会觉得东西很奇怪了。看见里面的东西了吗？那就是东西的实质所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : philosophical EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04abouttr_0000f920_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're starting to annoy me, kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你开始令我不爽了，小子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen up, mister. My name's Kenny. And I'm the boss of this mine. And if you're going to be mean, then you aren't welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，先生。我叫肯尼。我是这个矿井的老大。如果你不规矩点，你就不再受到欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and a little scared EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04greetin_0000f924_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen up, lady. My name's Kenny. And I'm the boss of this mine. And if you're going to be mean, then you aren't welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，女士。我叫肯尼。我是这个矿井的老大。如果你不规矩点，你就不再受到欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : annoyed and a little scared EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04greetin_0000f925_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your toys might work on the locals, kid. But not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这些玩具或许唬得住本地人，小子，可唬不到我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah well, bullets work on everybody. Try me, mister. I dare you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，嗯，子弹对谁都有效。向我试试啊，先生。如果你敢的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : bluffing EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04greetin_0000f916_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah well, bullets work on everybody. Try me, lady. I dare you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，嗯，子弹对谁都有效。向我试试啊，女士。如果你敢的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : bluffing EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04greetin_000110d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk, shoot. I haven't made my mind up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 开口还是开枪，我还没拿定主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad you think so. Conversation is but one of the virtues that separates us from cretins like those swampfolk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你这么想。唯一能将我们与那些沼泽白痴居民们区分开来的方法就是交谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaintrob01_0000f933_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swampfolk who, I should mention, absconded with a book, a precious family heirloom. I wanted to ask you, friend; will you get it back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 某个沼泽居民，我该提到，携书潜逃，那是珍贵的传家宝。我想问你，朋友，你想将书取回来吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaintrob01_0000f933_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really, I usually bludgeon first and ask questions never.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算不上吧，我一般用拳头解决问题，很少说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! Spoken like a true roughneck. That's good. I could use a person of mettle like yourself. You see, a family heirloom of mine has been stolen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！说得真像个狠角色。棒极了。我就需要你这样有勇气的人。你看，我的传家宝被偷了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaintrob02_0000f931_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This heirloom - a book - has been stolen by those swampfolk cretins. Smash some heads, bring it back, get paid. What do you say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这传家宝，一本书，被那些沼泽白痴给偷走了。帮我教训教训他们，再把书拿回来，我就付给你报酬。你说怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaintrob02_0000f931_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I get in the bargain?
Cash, plain and simple. Return with the book and I'll pay you a thousand caps. No questions asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现金，简单明了。带着书回来，我就付你1000个瓶盖。别多问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaquestwha_0000f932_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, now. No giving up just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得了吧。不要这么快就放弃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Break [0A00F9F3] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq02_dlc04hallucinati_00010728_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He has, as a matter of fact.
I thought as much. Listen to me very carefully, child. You mustn't bring it to him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想过。仔细听着，孩子。你不能把它带给他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markriv0int_0000fbe6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That book is known as the Krivbeknih, and it's a thing of evil purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这书叫做《黑暗圣经》，有着邪恶的目的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markriv0int_0000fbe6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. So what if he has?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许吧。那么如果他有的话，又怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, you don't understand what it is you're sent to fetch. That book, the Krivbeknih, is a thing of evil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你不知道你被派去拿来的是什么。那本书，《黑暗圣经》，非常邪恶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markriv0int_0000fbf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Krivbeknih? What are you on about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 《黑暗圣经》？你到底在说些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, the Krivbeknih. The Blackhall family has a long, evil history with the book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，《黑暗圣经》。布莱克霍尔家族与这书有一段漫长而邪恶的关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markrivbekn_0000fbea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was lost to them long ago, but it's found a way back to Point Lookout, and Obadiah seeks to reclaim it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它在很久之前失落，但它又想设法回到了望海崖，奥巴迪亚正想据为己有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markrivbekn_0000fbea_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 奥巴迪亚可是会付给我钱的，你呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't promise you money, but I have some medical supplies I can share. Please; it would be a good thing you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能承诺给你金钱，但我有一些可以分享的药品。拜托，你做的会是件大好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markrivpaym_0000fbe3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you want it so badly?
Obadiah's no better than the heathens he's asked you to steal it from. He believes he can use it to control them, and God knows what else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥巴迪亚比那些要求你去盗窃的野蛮人好不了多少。他相信他能用它控制他们，天知道还有什么作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markrivmoti_0000fbe0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a way to destroy that damned thing. I intend to do just that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个办法摧毁那该死的东西。我正要那么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markrivmoti_0000fbe0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I recover the book, I'll consider bringing it to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我找到书了，我会考虑带来给你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ask no more. You can find me at my tent on the beach, south of Blackhall. God bless your path, child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我别无所求。你可以在我沙滩上的帐篷里找到我，就在布莱克霍尔南边。上帝保佑你的前程，孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markrivques_0000fbe4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what you're talking about, woman. Step aside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你在说什么，女人。闪开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will not be dismissed by you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markrivbekn_0000fbf2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That book has been lost to the Blackhalls for generations, and I intend to make sure it stays lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莱克霍尔家族失落那本书已经好几代，我要确保它继续失踪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04markrivbekn_0000fbf2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A woman named Marcella told me to bring her the book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫玛塞拉的女人让我把书带来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, Marcella. A religious fanatic in her own right. Don't believe anything the woman says; her mind is as addled as those inbred swampfolk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，玛塞拉。那个一意孤行的宗教狂徒。别相信那个女人的任何话，她脑子跟那些近亲繁殖的沼泽居民一样有毛病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obamarcella_0000fbf1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have the caps, you get the book.
Yes, yes, of course. Here's your errand fee. Now, give it to me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，当然。这是你的钱。快把东西给我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obakrivgive_0000fbe9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC04FF02 140 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 30 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 240 1
I haven't decided what I'm going to do with it yet.
Surely you're not considering giving it to Marcella? Come now, the woman can't rub two caps together. Give it to me and be paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不会想要把它给玛塞拉吧？得了吧，那女人没几个钱。给我吧，我绝不会亏待你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obakrivkeep_0000fbe2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May God shed his blessings upon you, child. Make haste for Dunwich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿主施恩惠于你，孩子。快去邓维奇方尖碑吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : quietly, saying Act of Contrition to herself. She either turns the recorder off or takes her last breath as she fades EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marholotape_0000fbe5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setStage DLC04FF02 240 showMap DunwichMap 0 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 40 1
Ready or not, here I come!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你准备好没有，我来了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : calling out to a friend, playing tag EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagread_0001005b_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : calling out to a friend, playing tag EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagread_0001005c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, that's enough tag for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，捉迷藏已经玩得差不多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. I was tired of whuppin' you anyhow.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : sad his friend doesn't want to play tag any more EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagstop_00010071_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : giggling EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagstop_00010072_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll give you a head start. Go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会领先你的。开始！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : playing tag EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagyour_00010065_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing, playing tag EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagyour_00010066_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing, playing tag EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagyour_00010067_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing, playing tag EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagyour_00010068_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagkenn_0001005f_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagkenn_00010060_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tag! You're it! You'll never catch me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 捉住了！该你了！你永远都捉不到我的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : laughing EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04tagkenn_00010061_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, maybe I'll pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又想了一下，或许我应该放弃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't blame you! I wouldn't go down there myself, if I didn't have the option of running back to my ship!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不怪你！要是我没办法逃回我的船上，我也不会一个人到那儿去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_00010280_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, maybe I'll pass for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我又想了一下，或许我现在应该放弃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not scared of anything. Let's do it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么都不怕，我们来吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't come crying to me when a Mirelurk is chewing on your guts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蟹人将你掏心挖腹时，别来找我哭诉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0001027e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: if DLC04TobarREF.getItemCount DLC04BoatTicket == 0 DLC04TobarREF.additem DLC04BoatTicket 1 endif set DLC04MQ01.TicketVend to 1 ShowBarterMenu

ESP.TRADUIT: 你永远都不会找到我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : talking to himself (playing hide and seek) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04playsay_000102e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the best hiding spot ever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是最好的藏身地点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : talking to himself (playing hide and seek) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04playsay_000102e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet you walk right past me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌你刚才从我身边经过！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : talking to himself (playing hide and seek) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04playsay_000102e9_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : talking to himself (playing hide and seek) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04playsay_000102ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're pretty good at this game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你玩这个游戏还挺在行的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : talking to his friend (playing hide and seek) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04playsay_000102ec_1.ogg

NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : talking to his friend (playing hide and seek) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff04playsay_000102ee_1.ogg

NPC : Intercom [0A00927F] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04mq02_dlc04intercombar_00010651_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dammit! Trapped! I knew he'd try this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！是陷阱！我就知道他会这么干！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04desmondlab_00010677_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04desmondlab_0001067a_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04desmondlab_0001067b_1.ogg

NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mq05a_dlc04desmondlab_0001067c_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 顺着这条路就能找到他了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A00584A]DLC04MQ05a) A Meeting Of The Minds EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq05a_dlc04desmondlab_0001067d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations, my boy! You're going to pull through, and everything will be right as rain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜，我的孩子！你会很快恢复的，一切都会好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Break [0A00F9F3] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq02_dlc04hallucinati_0001072c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Congratulations, my dear! You're going to pull through, and everything will be right as rain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恭喜，我亲爱的！你会很快恢复的，一切都会好起来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Break [0A00F9F3] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq02_dlc04hallucinati_0001072d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been having a rough time, haven't you? Let daddy patch everything up for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吃了不少苦头吧，不是吗？让爸爸来弥补一下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Break [0A00F9F3] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq02_dlc04hallucinati_0001072b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're doing well. Quite well, indeed! Most initiates never make it this far, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做得很好。非常的好，确实如此！大多数新人都不可能会做得像你这么出色，你要知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Break [0A00F9F3] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq02_dlc04hallucinati_0001072e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a messy, messy mind you've got in here. I'll see if I can't tidy it up for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可真是脏乱啊。让我看看能不能帮你收拾一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Break [0A00F9F3] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq02_dlc04hallucinati_0001072a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might experience just the slightest hint of unease. But I'm sure that wherever you are, you're not feeling a thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很可能会体会到一丝的不安。但是我可以向你保证，无论你在哪里，你都不会感觉得到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Break [0A00F9F3] (mod) Quest : ([0A005847]DLC04MQ02) Walking With Spirits EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04mq02_dlc04hallucinati_0000f9f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any idea where Nadine might be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你大概知道娜丁可能会在哪儿么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never even been to Point Lookout, so I wouldn't know. She just said she was going to go find her fortune there. She could be anyplace!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来都没去过望海崖，所以说我不知道。她只说过要在哪里找到属于她的冒险与财富。这意味着她可能会在任何地方！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04cathnadine_00010729_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I do remember her talking about that Punga Fruit, and how valuable it'd be to grow here. Maybe she'll be someplace it grows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是我记得她曾经提起过膨葛，以及那东西有多值钱什么的。也许她会在某个长着那个植物的地方吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04cathnadine_00010729_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The audio password for my box is "Nevermore".
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的盒子的声控密码是“Nevermore”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Used for Dialogue Only [0A010A4B] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff05_dlc04bankpasswor_00010a3d_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 现在是说再见的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([0A010797]DLC04ConvTribal) 0A010797 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0A010797]DLC04ConvTribal) 0A010797 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0A010797]DLC04ConvTribal) 0A010797 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
Quest : ([0A010797]DLC04ConvTribal) 0A010797 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Password: Verified! Voice ID: Mismatch! Access denied - User voice unauthorized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 密码: 正确！ 声音识别: 不符合！ 拒绝进入 - 用户声音不符。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Voice-Activated Security System [0A005B94] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_dlc04submitalt02_00010a3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Password: Verified! Voice ID: Mismatch! Access denied - User voice unauthorized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 密码: 正确！ 声音识别: 不符合！ 拒绝进入 - 用户声音不符。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Voice-Activated Security System [0A005B94] (mod) Quest : ([0A00436E]DLC04FF05) The Velvet Curtain EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04robotvoice\dlc04ff05_dlc04submitalt01_00010a3a_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我聊聊有关布莱克霍尔庄园的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't suppose there's any harm indulging you. What interests you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对你没什么坏处吧？是什么东西这么吸引你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : Elderly - Player has appealed to his vanity EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obablackhal_00010aa1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, a task for which I think you'll be superlatively qualified. Do you accept?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，我认为这任务交给你最合适不过了，你接受么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaquest00t_00010aa2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you wanted help getting your book back?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你想有人帮你拿回你的书?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be daft. You agreed to retrieve my book. With more haste than this, I would have thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别犯傻了，你已经同意帮我把书拿回来。如果动作能快一点的话，也许我还会考虑。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly, pushy. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaquest00t_00010aa3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to head for the ritual site east of the boardwalk, and expect a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去仪式之地，就在板道的东面，随时做好战斗准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly, pushy. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obaquest00t_00010aa3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hundreds of years, and still standing strong. You're within a fine example of Victorian architecture, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 数百年至今，依然屹立不倒。这栋建筑，堪称维多利亚式的典范，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obablackhal_00010a94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your family is named after this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的家族名字源自这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just as much as it's named after us, I suppose. We took the Blackhall name when we arrived on these shores, generations before the Great War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的家族世代都居住在这里。布莱克霍尔庄园这名号，早在战争发生前数百年，我们刚抵达这海岸的时候，便沿用至今。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly. preachy. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obablackhal_00010a95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We do well to remember history, particularly in this dark time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们铭记历史，特别是在黑暗时代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Obadiah Blackhall [0A002F3E] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall Comment (NAM2) : elderly. preachy. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04obablackhal_00010a95_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of Point Lookout?
I'm relatively new here myself, but I'll share what I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也算是新来这里，但我会告诉你我所知的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marptlookou_00010a99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of the locals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这些本地居民怎么看？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hostile, in a word. I try to observe, but the swampfolk are dangerously aggressive to any outsiders. Lucky for us, they tend to keep to the swamp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正是敌人。我试图观察，但沼泽居民对外来者富有危险的侵略性。好在他们只会待在沼泽里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marptlookou_00010aa5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you're not from around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说你不是这附近的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I come from the Abbey of the Road. I'm what you might call a missionary. I travel the Wastes, spreading the Faith and doing good where I can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从心路修道院来。我就是你所谓的传教士。我穿越废土，在所到之处传播信仰，助人行善。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marptlookou_00010a9f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, I'm from the Abbey of the Road. I'm afraid its location is secret, however.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我是从心路修道院来。恐怕它的地点是个秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marptlookou_00010aa0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you set this campsite up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是你建立这个营地的么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I restored a terminal in one of the other tents. From that it would seem these tents were originally put here before the War by medical workers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我修好了一个其他帐篷里的终端。从那儿看来这些帐篷在战争前就有医务人员搭建了起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04marptlookou_00010aa4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know about your beliefs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道关于你信仰的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you like me to recite some scripture, or did you just want to know more about the Faith?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想听我念一段经文呢，还是说让我给你讲关于信仰的话题?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you become a missionary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么成为一个传教士的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was raised at the Abbey of the Road where I was educated until I could receive my Rites of Mission. That's when I first left the Abbey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在修道院被抚养长大并接受教育。直到我能接受我的布道仪式的时候，我第一次离开了那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall

ESP.ORIGINAL: We try to improve the state of the Wasteland by doing good where we can and by spreading the word of the Bible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们一直尝试着通过在废土尽可能多地做好事，或者散播上帝的福音来证明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We also recover and restore religious relics that we can find, but that's a secondary goal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也会去帮助信仰崩溃的人重新建立信念，但那不过是次要目标而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scripture - the world as told in the Bible. Would you like to hear a verse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 经文 - 在圣经中所述之言。你想不想听呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010aa6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trumpet: for the trumpet shall sound and the dead shall rise again incorruptible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快的，就在眨眼之间，就在那最后的小号吹响之时:小号将会再次响起，死去的人将会再次站起来，而非腐烂掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010aa7_1.ogg

NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010aa7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to hear a passage.
In Him was life, and the life was the light of men. And the light shineth in the darkness, and the darkness did not comprehend it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于他来说，生命就是一切，生命就是人类之光。光会照亮黑暗，黑暗不会包容它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010aa8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have told you this so that you might have peace in me. In the world you will have trouble, but take courage, I have conquered the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经告诉你了，所以你不需要对我如此。在这个世界里，你将会遇上麻烦，但是请鼓起勇气，我已经征服了这个世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010aa9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like just another cult to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听起来像是另一种崇拜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, not exactly. People have clung to many beliefs since the Great War, and some have their foundations in the Faith.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不完全是。在世界大战之后，人们就开始坚持相信很多东西，这其中有很多信仰都有它们的理论根据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Bible was around long before the bombs fell, as was my Faith. To us, the War was a great tragedy, but not the True Apocalypse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在核弹落下之前，圣经，作为我的信仰，一直都处于统治地位。对我们而言，那场战争是一个巨大的悲剧，但并不是什么世界末日。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, of course, my child. Something else, then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，当然，我的孩子。还需要些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid I don't have a copy of the scripture with me, but I can share a few passages. Here's one of my favorites.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕我没有经文的拷贝，不过我可以分享你几段。这是我比较中意的一段。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tell you the truth, whoever hears my word and believes him who sent me has eternal life and will not be condemned;
ESP.TRADUIT: 我实话告诉你，无论谁听见我的话并且相信他会带给我永恒的生命，都不会受到责难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: he has crossed over from death to life.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010a9a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mother had a favorite passage from the Bible. Revelation 21:6 - recognize it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我妈妈最喜欢圣经中的一段话，启示录21章第6句，记得么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course! "I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end. I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely."
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！“我是阿拉法、我是俄梅戛、我是初、我是终。我要将生命泉的水白白赐给那口渴的人喝。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010ac2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So lovely. Selflessness like that is a rare commodity these days. I can see why that particular passage inspired her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。在这种日子里，无私可真是非常少见的啊。我现在明白为什么那特别的通路能够激励她了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcella [0A002F42] (mod) Quest : ([0A002F47]DLC04FF02) The Dark Heart of Blackhall EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04ff02_dlc04maraboutfai_00010ac2_2.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Disdain EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c2f_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Disdain EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As in, slack off? Thanks, but I've got stuff to do, big man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 例如，放松？多谢，但是我海有事情要做，大人物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate the advice, but I'm fine, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很感激你的建议，但是我没事，明白？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not your child, old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是你的孩子，老家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not the boss of me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c32_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c33_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c34_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Disdain EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c12_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Disdain EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c35_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) Comment (NAM2) : Disdain EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c36_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : DLC04TribalGenericFaction Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c15_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : DLC04TribalGenericFaction Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c16_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : DLC04TribalGenericFaction Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c17_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : DLC04TribalGenericFaction Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c18_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : DLC04TribalGenericFaction Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c19_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : DLC04TribalGenericFaction Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c1a_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : DLC04TribalGenericFaction Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalfriendly\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c1b_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : Point Lookout Tribals Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c1c_1.ogg

NPC : Nadine [0A006635] (mod) Faction : Point Lookout Tribals Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04maletribalgruff\dlc04gener_dlc04tribalresp_00010c1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about I save us both the effort and say she's probably dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不如这样吧，我们彼此都省点力气，告诉自己她多半已经挂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, don't say that! Just, if you're going to Point Lookout, and you find a girl named Nadine, please give her this note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 求求你，不要这么说！只是，如果你要去望海崖，并且找到一个叫娜丁的女孩子的话，请把这个纸条给她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_dlc04catherinegr_00010f06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She stowed away on that boat, and I haven't heard from her ever since. I'll do anything if it'll help find her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自从她离开船以后，我就再也没听过关于她的消息。我会尽我一切力量帮助你找到她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Catherine [0A006636] (mod) Quest : ([0A005846]DLC04MQ01) The Local Flavor EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04femalenormal\dlc04mq01_dlc04catherinegr_00010f06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How will I get back afterwards?
All you have to do is come back to me and buy another ticket! Just be careful not to get stranded short on caps, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要做的就是回来找我并且再买张船票！注意点，别弄得捉襟见肘了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_00010f05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你拿到船票，就到客舱里躺到简易床上。我们立马就到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_00010f05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And sorry, but I don't do group trips. If you want to see Point Lookout, you'll have to leave your friend here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，但我不接受团队旅游。如果你想去望海崖看看，就得把你朋友留在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_00010f05_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All you have to do is come back to me and buy another ticket! Just be careful not to get stranded short on caps, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要做的就是回来找我并且再买张船票！注意点，别弄得捉襟见肘了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0000e1f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你拿到船票，就到客舱里躺到简易床上。我们立马就到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0000e1f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你拿到船票，就到客舱里躺到简易床上。我们立马就到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_00010f07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And sorry, but I don't do group trips. If you want to see Point Lookout, you'll have to leave your friend here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，但我不接受团队旅游。如果你想去望海崖看看，就得把你朋友留在这儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_00010f07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你拿到船票，就到客舱里躺到简易床上。我们立马就到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarvendt_0000e1f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do now that he's dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他死了，你准备怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that we're rid of Calvert, I'll be heading north to pursue my next rival.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们现在已经解决了卡尔弗特，我会到北方继续追踪我的下一个猎物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dc04mqpqdesmondt_00010f37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are only a few of us left now. The great game goes on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们中只有少数几个人仍然在世。但是这伟大的游戏从未停止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dc04mqpqdesmondt_00010f37_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing down here?
I'm pulling all the data that I can from Calvert's computers. Everything the little bastard gathered is here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把卡尔弗特电脑上所有的数据都下载下来。那个混蛋收集的所有东西都在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dc04mqpqdesmondt_00010f29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then, when I'm done, I'll leave this place to sink into the sea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定后我就离开，把这里的一切都沉进海底。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Desmond [0A0035B4] (mod) Quest : ([0A008335]DLC04MQPQ) 0A008335 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquedesmond\dlc04mqpq_dc04mqpqdesmondt_00010f29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a dead man, you son of a bitch.
Murder? Really, what would your father say? I thought he raised you better than that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谋杀？说真的，你父亲会怎么说？我以为他把你管教得比这好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarlocke_00011133_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You had an awful lot to say about him when you were unconscious. And from the sound of it, he'd be very, very disappointed in what you've become.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去知觉时说了一大堆关于他的话。听上去，他对现在的你十分失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarlocke_00011133_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like he didn't spank you enough as a kid. Maybe I can make up for his lost time!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听上去他小时候打你屁股不够多。或许我能帮他弥补。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarlocke_00011133_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it's true? Why did you do it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是真的么？你为什么要这么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do we do anything? You travel the world, kill people, take trophies that interest you, and move on. I'm much the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么要这些事情？你环游世界，杀人，猎取你感兴趣的战利品，然后再继续向前。我也差不多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarlocke_00011132_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only difference is that my trophies are somewhat more medical in nature. Oh, and to be honest, I probably kill fewer people than you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一的区别就是我的战利品本质上更偏向医学。噢，说实话，我可能比你杀的人少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarlocke_00011132_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I suppose it's time that came to an end, one way or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想到了该了解的时候了，无论用什么办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tobar the Ferryman [0A006634] (mod) Quest : ([0A006650]DLC04Generic) 0A006650 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04uniquetobar\dlc04gener_dlc04tobarlocke_00011132_3.ogg

NPC : [0A012CD1] (ID) NPC : Kenny [0A00815A] (mod) Quest : ([0A00815C]DLC04FF04) Latchkey Kenny Comment (NAM2) : making the sound of a monster EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\pointlookout.esm\dlc04malechild\dlc04ff04_dlc04ff004ghosts_00011158_1.ogg

Enter data aboard the survey vessel.

ESP.TRADUIT: 布莱克霍尔的黑暗心灵

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;; Obadiah has asked player to get the book - player has agreed. setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 10 1 DLC04FF02RitualSiteMarker.enable DLC04FF02RitualSiteExtEncounter.enable RitualSitePreFF02EncounterTrigger.disable
;; Marcella has made her plea to the player. setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 10 0 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 15 1

;; Player has taken the book from ritual site setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 10 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF02 15 1 DLC04FF02DunwichObeliskREF.enable DLC04FF02TentAmbushMarker.enable if DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 0 && DLC04ObadiahREF.getDead == 0 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 30 1 ; Marcella's Murdered. DLC04FF02MarcellaGore.enable DLC04FF02MarcellaCorpseREF.enable DLC04MarcellaREF.disable elseif DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 1 && DLC04ObadiahREF.getDead == 0 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 29 1 set DLC04FF02.marDiedEarly to 1 elseif DLC04MarcellaREF.getDead == 0 && DLC04ObadiahREF.getDead == 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 31 1 ; Marcella's Murdered. DLC04FF02MarcellaGore.enable DLC04FF02MarcellaCorpseREF.enable DLC04MarcellaREF.disable endif
; holder stage for investigating marcella's tent setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 40 1

; player opts to return book to Obadiah player.additem Caps001 1000 player.removeItem DLC04FF02Book 1 DLC04FF02SecretDoorStuff.disable rewardXP 100 RitualSitePostFF02Encounter.enable CompleteAllObjectives DLC04FF02 setQuestObject DLC04FF02Book 0
; Obadiah is Dead! showMessage DLC04FF02ObadiahDeathMSG setQuestObject DLC04FF02Book 0
; Marcella killed, Obadiah already dead too setQuestObject DLC04FF02Book 0

; Player returned to Marcella instead of Obadiah ; But she is dead. The player can take up her mission. setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 30 0 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 31 0 if DLC04ObadiahREF.getDead == 0 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 240 1 elseif DLC04ObadiahREF.getDead == 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF02 241 1 endif

; quest complete - book destroyed @ dunwich rewardKarma 500 rewardxp 100 RitualSitePostFF02Encounter.enable DLC04FF02SecretDoorStuff.disable CompleteAllObjectives DLC04FF02 setQuestObject DLC04FF02Book 0
Retrieve the Blackhall Family's Book from the ritual site.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从举行仪式的场所找到布莱克霍尔家族的书。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return the Krivbeknih to Obadiah OR Marcella.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把《黑暗圣经》还给奥巴迪亚或是玛塞拉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the Krivbeknih to Obadiah OR Take it to the Dunwich Building in the Capital Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把《黑暗圣经》交给奥巴迪亚或将其带回首都废土的邓维奇大楼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Retrieve the Krivbeknih from the ritual site.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从举行仪式的场所找到《黑暗圣经》。
调查玛塞拉的死亡现场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return the Blackhall Family's Book to Obadiah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把布莱克霍尔家族的书交给奥巴迪亚。
把《黑暗圣经》还给玛塞拉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take the Krivbeknih to the Dunwich Building in the Capital Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把《黑暗圣经》带回废都的邓维奇大楼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aSwap.disable DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aSpawner.enable DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aDoor.SetOpenState 1 DLC04MQ02LDSeq01Spawn01aDoor.playsound3d AMBDLC04BoardsBreak DLC04ManFakeForceMarker01.PlaceAtMe FakeForce100r100 set DLC04MQ02LD.deadCount to 0 ;set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.initTimer01 to 1 ;set DLC04ManMasterTrigREF.Timer to 6
; Player has agreed to fetch ingredients set DLC04FF03a.batchActive to 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF03 40 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF03 50 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF03 70 1
set DLC04FF03a.ingredientsDone to 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF03 80 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF03 90 1
; quest completer set DLC04FF03a.batchActive to 0 rewardXP 50 CompleteAllObjectives DLC04FF03
; Marg is dead. Fail showMessage DLC04FF03FailMSG
Bring Marguerite ten Refined Punga Fruit, or twenty Wild Punga Fruit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带给玛格丽特十个优质膨葛果或者二十个野生膨葛果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring Marguerite three bags of Yeast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带给玛格丽特三包酵母粉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring Marguerite 24 bottles of Purified Water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带给玛格丽特二十四瓶纯水。
带给玛格丽特六个核裂变电池。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Collect Moonshine from Marguerite when the batch is done brewing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当酿制完成的时候记得去玛格丽特那里取私酿酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; player found a quest hook to the motel room setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 5 1

; player found holotape but not opened locker yet.
if player.getItemCount DLC04FF05lockerKey < 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 9 1 else setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 10 1 endif
if getStageDone DLC04FF05 5 == 1 setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 5 1 endif
; this quest stage means player has the bank password holotape
; stage after player has gained bank access. setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 30 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 31 1

; player got dossier and is looking for Agent Yang DLC04FF05WanYangLockerREF.enable
if DLC04FF05.clueYangLoc >= 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 45 1 else setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 40 1 endif
; Player has codes and is seeking out the sunken satellite DLC04FF05SubMarkerREF.enable showMap DLC04FF05SubMarkerREF 0
; Player has unlocked self-destruct switch setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 60 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 61 1
; Player has detonated the bomb. ; player told to return to safehouse for further information

; player is told to report to the extraction site. setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 70 1
DLC04FF05PillarSwapMarker.enable
if player.getItemCount DLC04FF05spyGlasses < 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 71 1 else setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 80 1 endif
; robot activated switch to trap room

; player trapped in double-cross room. setObjectiveCompleted DLC04FF05 80 1 setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF05 90 1
if DLC04FF05gasMarker.getDisabled == 1 DLC04FF05gasMarker.enable DLC04FF05radiationVentMarker.enable endif
if DLC04FF05DoubleCrossDoor.getOpenState == 1 || DLC04FF05DoubleCrossDoor.getOpenState == 2 DLC04FF05gasRoomSwitch.activate player endif
Recover the dead Chinese spy's mission debriefing from the locker in Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从望海崖的储物柜中找到已死中国特务的任务简报。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the password holotape to access safety deposit box 1207 at the Point Lookout Bank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用密码全息录像带打开望海崖银行的1207号保险箱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search for clues about the fate of Agent Yang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搜集关于特务杨婉任务的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate Agent Yang's fate at the Turtledove Detention Camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查特务杨婉在斑鸠羁押营的最终下场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Activate the Chinese submarine self-destruct protocol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 启动中国潜艇的自爆程序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Motel Safehouse Terminal for further instruction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回到汽车旅馆安全屋的终端处以获取进一步指示。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the Cryptochromatic Spectacles and Sequence Note to access the Spy Bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用加密光谱眼镜与记录的密码进入间谍地堡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the spy at Motel Room 1D.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查汽车旅馆1D号房间的特务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Recover the dead Chinese spy's locker key from motel room 1D.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到已死中国特务在汽车旅馆1D号房间的储物柜钥匙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen to the Espionage Debriefing Holotape.
Recover the Cryptochromatic Spectacles from the Toilet Tank in Motel room 1D.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从汽车旅馆1D号房间的厕所水箱中找到加密光谱眼镜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seek the Spy's extraction details and payment in the spy bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在特务地堡内搜寻特务撤离细则和给她的奖赏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Confirm Submarine Self-Destruct by activating the Failsafe Lever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用安全解除控制杆启动潜艇自爆程序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get clear of the Submarine before it self-destructs!

ESP.TRADUIT: 肃清通往望海崖的路线。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rest during the trip to Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在前往望海崖的旅途中休息一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help the mansion's owner repel the invaders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮助公馆的主人击退入侵者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Block off the breach upstairs in the West wing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 封锁西侧楼上的突破口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Block off the breach in the East wing.
Fend off the last of the invaders.

Collect seeds from the giant Punga plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从巨型膨葛果树上收集果实。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk with Desmond about his offer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟德斯蒙德谈谈他的提议。

了解更多关于教授的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to Desmond with the information.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把得到的信息告诉德斯蒙德。

ESP.TRADUIT: 使用垃圾压缩机摧毁脑波干扰器。

ESP.TRADUIT: 跟德斯蒙德一起去见教授。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Desmond OR kill the Professor.
Talk to the Professor OR kill the Professor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和教授谈谈，或者杀了他。

elseif ( GetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 100 == 1 ) SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 100 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 101 1 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC04MQ05b 101 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 150 1

SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 150 0
if ( GetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 180 == 0 ) SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 175 1 endif

;Desmond is dead. Brain has betrayed player.
SetObjectiveCompleted DLC04MQ05b 150 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 180 1

;Player killed Brain. Desmond is alive. Player must talk to Desmond.
DLC04TheBrainREF.SayTo Player DLC04MQ05BrainDeath 1 1 Set DLC04DesmondREF.DesmondPostQuestAction to 1 DLC04DesmondRef.evp

DLC04DesmondREF.RemoveItem DLC04MQ05AccessCard 1 Player.RemoveItem DLC04MQ05AccessCard 1
Set DLC04DesmondREF.TalkToBrain to -1 DLC04MQ05BrainDoor.Unlock DLC04LabEscapeHatchREF.Unlock SetEssential DLC04Desmond 0
SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 100 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed DLC04MQ05b 150 1 SetObjectiveCompleted DLC04MQ05b 150 1 CompleteAllObjectives DLC04MQ05b
Set DLC04DesmondREF.DesmondPostQuestAction to 1 SetStage DLC04MQPQ 5 DLC04DesmondRef.evp setstage DLC04MQCompletedFunctionQuest 10 ;used for post mq events
RewardXP 300 addachievement 67

;Both Brain and Desmond are dead StopQuest DLC04MQ05a

Set DLC04DesmondREF.TalkToBrain to -1 DLC04MQ05BrainDoor.Unlock SetEssential DLC04Desmond 0 DLC04MQ05RewardDoor.SetOpenState 1
CompleteAllObjectives DLC04MQ05b SetStage DLC04MQPQ 10 RewardXP 300 addachievement 67

ESP.TRADUIT: 找到德斯蒙德并阻止他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Desmond OR kill the Professor.

set DLC04FF04.movedIn to 1 player.addToFaction DLC04FF04OwnershipFaction 0 player.addToFaction DLC04FF04PlayerOwnershipFaction 0 DLC04LadderRef.unlock DLC04KennyEntranceMapMarker.enable

; player has learned about the Safari but not registered setObjectiveDisplayed DLC04FF06 10 1

Enter the arena and signal Plik to begin the Safari.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入角斗场，并向普利克发出信号开始狩猎。
在普利克的狩猎活动中存活下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pay Plik 1,000 caps to participate in his Safari.
ESP.TRADUIT: 付给普利克一千个瓶盖以参加他的狩猎活动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let Plik know you survived the Safari.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉普利克你从角斗场中活下来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;set when player completes either MQ05a or MQ05b DLC04PostMQEnableMarker01.enable

setQuestDelay DLC04LighthouseLightFXQuest 0 DLC04LighthouseLighMech01REF.playgroup forward 1 DLC04LighthouseMechLight01REF.playgroup forward 1 set DLC04LighthouseLightFXQuest.timer to 6.66666666666666 set DLC04LighthouseLightFXQuest.repaired to 1 DLC04LighthouseLighMech01REF.playsound OBJDLC04LighthouseStop DLC04LighthouseLoopingSoundREF.disable

setQuestDelay DLC04LighthouseLightFXQuest .1 DLC04LighthouseLighMech01REF.playgroup backward 1 DLC04LighthouseMechLight01REF.playgroup backward 1 set DLC04LighthouseLightFXQuest.repaired to 2 DLC04LighthouseLighMech01REF.playsound OBJDLC04LighthouseStart DLC04LighthouseLoopingSoundREF.enable
setQuestDelay DLC04MansionSmokeFXQuest .1 set DLC04MansionSmokeFXQuest.timer to 10 set DLC04MansionSmokeFXQuest.emitSmoke to 1
Thousands of Confederate prisoners of war died near Point Lookout in the later years of the American Civil War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在美国内战之后的几年中，上千名南军战犯死于望海崖附近

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point Lookout's swamps are rich in natural gases, which sometimes manifest on the surface as explosive methane bubbles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 望海崖的沼泽富含天然气,常常以易爆的沼气泡的形式浮出其表面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Turtledove Detention camp was built near Point Lookout because of its isolated location.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斑鸠拘留所就建在望海崖之旁，得益于那里与世隔绝的地形.

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Ark & Dove Cathedral is named for two English settler ships which landed near Point Lookout in 1634, leading to Maryland's founding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 方舟与白鸽大教堂是以两艘在1634年抵达望海崖的英国移民船命名, 殖民者经由这里上岸最终建立了马里兰州。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point Lookout is said to be one of the most haunted locations in Maryland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 望海崖据传是马里兰州最经常闹鬼的地点之一。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blackhall Manor was the ancestral home of a wealthy family before the Great War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布莱克霍尔庄园是一个富裕家族的祖业，其历史可以上溯到末世大战之前。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Calvert Family had a long history in Point Lookout, but Calvert Mansion is all that remains of their legacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡尔弗特家族在望海崖的历史相当悠久, 但现在只剩下卡尔弗特庄园这一处产业了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point Lookout remained very rural and isolated until the Isla Negra real estate company purchased land and began developing new homes and attractions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 望海崖一直是一片田园风光，并与世隔绝，直到黑岛实业公司买下这片土地，并开始开发住宅与景点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smugglers roam Point Lookout, hoping to find their fortune scavenging this relatively undisturbed desolation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走私者在望海崖终日游荡, 在这片荒芜之地上拾荒，渴望发一笔横财。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swampfolk have no organized society or creed, but seem to mark their territory with totems of wood and bone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沼泽居民没有社会组织也没有信仰，但看起来他们会使用木头与骨头搭建的图腾来标示自己的领土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point Lookout's rural location shielded it from direct impact during the Great War, but the resulting fallout has irradiated the area in the intervening years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 望海崖处于偏远的地理位置使得它幸免于末世大战的直接摧残，但核子尘却在那些岁月中一直污染着这片土地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Swampfolk denizens of Point Lookout are the product of exposure to heavy radiation and generations of poor breeding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 望海崖的沼泽居民是长期暴露在重度辐射下以及世代低下的繁殖力的产物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The unchecked forces of erosion have carved sinkholes and grottoes throughout Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泛滥的腐蚀之力在望海崖的地下蚀刻出了众多的坑道与山洞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mirelurks thrive in the humidity of Point Lookout's coastal shores and viciously defend their territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蟹人族群在望海崖潮湿的海滩环境下繁衍壮大，并凶悍地捍卫它们的领地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coastal shipwrecks and buoys are good places to seek sunken riches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沿海的沉船与浮标是探索财富的好地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the Superior Defender Perk, the player gains +5 to their damage and +10 to their armor rating while standing still.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掌握究极防御者时, 玩家在站立不动时将获得5点伤害加成与10点护甲加成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Swing For The Fences you'll do an additional 10 points of damage while any one or two handed melee weapon is equipped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掌握孤注一掷能力时，玩家在装备任意单手或双手近战武器时，将得到10点伤害加成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Protect what's important. With the Gray Matters perk you'll receive 25% less damage when hit in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保护重要的部位。当掌握灰质能力时头部被击中所造成的伤害将减少25%.

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have learned to exploit the specific weaknesses of ghouls, and gain a +5 damage bonus when attacking one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你掌握了僵尸的特殊弱点，并将在与它们的战斗中获得5点伤害加成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After hours of studying, you've finally learned to exploit a mirelurk's weaknesses and gain a +5 damage bonus while attacking one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经历了数小时的学习之后，你终于发现了泥沼蟹的弱点，并在与它们战斗时获得五5点伤害加成。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Behold the power of the Punga! The restorative effects of Punga fruit now have a greater effect on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧瞧膨葛神力的妙处吧！膨葛果的回复效果大幅提高。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Behold the power of the Punga! When harvesting Punga plants, you will receive more fruit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧瞧膨葛神力的妙处吧！你可以在膨葛树上采集到更多的膨葛果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The large tome set into this lectern must be the Krivbeknih. It is damp with what appears to be fresh blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诵经台上的这本经书一定是《黑暗圣经》。这本书潮湿的封面上像是沾满了血迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Replacing the Krivbeknih may put you out of harm's way, but Obadiah Blackhall's life will likely be forfeit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这本书放回原处可能可以使你免除灾祸，但是奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔则会完蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Marcella's dead body lies here. A message has been written in her blood:
"Return the Book and You Live."
ESP.TRADUIT:
玛塞拉的尸体在这里。还有一条用她的血写的信息：
“把书还回去，放你一条生路。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old moonshine still has several loose fittings and some corrosion, but could be repaired with sufficient skill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这破旧的私酿酒蒸馏器有些零件松动了，此外还受到了一些腐蚀，但是通过使用足够的修理技能还是可以让它恢复工作的。
对蒸馏器不进行任何操作。
那么，情况将会怎么样呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There appears to be a functional self-destruct switch, but the mechanism does nothing without proper authorization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来这里有一个具有自爆功能的开关，但是这机械装置没有正确的密码认证，是不会被启动的。
输入自爆需要的认证密码。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Duchess Gambit is ready to begin its trip to the Capital Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公爵夫人号已经准备好向首都废土进发了。
开始前往华盛顿废土的旅行

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready to leave yet.
The Duchess Gambit is ready to begin its trip to Point Lookout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公爵夫人号已经准备好向望海崖进发了。
开始前往望海崖的旅行

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not ready to leave yet.

A riverboat has docked at the mouth of the Potomac, carrying trade from the distant peninsula of Point Lookout.
The captain offers passage to Point Lookout for any mercenary, treasure hunter, or adventurer looking to explore the new land.
ESP.TRADUIT:
一艘渡轮停靠在波多马克河口，负责这里与遥远的望海崖半岛的商业运输。
船长可以为任何想去望海崖淘金的雇佣兵、寻宝者或冒险者提供运送服务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must purchase a boat ticket to ride on the Duchess Gambit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想要登上公爵夫人号渡船，你必须买一张船票。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The door to the Ewers' House is locked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤尔斯家的房门是锁着的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This compactor will destroy anything you throw in it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这台压缩机将会摧毁你放进去的一切东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Throw the Cogwave Jammer into the compactor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把脑波干扰器扔进压缩机。
对压缩机不进行任何操作。
压缩机没电了，无法工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The compactor has done its work and is now idling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 压缩机完成任务，现在处于闲置状态。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Isn't it funny how everything you get close to ends up leaving?"
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一只Schmault-Tec限量版的摇头娃娃！
基石上写着一行字：“你所拥有的一切最终都离你而去，这是不是很滑稽呢？”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Blech. If my kid looked like that, I'd abandon it too."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一只Schmault-Tec限量版的摇头娃娃！
基石上写着一行字：“哇靠，如果我的孩子长得像那样，我也会丢弃他的。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Installing the Cogwave Jammer will scramble Professor Calvert's messages to his followers and enable Desmond to locate him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安装好脑波干扰器之后，它会对卡尔弗特教授对他手下发出的信息进行扰乱处理，同时使得德斯蒙德能知道他的位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Cogwave Jammer has been installed.
The Ferris wheel has no power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 转轮没有电力，无法工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "This doesn't look right, not right at all."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一只Schmault-Tec限量版的摇头娃娃！
基石上写着一行字：“这样看起来不对，完全不对。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: You cannot find any more seeds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法找到更多的果实了。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bulletin: Attention Citizens of Point Lookout!
Wan Yang, suspected communist and Chinese sympathizer, has been reported in the vicinity of Point Lookout. Agent Yang may be operating under an alias and/or using a disguise.
You are required to report any suspicious persons or behavior to Lt. Krumfolz (DIA) at the US Naval Office located at 1811 St. Mary's Branch.
ESP.TRADUIT:
公告：望海崖的居民们注意了！
据悉杨婉这位可疑的中国共产党员和特务, 已经在本地区附近出现了！杨很可能使用了化名，或者易容术。
如果发现任何的可疑的人或行动，立即向美国海军征兵站的海军少校克伦普霍尔兹 （国防情报局）报告。征兵站的地址是圣玛丽路支路1811号。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've found what's left of Agent Yang. Inspecting the remains closely, you discover a false molar tooth. There is a microfilm within that must contain the Self-Destruct Codes for the Chinese submarine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你发现了特务杨婉遗留下的东西。仔细检查遗留物，你会发现一颗假臼齿。里面藏有一份微缩胶卷，里边记载的，一定是与中国潜艇自爆装置有关的密码。
对假臼齿不进行任何操作。
带走内嵌自爆密码的微缩胶卷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For some reason, you feel a terrible sense of loss as you look at the familiar lump of gray matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于某种原因，当你看见那团熟悉的灰色物质时，你感到一种怅然若失的感觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Tsk. Tsk. Walked right into another trap. Exactly how stupid are you?"
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一只Schmault-Tec限量版的摇头娃娃！
基石上写着一行字：“不，不，你这是径直走进了又一个陷阱。你怎么可以这么傻呢？”
奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just being near this Obelisk makes you uneasy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 站在方尖碑的旁边会使你心绪不宁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lack the skill to perform the repair.
The moonshine still is old, but in the best possible condition for its age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 私酿酒蒸馏器还是冷的，但是以它的年岁来看，这可能是最佳的状况了。
对蒸馏器不进行任何操作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must have a shovel to dig here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要挖掘这里，你必须有一把铁铲。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Dead mother, life in a post-nuclear Wasteland and not a friend in it. Yeah, you aren’t exactly blessed."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一只Schmault-Tec限量版的摇头娃娃！
基石上写着一行字：“死亡之母，在废土的孤独日子，没有一个朋友。是的，你完全没有得到神灵的眷顾。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "This is one situation you're not going to be able to fight your way out of."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一只Schmault-Tec限量版的摇头娃娃！
基石上写着一行字：“如今的情况，你只手空拳是无法突出重围的了。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The "Superior Defender" perk has been added.
You now do more damage and have better defense when standing still.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你获得了“终极防御者”能力！
当你静止不动的时候将拥有更好的进攻和防御状态。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The "Punga Power!" perk has been added.
You now receive better effects from eating Punga Fruit.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你获得了“膨葛神力”能力！
现在你食用膨葛果实的时候将会收到更佳的效果！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The "Mirelurk Ecology" perk has been added.
You now do additional damage against Mirelurks.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你获得了“蟹人生态学”能力！
现在你可以对蟹人造成额外伤害了！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The "Ghoul Ecology" perk has been added.
You now do additional damage against Ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你获得了“僵尸生态学”能力！
现在你可以对僵尸造成额外伤害了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lack the skill to override the circuitry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你尚缺少强制控制电路的技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This circuitry is wired directly into the door. While quite complicated, a skilled technician could override the door controls from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这电路是直接控制门的，当然它的结构也是相当复杂，需要一个相当有经验的技师才能实现对它的强行控制。
对电路不进行任何操作。
[技能: 71] 强行操作对门进行控制。
[技能: 71] 强行操作对门进行控制。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lack the skill to disable the vent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你缺少使通风口停止工作的技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radiation is being vented into the room through this vent. With a little skill, it could be disabled, stemming the flow of radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射正在从通风口被排进这个房间。你需要一些技能使得辐射的蔓延停止下来。
对通风口不进行任何操作。
[修理: 30] 使得通风口停止工作
[修理: 30] 使得通风口停止工作

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Obelisk shares its origins with the Krivbeknih. Just being near it makes you uneasy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这座方尖碑和那本有着相同的起源，站在它的旁边会使你心绪不宁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Press the Krivbeknih to the Obelisk's surface.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把《黑暗圣经》放置在方尖碑的上面。
对方尖碑不进行任何操作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here marks the landing of Captain John Smith's shallop upon his discovery of Point Lookout in 1612.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里标记的是约翰·史密斯船长的战船的靠岸处，以及1612年他发现望海崖的记录。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The "Punga Power!" perk has been added.
Eating Punga Fruit now gives you temporary Action Points.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你获得了“膨葛神力”能力！
现在你食用膨葛果实的时候将使你获得暂时的行动值！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The "Punga Power!" perk has been added.
Eating Punga Fruit now gives you temporary Action Points.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你获得了“膨葛神力”能力！
现在你食用膨葛果实的时候将使你获得暂时的行动值！

ESP.ORIGINAL: This journal contains a number of observations and insights specific to hunting and fighting Ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份日志中详尽介绍了有关捕猎和与僵尸战斗的一些观察数据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have learned to exploit the specific weaknesses of Ghouls, and gain a +5 damage bonus when attacking one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经学会了利用僵尸的弱点，增加5点对僵尸的伤害。
